atk-s0202a:5_0: 1. Evaṃ me sutanti kandarakasuttaṃ. Tattha campāyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Tassa hi
atk-s0202a:5_1: nagarassa ārāmapokkharaṇīādīsu tesu tesu ṭhānesu campakarukkhāva ussannā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0202a:5_2: tasmā campāti saṅkhamagamāsi. Gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīreti tassa campānagarassa
atk-s0202a:5_3: avidūre gaggarāya nāma rājamahesiyā khaṇitattā gaggarāti laddhavohārā pokkharaṇī
atk-s0202a:5_4: atthi. Tassā tīre samantato nīlādipañcavaṇṇakusumapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ mahantaṃ campakavanaṃ.
atk-s0202a:5_5: Tasmiṃ bhagavā kusumagandhasugandhe campakavane viharati. Taṃ sandhāya “gaggarāya
atk-s0202a:5_6: pokkharaṇiyā tīre”ti vuttaṃ. Mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhinti adassitaparicchedena
atk-s0202a:5_7: mahantena bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ. Pessoti tassa nāmaṃ. Hatthārohaputtoti hatthācariyassa
atk-s0202a:5_8: putto. Kandarako ca paribbājakoti kandarakoti evaṃnāmo channaparibbājako. Abhivādetvāti
atk-s0202a:5_9: chabbaṇṇānaṃ ghanabuddharasmīnaṃ antaraṃ pavisitvā pasannalākhārase nimujjamāno viya,
atk-s0202a:5_10: siṅgīsuvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ dussavaraṃ pasāretvā sasīsaṃ pārupamāno viya, vaṇṇagandhasampannacampakapupphāni
atk-s0202a:5_11: sirasā sampaṭicchanto viya, sinerupādaṃ upagacchanto puṇṇacando viya bhagavato cakkalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍite
atk-s0202a:5_12: alattakavaṇṇaphullapadumasassirike pāde vanditvāti attho. Ekamantaṃ nisīdīti chanisajjadosavirahite
atk-s0202a:6_0: Tuṇhībhū taṃ tuṇhībhūtanti yato yato anuviloketi, tato tato tuṇhībhūtamevāti attho.
atk-s0202a:6_1: Tattha hi ekabhikkhussāpi hatthakukkuccaṃ vā pādakukkuccaṃ vā natthi, sabbe bhagavato
atk-s0202a:6_2: ceva gāravena attano ca sikkhitasikkhatāya aññamaññaṃ vigatasallāpā antamaso ukkāsitasaddampi
atk-s0202a:6_3: akarontā sunikhātaindakhīlā viya nivātaṭṭhāne sannisinnaṃ mahāsamuddaudakaṃ viya
atk-s0202a:6_4: kāyenapi niccalā manasāpi avikkhittā rattavalāhakā viya sinerukūṭaṃ bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā
atk-s0202a:6_5: nisīdiṃsu. Paribbājakassa evaṃ sannisinnaṃ parisaṃ disvā mahantaṃ pītisomanassaṃ
atk-s0202a:6_6: uppajji. Uppannaṃ pana antohadayasmiṃyeva sannidahituṃ asakkonto piyasamudāhāraṃ
atk-s0202a:7_0: Tattha andhassa pabbatārohanaṃ viya niccaṃ na hotīti acchariyaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva saddanayo.
atk-s0202a:7_1: Ayaṃ pana aṭṭhakathānayo, accharāyogganti acchariyaṃ. Accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttanti
atk-s0202a:7_2: attho. Abhūtapubbaṃ bhūtanti abbhutaṃ. Ubhayampetaṃ vimhayassevādhivacanaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ
atk-s0202a:7_3: garahaacchariyaṃ, pasaṃsāacchariyanti duvidhaṃ hoti. Tattha acchariyaṃ moggallāna
atk-s0202a:7_4: abbhutaṃ moggallāna, yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāma so moghapuriso āgamessatīti, idaṃ garahaacchariyaṃ
atk-s0202a:7_5: nāma. “Acchariyaṃ nandamāte abbhutaṃ nandamāte, yatra hi nāma cittuppādampi parisodhessasīti
atk-s0202a:7_6: idaṃ pasaṃsāacchariyaṃ nāma. Idhāpi idameva adhippetaṃ” ayañhi taṃ pasaṃsanto evamāha.
atk-s0202a:8_0: Yāvañcidanti ettha idanti nipātamattaṃ. Yāvāti pamāṇaparicchedo, yāva sammā paṭipādito,
atk-s0202a:8_1: yattakena pamāṇena sammā paṭipādito, na sakkā tassa vaṇṇe vattuṃ, atha kho acchariyamevetaṃ
atk-s0202a:8_2: abbhutamevetanti vuttaṃ hoti. Etaparamaṃyevāti evaṃ sammā paṭipādito eso bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-s0202a:8_3: tassāpi bhikkhusaṅghassa paramoti etaparamo, taṃ etaparamaṃ yathā ayaṃ paṭipādito,
atk-s0202a:8_4: evaṃ paṭipāditaṃ katvā paṭipādesuṃ, na ito bhiyyoti attho. Dutiyanaye evaṃ paṭipādessanti,
atk-s0202a:8_5: na ito bhiyyoti yojetabbaṃ. Tattha paṭipāditoti ābhisamācārikavattaṃ ādiṃ katvā sammā
atk-s0202a:8_6: apaccanīkapaṭipattiyaṃ yojito. Atha kasmā ayaṃ paribbājako atītānāgate buddhe dasseti,
atk-s0202a:8_7: kimassa tiyaddhajānanañāṇaṃ atthīti. Natthi, nayaggāhe pana ṭhatvā “yenākārena ayaṃ
atk-s0202a:8_8: bhikkhusaṅgho sannisinno danto vinīto upasanto, atītabuddhāpi etaparamaṃyeva katvā
atk-s0202a:8_9: paṭipajjāpesuṃ, anāgatabuddhāpi paṭipajjāpessanti, natthi ito uttari paṭipādanā”ti
atk-s0202a:9_0: 2. Evametaṃ kandarakāti pāṭiekko anusandhi. Bhagavā kira taṃ sutvā “kandaraka tvaṃ
atk-s0202a:9_1: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upasantoti vadasi, imassa pana bhikkhusaṅghassa upasantakāraṇaṃ tuyhaṃ
atk-s0202a:9_2: apākaṭaṃ, na hi tvaṃ samatiṃsa pāramiyā pūretvā kusalamūlaṃ paripācetvā bodhipallaṅke
atk-s0202a:9_3: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhi, mayā pana pāramiyo pūretvā ñātatthacariyaṃ lokatthacariyaṃ
atk-s0202a:9_4: buddhatthacariyañca koṭiṃ pāpetvā bodhipallaṅke sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdhaṃ, mayhaṃ
atk-s0202a:9_5: etesaṃ upasantakāraṇaṃ pākaṭa”nti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0202a:10_0: Santi hi kandarakāti ayampi pāṭiekko anusandhi. Bhagavato kira etadahosi – “ayaṃ
atk-s0202a:10_1: paribbājako imaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upasantoti vadati, ayañca bhikkhusaṅgho kappetvā
atk-s0202a:10_2: pakappetvā kuhakabhāvena iriyāpathaṃ saṇṭhapento cittena anupasanto na upasantākāraṃ
atk-s0202a:10_3: dasseti. Ettha pana bhikkhusaṅghe paṭipadaṃ pūrayamānāpi paṭipadaṃ pūretvā matthakaṃ
atk-s0202a:10_4: patvā ṭhitabhikkhūpi atthi, tattha paṭipadaṃ pūretvā matthakaṃ pattā attanā paṭividdhaguṇeheva
atk-s0202a:10_5: upasantā, paṭipadaṃ pūrayamānā uparimaggassa vipassanāya upasantā, ito muttā pana
atk-s0202a:10_6: avasesā catūhi satipaṭṭhānehi upasantā. Taṃ nesaṃ upasantakāraṇaṃ dassessāmī”ti “iminā
atk-s0202a:10_7: ca iminā ca kāraṇena ayaṃ bhikkhusaṅgho upasanto”ti dassetuṃ “santi hi kandarakā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:11_0: Tattha arahanto khīṇāsavātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ mūlapariyāyasuttavaṇṇanāyameva
atk-s0202a:11_1: vuttaṃ. Sekhapaṭipadampi tattheva vitthāritaṃ. Santatasīlāti satatasīlā nirantarasīlā.
atk-s0202a:11_2: Santatavuttinoti tasseva vevacanaṃ, santatajīvikā vātipi attho. Tasmiṃ santatasīle
atk-s0202a:11_3: ṭhatvāva jīvikaṃ kappenti, na dussīlyaṃ maraṇaṃ pāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-s0202a:12_0: Nipakāti nepakkena samannāgatā paññavanto. Nipakavuttinoti paññāya vuttino, paññāya
atk-s0202a:12_1: ṭhatvā jīvikaṃ kappenti. Yathā ekacco sāsane pabbajitvāpi jīvitakāraṇā chasu agocaresu
atk-s0202a:12_3: Saṃsaṭṭho viharati rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi ananulomikena
atk-s0202a:12_4: gihisaṃsaggena, vejjakammaṃ karoti, dūtakammaṃ karoti, pahiṇakammaṃ karoti, gaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0202a:12_5: phāleti, arumakkhanaṃ deti, uddhaṃvirecanaṃ deti, adhovirecanaṃ deti, natthutelaṃ
atk-s0202a:12_6: pacati, pivanatelaṃ pacati, veḷudānaṃ, pattadānaṃ, pupphadānaṃ, phaladānaṃ, sinānadānaṃ,
atk-s0202a:12_7: dantakaṭṭhadānaṃ, mukhodakadānaṃ, cuṇṇamattikadānaṃ deti, cāṭukamyaṃ karoti, muggasūpiyaṃ,
atk-s0202a:12_8: pāribhaṭuṃ, jaṅghapesaniyaṃ karotīti ekavīsatividhāya anesanāya jīvikaṃ kappento
atk-s0202a:12_9: anipakavutti nāma hoti, na paññāya ṭhatvā jīvikaṃ kappeti, tato kālakiriyaṃ katvā
atk-s0202a:12_10: samaṇayakkho nāma hutvā “tassa saṅghāṭipi ādittā hoti sampajjalitā”ti vuttanayena
atk-s0202a:12_11: mahādukkhaṃ anubhoti. Evaṃvidhā ahutvā jīvitahetupi sikkhāpadaṃ anatikkamanto catupārisuddhisīle
atk-s0202a:12_12: patiṭṭhāya yathābalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā rathavinītapaṭipadaṃ, mahāgosiṅgapaṭipadaṃ,
atk-s0202a:12_15: kāyasakkhino hutvā anīkā nikkhantahatthī viya yūthā vissaṭṭhasīho viya nipacchābandhamahānāvā
atk-s0202a:12_16: viya ca gamanādīsu ekavihārino vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ajjaajjeva arahattanti pavattaussāhā viharantīti attho.
atk-s0202a:13_0: Suppatiṭṭhitacittāti catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suṭṭhapitacittā hutvā. Sesā satipaṭṭhānakathā
atk-s0202a:13_1: heṭṭhā vitthāritāva. Idha pana lokiyalokuttaramissakā satipaṭṭhānā kathitā, ettakena
atk-s0202a:14_0: 3. Yāva supaññattāti yāva suṭṭhapitā sudesitā. Mayampi hi, bhanteti iminā esa attano
atk-s0202a:14_1: kārakabhāvaṃ dasseti, bhikkhusaṅghañca ukkhipati. Ayañhettha adhippāyo, mayampi hi,
atk-s0202a:14_2: bhante, gihi…pe… suppatiṭṭhitacittā viharāma, bhikkhusaṅghassa pana ayameva kasi
atk-s0202a:14_3: ca bījañca yuganaṅgalañca phālapācanañca, tasmā bhikkhusaṅgho sabbakālaṃ satipaṭṭhānaparāyaṇo,
atk-s0202a:14_4: mayaṃ pana kālena kālaṃ okāsaṃ labhitvā etaṃ manasikāraṃ karoma, mayampi kārakā,
atk-s0202a:14_5: na sabbaso vissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānāyevāti. Manussagahaneti manussānaṃ ajjhāsayagahanena
atk-s0202a:14_6: gahanatā, ajjhāsayassāpi nesaṃ kilesagahanena gahanatā veditabbā. Kasaṭasāṭheyyesupi
atk-s0202a:14_7: eseva nayo. Tattha aparisuddhaṭṭhena kasaṭatā, kerāṭiyaṭṭhena sāṭheyyatā veditabbā.
atk-s0202a:14_8: Sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ jānātīti evaṃ gahanakasaṭakerāṭiyānaṃ manussānaṃ hitāhitapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0202a:14_9: yāva suṭṭhu bhagavā jānāti. Yadidaṃ pasavoti ettha sabbāpi catuppadajāti pasavoti
atk-s0202a:14_10: adhippetā. Pahomīti sakkomi. Yāvatakena antarenāti yattakena khaṇena. Campaṃ gatāgataṃ
atk-s0202a:14_11: karissatīti assamaṇḍalato yāva campānagaradvārā gamanañca āgamanañca karissati. Sāṭheyyānīti
atk-s0202a:14_12: saṭhattāni. Kūṭeyyānīti kūṭattāni. Vaṅkeyyānīti vaṅkattāni. Jimheyyānīti jimhattāni.
atk-s0202a:14_13: Pātukarissatīti pakāsessati dassessati. Na hi sakkā tena tāni ettakena antarena dassetuṃ.
atk-s0202a:15_0: Tattha yassa kismiñcideva ṭhāne ṭhātukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
atk-s0202a:15_1: purato gantvā vañcetvā ṭhassāmīti na hoti, tasmiṃ ṭhātukāmaṭṭhāneyeva nikhātatthambho
atk-s0202a:15_2: viya cattāro pāde niccale katvā tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ saṭho nāma. Yassa pana kismiñcideva
atk-s0202a:15_3: ṭhāne avacchinditvā khandhagataṃ pātetukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
atk-s0202a:15_4: purato gantvā vañcetvā pātessāmīti na hoti, tattheva avacchinditvā pāteti, ayaṃ kūṭo
atk-s0202a:15_5: nāma. Yassa kismiñcideva ṭhāne maggā ukkamma nivattitvā paṭimaggaṃ ārohitukāmassa
atk-s0202a:15_6: sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ, purato gantvā vañcetvā evaṃ karissāmīti
atk-s0202a:15_7: na hoti, tattheva maggā ukkamma nivattitvā paṭimaggaṃ ārohati, ayaṃ vaṅko nāma. Yassa
atk-s0202a:15_8: pana kālena vāmato kālena dakkhiṇato kālena ujumaggeneva gantukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0202a:15_9: manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ, purato gantvā vañcetvā evaṃ karissāmīti na hoti, tattheva
atk-s0202a:15_10: kālena vāmato kālena dakkhiṇato kālena ujumaggaṃ gacchati, tathā laṇḍaṃ vā passāvaṃ
atk-s0202a:15_11: vā vissajjetukāmassa sato idaṃ ṭhānaṃ susammaṭṭhaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ, imasmiṃ
atk-s0202a:15_12: ṭhāne evarūpaṃ kātuṃ na yuttaṃ, purato gantvā paṭicchannaṭhāne karissāmīti na hoti,
atk-s0202a:15_13: tattheva karoti, ayaṃ jimho nāma. Iti imaṃ catubbidhampi kiriyaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a:15_14: Sabbāni tāni sāṭheyyāni kūṭeyyāni vaṅkeyyāni jimheyyāni pātukarissatīti evaṃ karontāpi
atk-s0202a:15_15: te saṭhādayo tāni sāṭheyyādīni pātukaronti nāma.
atk-s0202a:16_0: Evaṃ pasūnaṃ uttānabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni manussānaṃ gahanabhāvaṃ dassento amhākaṃ
atk-s0202a:16_1: pana, bhantetiādimāha. Tattha dāsāti antojātakā vā dhanakkītā vā karamarānītā vā
atk-s0202a:16_2: sayaṃ vā dāsabyaṃ upagatā. Pessāti pesanakārakā. Kammakarāti bhattavetanabhatā. Aññathāva
atk-s0202a:16_3: kāyenāti aññenevākārena kāyena samudācaranti, aññenevākārena vācāya, aññena ca nesaṃ
atk-s0202a:16_4: ākārena cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ hotīti dasseti. Tattha ye sammukhā sāmike disvā paccuggamanaṃ
atk-s0202a:16_5: karonti, hatthato bhaṇḍakaṃ gaṇhanti, imaṃ vissajjetvā imaṃ gaṇhantā sesānipi āsana-paññāpana-tālavaṇṭabījana-pādadhovanādīni
atk-s0202a:16_6: sabbāni kiccāni karonti, parammukhakāle pana telampi uttarantaṃ na olokenti, satagghanakepi
atk-s0202a:16_7: sahassagghanakepi kamme parihāyante nivattitvā oloketumpi na icchanti, ime aññathā
atk-s0202a:16_8: kāyena samudācaranti nāma. Ye pana sammukhā “amhākaṃ sāmi amhākaṃ ayyo”tiādīni vatvā
atk-s0202a:16_9: pasaṃsanti, parammukhā avattabbaṃ nāma natthi, yaṃ icchanti, taṃ vadanti, ime aññathā
atk-s0202a:17_0: 4. Cattārome pessapuggalāti ayampi pāṭiekko anusandhi. Ayañhi pesso “yāvañcidaṃ,
atk-s0202a:17_1: bhante, bhagavā evaṃ manussagahaṇe evaṃ manussakasaṭe evaṃ manussasāṭheyye vattamāne
atk-s0202a:17_2: sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ jānātī”ti āha. Purime ca tayo puggalā ahitapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā,
atk-s0202a:17_3: upari catuttho hitapaṭipadaṃ, evamahaṃ sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ jānāmīti dassetuṃ imaṃ
atk-s0202a:17_4: desanaṃ ārabhi. Heṭṭhā kandarakassa kathāya saddhiṃ yojetumpi vaṭṭati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0202a:17_5: “yāvañcidaṃ bhotā gotamena sammā bhikkhusaṅgho paṭipādito”ti. Athassa bhagavā “purime
atk-s0202a:17_6: tayo puggale pahāya upari catutthapuggalassa hitapaṭipattiyaṃyeva paṭipādemī”ti dassentopi
atk-s0202a:17_7: imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Santoti idaṃ saṃvijjamānāti padasseva vevacanaṃ. “Santā honti
atk-s0202a:17_8: samitā vūpasantā”ti ettha hi niruddhā santāti vuttā. “Santā ete vihārā ariyassa vinaye
atk-s0202a:17_9: vuccantī”ti ettha nibbutā. “Santo have sabbhi pavedayantī”ti ettha paṇḍitā. Idha
atk-s0202a:18_0: Attantapādīsu attānaṃ tapati dukkhāpetīti attantapo. Attano paritāpanānuyogaṃ attaparitāpanānuyogaṃ.
atk-s0202a:18_1: Paraṃ tapati dukkhāpetīti parantapo. Paresaṃ paritāpanānuyogaṃ paraparitāpanānuyogaṃ.
atk-s0202a:18_2: Diṭṭheva dhammeti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. Nicchātoti chātaṃ vuccati taṇhā, sā assa
atk-s0202a:18_3: natthīti nicchāto. Sabbakilesānaṃ nibbutattā nibbuto. Anto tāpanakilesānaṃ abhāvā
atk-s0202a:18_4: sītalo jātoti sītibhūto. Jhānamaggaphalanibbānasukhāni paṭisaṃvedetīti sukhapaṭisaṃvedī.
atk-s0202a:18_5: Brahmabhūtena attanāti seṭṭhabhūtena attanā. Cittaṃ ārādhetīti cittaṃ sampādeti,
atk-s0202a:19: 5. Dukkhapaṭikkūlanti dukkhassa paṭikūlaṃ, paccanīkasaṇṭhitaṃ dukkhaṃ apatthayamānanti attho.
atk-s0202a:20_0: 6. Paṇḍitoti idha catūhi kāraṇehi paṇḍitoti na vattabbo, satipaṭṭhānesu pana kammaṃ
atk-s0202a:20_1: karotīti paṇḍitoti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Mahāpaññoti idampi mahante atthe pariggaṇhātītiādinā
atk-s0202a:20_2: mahāpaññalakkhaṇena na vattabbaṃ, satipaṭṭhānapariggāhikāya pana paññāya samannāgatattā
atk-s0202a:20_3: mahāpaññoti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Mahatā atthena saṃyutto agamissāti mahatā atthena saṃyutto
atk-s0202a:20_4: hutvā gato bhaveyya, sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇeyyāti attho. Kiṃ pana yesaṃ maggaphalānaṃ
atk-s0202a:20_5: upanissayo atthi, buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve ṭhitepi tesaṃ antarāyo hotīti. Āma hoti,
atk-s0202a:20_6: na pana buddhe paṭicca, atha kho kiriyaparihāniyā vā pāpamittatāya vā hoti. Tattha
atk-s0202a:20_7: kiriyaparihāniyā hoti nāma – sace hi dhammasenāpati dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa āsayaṃ
atk-s0202a:20_8: ñatvā dhammaṃ adesayissā, so brāhmaṇo sotāpanno abhavissā, evaṃ tāva kiriyaparihāniyā
atk-s0202a:20_9: hoti. Pāpamittatāya hoti nāma – sace hi ajātasattu devadattassa vacanaṃ gahetvā pitughātakammaṃ
atk-s0202a:20_10: nākarissā, sāmaññaphalasuttakathitadivaseva sotāpanno abhavissā, tassa vacanaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0202a:20_11: pitughātakammassa katattā pana na hoti, evaṃ pāpamittatāya hoti. Imassāpi upāsakassa
atk-s0202a:20_12: kiriyaparihāni jātā, apariniṭṭhitāya desanāya uṭṭhahitvā pakkanto. Apica, bhikkhave,
atk-s0202a:20_13: ettāvatāpi pesso hatthārohaputto mahatā atthena saṃyuttoti katarena mahantena atthena?
atk-s0202a:20_14: Dvīhi ānisaṃsehi. So kira upāsako saṅghe ca pasādaṃ paṭilabhi, satipaṭṭhānapariggahaṇatthāya
atk-s0202a:20_15: cassa abhinavo nayo udapādi. Tena vuttaṃ “mahatā atthena saṃyutto”ti. Kandarako pana
atk-s0202a:20_16: saṅghe pasādameva paṭilabhi. Etassa bhagavā kāloti etassa dhammakkhānassa, catunnaṃ
atk-s0202a:21_0: 8. Orabbhikādīsu urabbhā vuccanti eḷakā, urabbhe hanatīti orabbhiko. Sūkarikādīsupi
atk-s0202a:21_1: eseva nayo. Luddoti dāruṇo kakkhaḷo. Macchaghātakoti macchabandhakevaṭṭo. Bandhanāgārikoti
atk-s0202a:22_0: 9. Muddhāvasittoti khattiyābhisekena muddhani abhisitto. Puratthimena nagarassāti
atk-s0202a:22_1: nagarato puratthimadisāya. Santhāgāranti yaññasālaṃ. Kharājinaṃ nivāsetvāti sakhuraṃ
atk-s0202a:22_2: ajinacammaṃ nivāsetvā. Sappitelenāti sappinā ca telena ca. Ṭhapetvā hi sappiṃ avaseso
atk-s0202a:22_3: yo koci sneho telanti vuccati. Kaṇḍūvamānoti nakhānaṃ chinnattā kaṇḍūvitabbakāle
atk-s0202a:22_4: tena kaṇḍūvamāno. Anantarahitāyāti asanthatāya. Sarūpavacchāyāti sadisavacchāya.
atk-s0202a:22_5: Sace gāvī setā hoti, vacchopi setakova. Sace gāvī kabarā vā rattā vā, vacchopi tādiso
atk-s0202a:22_6: vāti evaṃ sarūpavacchāya. So evamāhāti so rājā evaṃ vadeti. Vacchatarāti taruṇavacchakabhāvaṃ
atk-s0202a:22_7: atikkantā balavavacchā. Vacchatarīsupi eseva nayo. Barihisatthāyāti parikkhepakaraṇatthāya
atk-s0202a:22_8: ceva yaññabhūmiyaṃ attharaṇatthāya ca. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā tattha tattha vitthāritattā uttānamevāti.
atk-s0202a:26_0: 17. Evaṃ me sutanti aṭṭhakanāgarasuttaṃ. Tattha beluvagāmaketi vesāliyā dakkhiṇapasse
atk-s0202a:26_1: avidūre beluvagāmako nāma atthi, taṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvāti attho. Dasamoti so hi jātigottavasena
atk-s0202a:26_2: ceva sārappattakulagaṇanāya ca dasame ṭhāne gaṇīyati, tenassa dasamotveva nāmaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0202a:26_3: Aṭṭhakanāgaroti aṭṭhakanagaravāsī. Kukkuṭārāmoti kukkuṭaseṭṭhinā kārito ārāmo.
atk-s0202a:27_0: 18. Tena bhagavatā…pe… akkhātoti ettha ayaṃ saṅkhepattho, yo so bhagavā samatiṃsa
atk-s0202a:27_1: pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, tena
atk-s0202a:27_2: bhagavatā, tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ āsayānusayaṃ jānatā, hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ viya
atk-s0202a:27_3: sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ passatā. Apica pubbenivāsādīhi jānatā, dibbena cakkhunā passatā,
atk-s0202a:27_4: tīhi vijjāhi chahi vā pana abhiññāhi jānatā, sabbattha appaṭihatena samantacakkhunā
atk-s0202a:27_5: passatā, sabbadhammajānanasamatthāya paññāya jānatā, sabbasattānaṃ cakkhuvisayātītāni
atk-s0202a:27_6: tirokuṭṭādigatānipi rūpāni ativisuddhena maṃsacakkhunā passatā, attahitasādhikāya
atk-s0202a:27_8: desanāpaññāya passatā, arīnaṃ hatattā paccayādīnañca arahattā arahatā, sammā sāmañca
atk-s0202a:27_9: saccānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhena. Antarāyikadhamme vā jānatā, niyyānikadhamme
atk-s0202a:27_10: passatā, kilesārīnaṃ hatattā arahatā, sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhenāti
atk-s0202a:27_11: evaṃ catuvesārajjavasena catūhi kāraṇehi thomitena. Atthi nu kho eko dhammo akkhātoti.
atk-s0202a:28_0: 19. Abhisaṅkhatanti kataṃ uppāditaṃ. Abhisañcetayitanti cetayitaṃ pakappitaṃ. So
atk-s0202a:28_1: tattha ṭhitoti so tasmiṃ samathavipassanādhamme ṭhito. Dhammarāgena dhammanandiyāti
atk-s0202a:28_2: padadvayehi samathavipassanāsu chandarāgo vutto. Samathavipassanāsu hi sabbena sabbaṃ
atk-s0202a:28_3: chandarāgaṃ pariyādiyituṃ sakkonto arahā hoti, asakkonto anāgāmī hoti. So samathavipassanāsu
atk-s0202a:28_4: chandarāgassa appahīnattā catutthajjhānacetanāya suddhāvāse nibbattati, ayaṃ ācariyānaṃ samānakathā.
atk-s0202a:29_0: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha “teneva dhammarāgenāti vacanato akusalena suddhāvāse nibbattatī”ti
atk-s0202a:29_1: so “suttaṃ āharā”ti vattabbo, addhā aññaṃ apassanto idameva āharissati, tato vattabbo
atk-s0202a:29_2: “kiṃ panidaṃ suttaṃ neyyatthaṃ nītattha”nti, addhā nītatthanti vakkhati. Tato vattabbo
atk-s0202a:29_3: – evaṃ sante anāgāmiphalatthikena samathavipassanāsu chandarāgo kattabbo bhavissati,
atk-s0202a:29_4: chandarāge uppādite anāgāmiphalaṃ paṭividdhaṃ bhavissati “mā suttaṃ me laddha”nti
atk-s0202a:29_5: yaṃ vā taṃ vā dīpehi. Pañhaṃ kathentena hi ācariyassa santike uggahetvā attharasaṃ
atk-s0202a:29_6: paṭivijjhitvā kathetuṃ vaṭṭati, akusalena hi sagge, kusalena vā apāye paṭisandhi
atk-s0202a:30_0: “Na, bhikkhave, lobhajena kammena dosajena kammena mohajena kammena devā paññāyanti,
atk-s0202a:30_1: manussā paññāyanti, yā vā panaññāpi kāci sugatiyo, atha kho, bhikkhave, lobhajena
atk-s0202a:30_2: kammena dosajena kammena mohajena kammena nirayo paññāyati, tiracchānayoni paññāyati,
atk-s0202a:30_3: pettivisayo paññāyati, yā vā panaññāpi kāci duggatiyo”ti –
atk-s0202a:31: Evaṃ paññāpetabbo. Sace sañjānāti sañjānātu, no ce sañjānāti, “gaccha pātova vihāraṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ pivāhī”ti uyyojetabbo.
atk-s0202a:32_0: Yathā ca pana imasmiṃ sutte, evaṃ mahāmālukyovādepi mahāsatipaṭṭhānepi kāyagatāsatisuttepi
atk-s0202a:32_1: samathavipassanā kathitā. Tattha imasmiṃ sutte samathavasena gacchatopi vipassanāvasena
atk-s0202a:32_2: gacchatopi samathadhurameva dhuraṃ, mahāmālukyovāde vipassanāva dhuraṃ, mahāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0202a:32_3: pana vipassanuttaraṃ nāma kathitaṃ, kāyagatāsatisuttaṃ samathuttaranti.
atk-s0202a:33_0: Ayaṃ kho gahapati…pe… ekadhammo akkhātoti ekadhammaṃ pucchitena ayampi ekadhammoti
atk-s0202a:33_1: evaṃ pucchāvasena kathitattā ekādasapi dhammā ekadhammo nāma jāto. Mahāsakuludāyisuttasmiñhi
atk-s0202a:33_2: ekūnavīsati pabbāni paṭipadāvasena ekadhammo nāma jātāni, idha ekādasapucchāvasena
atk-s0202a:33_3: ekadhammoti āgatāni. Amatuppattiyatthena vā sabbānipi ekadhammoti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a:34_0: 21. Nidhimukhaṃ gavesantoti nidhiṃ pariyesanto. Sakidevāti ekapayogena. Kathaṃ pana
atk-s0202a:34_1: ekapayogeneva ekādasannaṃ nidhīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti. Idhekacco araññe nidhiṃ gavesamāno
atk-s0202a:34_2: carati, tamenaṃ aññataro atthacarako disvā “kiṃ bho carasī”ti pucchati. So “jīvitavuttiṃ
atk-s0202a:34_3: pariyesāmī”ti āha. Itaro “tena hi samma āgaccha, etaṃ pāsāṇaṃ pavattehī”ti āha. So
atk-s0202a:34_4: taṃ pavattetvā uparūpari ṭhapitā vā kucchiyā kucchiṃ āhacca ṭhitā vā ekādasa kumbhiyo
atk-s0202a:34_5: passeyya, evaṃ ekapayogena ekādasannaṃ nidhīnaṃ adhigamo hoti.
atk-s0202a:35_0: Ācariyadhanaṃ pariyesissantīti aññatitthiyā hi yassa santike sippaṃ uggaṇhanti, tassa
atk-s0202a:35_1: sippuggahaṇato pure vā pacchā vā antarantare vā gehato nīharitvā dhanaṃ denti. Yesaṃ
atk-s0202a:35_2: gehe natthi, te ñātisabhāgato pariyesanti, tathā alabhamānā bhikkhampi caritvā dentiyeva.
atk-s0202a:36_0: Kimaṅgaṃ panāhanti bāhirakā tāva aniyyānikepi sāsane sippamattadāyakassa dhanaṃ pariyesanti;
atk-s0202a:36_1: ahaṃ pana evaṃvidhe niyyānikasāsane ekādasavidhaṃ amatuppattipaṭipadaṃ desentassa
atk-s0202a:36_2: ācariyassa pūjaṃ kiṃ na karissāmi, karissāmiyevāti vadati. Paccekadussayugena acchādesīti
atk-s0202a:36_3: ekamekassa bhikkhuno ekekaṃ dussayugamadāsīti attho. Samudācāravacanaṃ panettha evarūpaṃ
atk-s0202a:36_4: hoti, tasmā acchādesīti vuttaṃ. Pañcasatavihāranti pañcasatagghanikaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0202a:40_0: 22. Evaṃ me sutanti sekhasuttaṃ. Tattha navaṃ santhāgāranti adhunā kāritaṃ santhāgāraṃ,
atk-s0202a:40_1: ekā mahāsālāti attho. Uyyogakālādīsu hi rājāno tattha ṭhatvā “ettakā purato gacchantu,
atk-s0202a:40_2: ettakā pacchā, ettakā ubhohi passehi, ettakā hatthīsu abhiruhantu, ettakā assesu,
atk-s0202a:40_3: ettakā rathesu tiṭṭhantū”ti evaṃ santhaṃ karonti, mariyādaṃ bandhanti, tasmā taṃ
atk-s0202a:40_4: ṭhānaṃ santhāgāranti vuccati. Uyyogaṭṭhānato ca āgantvā yāva gehesu allagomayaparibhaṇḍādīni
atk-s0202a:40_5: karonti, tāva dve tīṇi divasāni te rājāno tattha santhambhantītipi santhāgāraṃ. Tesaṃ
atk-s0202a:40_6: rājūnaṃ saha atthānusāsanaṃ agārantipi santhāgāraṃ gaṇarājāno hi te, tasmā uppannakiccaṃ
atk-s0202a:40_7: ekassa vasena na chijjati, sabbesaṃ chando laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā sabbe tattha sannipatitvā
atk-s0202a:40_8: anusāsanti. Tena vuttaṃ “saha atthānusāsanaṃ agārantipi santhāgāra”nti. Yasmā panete
atk-s0202a:40_9: tattha sannipatitvā “imasmiṃ kāle kasituṃ vaṭṭati, imasmiṃ kāle vapitu”nti evamādinā
atk-s0202a:40_10: nayena gharāvāsakiccāni sammantayanti, tasmā chiddāvachiddaṃ gharāvāsaṃ tattha santharantītipi
atk-s0202a:40_12: devavimānaṃ viya adhunā niṭṭhāpitaṃ. Samaṇena vāti ettha yasmā gharavatthupariggahakāleyeva
atk-s0202a:40_13: devatā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gaṇhanti, tasmā “devena vā”ti avatvā “samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena
atk-s0202a:41_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti santhāgāraṃ niṭṭhitanti sutvā “gacchāma, naṃ passissāmā”ti
atk-s0202a:41_1: gantvā dvārakoṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ oloketvā “idaṃ santhāgāraṃ devavimānasadisaṃ
atk-s0202a:41_2: ativiya manoramaṃ sassirikaṃ kena paṭhamaṃ paribhuttaṃ amhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya
atk-s0202a:41_3: sukhāya assā”ti cintetvā “amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭhassa paṭhamaṃ diyyamānepi satthunova anucchavikaṃ,
atk-s0202a:41_4: dakkhiṇeyyavasena diyyamānepi satthunova anucchavikaṃ, tasmā paṭhamaṃ satthāraṃ paribhuñjāpessāma,
atk-s0202a:41_5: bhikkhusaṅghassa āgamanaṃ karissāma, bhikkhusaṅghe āgate tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0202a:41_6: āgatameva bhavissati, satthāraṃ tiyāmarattiṃ amhākaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathāpessāma, iti
atk-s0202a:41_7: tīhi ratanehi paribhuttaṃ mayaṃ pacchā paribhuñjissāma, evaṃ no dīgharattaṃ hitāya
atk-s0202a:42_0: Yena santhāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti taṃ divasaṃ kira santhāgāraṃ kiñcāpi rājakulānaṃ
atk-s0202a:42_1: dassanatthāya devavimānaṃ viya susajjitaṃ hoti supaṭijaggitaṃ, buddhārahaṃ pana katvā
atk-s0202a:42_2: appaññattaṃ. Buddhā hi nāma araññajjhāsayā araññārāmā antogāme vaseyyuṃ vā no vā,
atk-s0202a:42_3: tasmā bhagavato manaṃ jānitvāva paññāpessāmāti cintetvā te bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0202a:42_4: Idāni pana manaṃ labhitvā paññāpetukāmā yena santhāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0202a:43_0: Sabbasanthariṃ santhāgāraṃ santharitvāti yathā sabbameva santhataṃ hoti, evaṃ taṃ
atk-s0202a:43_1: santharāpetvā. Sabbapaṭhamaṃ tāva “gomayaṃ nāma sabbamaṅgalesu vaṭṭatī”ti sudhāparikammakatampi
atk-s0202a:43_2: bhūmiṃ allagomayena opuñchāpetvā parisukkhabhāvaṃ ñatvā yathā akkantaṭṭhāne padaṃ
atk-s0202a:43_3: na paññāyati, evaṃ catujjātiyagandhehi limpāpetvā upari nānāvaṇṇe kaṭasārake santharitvā
atk-s0202a:43_5: nānāvaṇṇehi attharaṇehi santharitabbakayuttaṃ sabbokāsaṃ santharāpesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0202a:44_0: Āsanāni paññāpetvāti majjhaṭṭhāne tāva maṅgalatthambhaṃ nissāya mahārahaṃ buddhāsanaṃ
atk-s0202a:44_1: paññāpetvā tattha yaṃ yaṃ mudukañca manoramañca paccattharaṇaṃ, taṃ taṃ paccattharitvā
atk-s0202a:44_2: bhagavato lohitakaṃ manuññadassanaṃ upadhānaṃ upadahitvā upari suvaṇṇarajatatārakavicittaṃ
atk-s0202a:44_3: vitānaṃ bandhitvā gandhadāmapupphadāmapattadāmādīhi paccattharaṇehi alaṅkaritvā samantā
atk-s0202a:44_4: dvādasahatthaṭṭhāne pupphajālaṃ karitvā tiṃsahatthamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭasāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā
atk-s0202a:44_6: paññāpetvā upari setapaccattharaṇehi paccattharāpetvā pācīnabhittiṃ nissāya attano
atk-s0202a:44_7: attano mahāpiṭṭhikakojavake paññāpetvā haṃsalomādipūritāni upadhānāni ṭhapāpesuṃ
atk-s0202a:44_8: “evaṃ akilamamānā sabbarattiṃ dhammaṃ suṇissāmā”ti. Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “āsanāni paññāpetvā”ti.
atk-s0202a:45_0: Udakamaṇikanti mahākucchikaṃ udakacāṭiṃ. Upaṭṭhapetvāti evaṃ bhagavā ca bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-s0202a:45_1: ca yathāruciyā hatthe vā dhovissanti pāde vā, mukhaṃ vā vikkhālessantīti tesu tesu
atk-s0202a:45_2: ṭhānesu maṇivaṇṇassa udakassa pūrāpetvā vāsatthāya nānāpupphāni ceva udakavāsacuṇṇāni
atk-s0202a:45_3: ca pakkhipitvā kadalipaṇṇehi pidahitvā patiṭṭhāpesuṃ. Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “upaṭṭhapetvā”ti.
atk-s0202a:46_1: hatthe ṭhapitasuvaṇṇarajatādimayakapallakādīsu ca telappadīpaṃ jalayitvāti attho.
atk-s0202a:46_2: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti ettha pana te sakyarājāno na kevalaṃ santhāgārameva,
atk-s0202a:46_3: atha kho yojanāvaṭṭe kapilavatthusmiṃ nagaravīthiyopi sammajjāpetvā dhaje ussāpetvā
atk-s0202a:46_4: gehadvāresu puṇṇaghaṭe ca kadaliyo ca ṭhapāpetvā sakalanagaraṃ dīpamālādīhi vippakiṇṇatārakaṃ
atk-s0202a:46_5: viya katvā “khīrapāyake dārake khīraṃ pāyetha, dahare kumāre lahuṃ lahuṃ bhojetvā
atk-s0202a:46_6: sayāpetha, uccāsaddaṃ mā karittha, ajja ekarattiṃ satthā antogāme vasissati, buddhā
atk-s0202a:46_7: nāma appasaddakāmā hontī”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā sayaṃ daṇḍadīpikā ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0202a:47_0: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena yena navaṃ santhāgāraṃ
atk-s0202a:47_1: tenupasaṅkamīti. “Yassa dāni, bhante, bhagavā kālaṃ maññatī”ti evaṃ kira kāle ārocite
atk-s0202a:47_2: bhagavā lākhārasena tintarattakoviḷārapupphavaṇṇaṃ rattadupaṭṭaṃ kattariyā padumaṃ
atk-s0202a:47_3: kantanto viya saṃvidhāya timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādento nivāsetvā suvaṇṇapāmaṅgena padumakalāpaṃ
atk-s0202a:47_4: parikkhipanto viya vijjullatāsassirikaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā rattakambalena gajakumbhaṃ
atk-s0202a:47_5: pariyonaddhanto viya ratanasatubbedhe suvaṇṇagghike pavāḷajālaṃ khipamāno viya suvaṇṇacetiye
atk-s0202a:47_6: rattakambalakañcukaṃ paṭimuñcanto viya gacchantaṃ puṇṇacandaṃ rattavaṇṇavalāhakena
atk-s0202a:47_7: paṭicchādayamāno viya kañcanapabbatamatthake supakkalākhārasaṃ parisiñcanto viya
atk-s0202a:47_8: cittakūṭapabbatamatthakaṃ vijjullatāya parikkhipanto viya ca sacakkavāḷasineruyugandharaṃ
atk-s0202a:47_9: mahāpathaviṃ cāletvā gahitaṃ nigrodhapallavasamānavaṇṇaṃ rattavarapaṃsukūlaṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0202a:47_10: gandhakuṭidvārato nikkhami kañcanaguhato sīho viya udayapabbatakūṭato puṇṇacando
atk-s0202a:47_11: viya ca. Nikkhamitvā pana gandhakuṭipamukhe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0202a:48_0: Athassa kāyato meghamukhehi vijjukalāpā viya rasmiyo nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇarasadhārāparisekamañjaripattapupphaphalaviṭape
atk-s0202a:48_1: viya ārāmarukkhe kariṃsu. Tāvadeva ca attano attano pattacīvaramādāya mahābhikkhusaṅgho
atk-s0202a:48_2: bhagavantaṃ parivāresi. Te pana parivāretvā ṭhitā bhikkhū evarūpā ahesuṃ appicchā
atk-s0202a:48_3: santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā āraddhavīriyā vattāro vacanakkhamā codakā pāpagarahī
atk-s0202a:48_5: bhagavā rattakambalaparikkhitto viya suvaṇṇakkhandho rattapadumasaṇḍamajjhagatā viya
atk-s0202a:48_6: suvaṇṇanāvā pavāḷavedikāparikkhitto viya suvaṇṇapāsādo virocittha. Sāriputtamoggallānādayo
atk-s0202a:48_7: mahātherāpi naṃ meghavaṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ pārupitvā maṇivammavammikā viya mahānāgā parivārayiṃsu
atk-s0202a:48_8: vantarāgā bhinnakilesā vijaṭitajaṭā chinnabandhanā kule vā gaṇe vā alaggā.
atk-s0202a:49_0: Iti bhagavā sayaṃ vītarāgo vītarāgehi, vītadoso vītadosehi, vītamoho vītamohehi,
atk-s0202a:49_1: nittaṇho nittaṇhehi, nikkileso nikkilesehi, sayaṃ buddho bahussutabuddhehi parivārito,
atk-s0202a:49_2: pattaparivāritaṃ viya kesaraṃ, kesaraparivāritā viya kaṇṇikā, aṭṭhanāgasahassaparivārito
atk-s0202a:49_3: viya chaddanto nāgarājā, navutihaṃsasahassaparivārito viya dhataraṭṭho haṃsarājā,
atk-s0202a:49_4: senaṅgaparivārito viya cakkavatti, marugaṇaparivārito viya sakko devarājā, brahmagaṇaparivārito
atk-s0202a:49_5: viya hāritamahābrahmā, tārāgaṇaparivārito viya puṇṇacando, asamena buddhavesena aparimāṇena
atk-s0202a:50_0: Athassa puratthimakāyato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmī uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0202a:50_1: Pacchimakāyato dakkhiṇahatthato, vāmahatthato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmī uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0202a:50_2: aggahesi. Upari kesantato paṭṭhāya sabbakesāvattehi moragīvavaṇṇā rasmī uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0202a:50_3: gaganatale asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi. Heṭṭhā pādatalehi pavāḷavaṇṇā rasmī uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0202a:50_4: ghanapathaviyaṃ asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesi. Evaṃ samantā asītihatthamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0202a:50_5: chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo vijjotamānā vipphandamānā kañcanadaṇḍadīpikāhi niccharitvā
atk-s0202a:50_6: ākāsaṃ pakkhandajālā viya cātuddīpikamahāmeghato nikkhantavijjullatā viya vidhāviṃsu.
atk-s0202a:50_7: Sabbadisābhāgā suvaṇṇacampakapupphehi vikiriyamānā viya, suvaṇṇaghaṭā nikkhantasuvaṇṇarasadhārāhi
atk-s0202a:50_8: siñcamānā viya, pasāritasuvaṇṇapaṭaparikkhittā viya, verambhavātasamuṭṭhitakiṃsukakaṇikārapupphacuṇṇasamokiṇṇā viya vippakiriṃsu.
atk-s0202a:51_1: viya gaganatalaṃ, vikasitamiva padumavanaṃ, sabbapāliphullo viya yojanasatiko pāricchattako,
atk-s0202a:51_3: dvattiṃsadevarājānaṃ dvattiṃsamahābrahmānaṃ siriyā siriṃ abhibhavamānaṃ viya virocittha,
atk-s0202a:51_4: yathā taṃ dasahi pāramīhi dasahi upapāramīhi dasahi paramatthapāramīhi supūritāhi
atk-s0202a:51_5: samatiṃsapāramitāhi alaṅkataṃ. Kappasatasahasādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dinnadānaṃ
atk-s0202a:51_6: rakkhitasīlaṃ katakalyāṇakammaṃ ekasmiṃ attabhāve osaritvā vipākaṃ dātuṃ ṭhānaṃ alabhamānaṃ
atk-s0202a:51_7: sambādhapattaṃ viya ahosi. Nāvāsahassabhaṇḍaṃ ekanāvaṃ āropanakālo viya, sakaṭasahassabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0202a:51_8: ekasakaṭaṃ āropanakālo viya, pañcavīsatiyā nadīnaṃ oghassa sambhijja mukhadvāre ekato
atk-s0202a:52_0: Imāya buddhasiriyā obhāsamānassāpi ca bhagavato purato anekāni daṇḍadīpikasahassāni
atk-s0202a:52_5: amatapānaṃ viya labhiṃsu. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā padasahassena gamanavaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ
atk-s0202a:60: Unnatañca samaṃ hoti, pathavī ca acetanā.
atk-s0202a:64: Aghaṭṭayanto niyyāti, ubho jāṇū ca gopphake.
atk-s0202a:67: Uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyaṃ, disañca vidisaṃ tathā;
atk-s0202a:68: Na pekkhamāno so yāti, yugamattamhi pekkhati.
atk-s0202a:72: Tosayanto bahū satte, puraṃ seṭṭhaṃ upāgamī”ti.
atk-s0202a:73_0: Vaṇṇakālo nāma kiresa, evaṃvidhesu kālesu buddhassa sarīravaṇṇe vā guṇavaṇṇe vā dhammakathikassa
atk-s0202a:73_1: thāmoyeva pamāṇaṃ cuṇṇiyapadehi vā gāthābandhena vā yattakaṃ sakkoti, tattakaṃ vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:73_2: Dukkathitanti na vattabbaṃ. Appamāṇavaṇṇā hi buddhā, tesaṃ buddhāpi anavasesato vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0202a:73_3: vattuṃ asamatthā, pageva itarā pajāti. Iminā sirivilāsena alaṅkatappaṭiyattaṃ sakyarājapuraṃ
atk-s0202a:73_4: pavisitvā bhagavā pasannacittena janena gandhadhūmavāsacuṇṇādīhi pūjayamāno santhāgāraṃ
atk-s0202a:73_5: pāvisi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0202a:74_0: Bhagavantaṃyeva purakkhatvāti bhagavantaṃ purato katvā. Tattha bhagavā bhikkhūnañceva
atk-s0202a:74_1: upāsakānañca majjhe nisinno gandhodakena nhāpetvā dukūlacumbaṭakena vodakaṃ katvā
atk-s0202a:74_3: viya ativirocittha. Ayaṃ panettha porāṇānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanamaggo –
atk-s0202a:87_0: Kāpilavatthave sakye bahudeva rattiṃ dhammiyā kathāyāti ettha dhammī kathā nāma santhāgāraanumodanappaṭisaṃyuttā
atk-s0202a:87_1: pakiṇṇakakathā veditabbā. Tadā hi bhagavā ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya pathavojaṃ ākaḍḍhanto
atk-s0202a:87_2: viya mahājambuṃ khandhe gahetvā cālento viya yojanikaṃ madhubhaṇḍaṃ cakkayantena
atk-s0202a:87_3: pīḷetvā madhupānaṃ pāyamāno viya kāpilavatthavānaṃ sakyānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ pakiṇṇakakathaṃ
atk-s0202a:87_4: kathesi. “Āvāsadānaṃ nāmetaṃ mahārāja mahantaṃ, tumhākaṃ āvāso mayā paribhutto bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0202a:87_5: paribhutto mayā ca bhikkhusaṅghena ca paribhutto pana dhammaratanena paribhutto yevāti
atk-s0202a:87_6: tīhi ratanehi paribhutto nāma hoti. Āvāsadānasmiñhi dinne sabbadānaṃ dinnameva hoti.
atk-s0202a:87_7: Bhūmaṭṭhakapaṇṇasālāya vā sākhāmaṇḍapassa vāpi ānisaṃso nāma paricchindituṃ na sakkā”ti
atk-s0202a:89: Sarīsape ca makase, sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0202a:93: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano.
atk-s0202a:98: Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāya, parinibbāti anāsavo”ti. –
atk-s0202a:99_0: Evaṃ ayampi āvāse ānisaṃso, ayampi ānisaṃsoti bahudevarattiṃ atirekataraṃ diyaḍḍhayāmaṃ
atk-s0202a:99_1: āvāsānisaṃsakathaṃ kathesi. Tattha imā gāthāva saṅgahaṃ āruḷhā, pakiṇṇakadhammadesanā
atk-s0202a:99_2: pana saṅgahaṃ na ārohati. Sandassesītiādīni vuttatthāneva.
atk-s0202a:100_0: Āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesīti dhammakathaṃ kathāpetukāmo jānāpesi. Atha kasmā sāriputtamahāmoggallānamahākassapādīsu
atk-s0202a:100_1: asītimahātheresu vijjamānesu bhagavā ānandattherassa bhāramakāsīti. Parisajjhāsayavasena.
atk-s0202a:100_2: Āyasmā hi ānando bahussutānaṃ aggo, pahosi parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi madhuradhammakathaṃ
atk-s0202a:100_3: kathetunti sākiyamaṇḍale pākaṭo paññāto. Tassa sakyarājūhi vihāraṃ gantvāpi dhammakathā
atk-s0202a:100_4: sutapubbā, orodhā pana nesaṃ na yathāruciyā vihāraṃ gantuṃ labhanti, tesaṃ etadahosi
atk-s0202a:100_5: – “aho vata bhagavā appaṃyeva dhammakathaṃ kathetvā amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭhassa ānandassa
atk-s0202a:100_6: bhāraṃ kareyyā”ti. Tesaṃ ajjhāsayavasena bhagavā tasseva bhāramakāsi.
atk-s0202a:101_0: Sekho pāṭipadoti paṭipannako sekhasamaṇo. So tuyhaṃ paṭibhātu upaṭṭhātu, tassa paṭipadaṃ
atk-s0202a:101_1: desehīti paṭipadāya puggalaṃ niyametvā dasseti. Kasmā pana bhagavā imaṃ paṭipadaṃ
atk-s0202a:101_2: niyamesi? Bahūhi kāraṇehi. Ime tāva sakyā maṅgalasālāya maṅgalaṃ paccāsīsanti vaḍḍhiṃ
atk-s0202a:101_3: icchanti, ayañca sekhapaṭipadā mayhaṃ sāsane maṅgalapaṭipadā vaḍḍhamānakapaṭipadātipi
atk-s0202a:101_4: imaṃ paṭipadaṃ niyamesi. Tassañca parisati sekhāva bahū nisinnā, te attanā paṭividdhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0202a:101_5: kathīyamāne akilamantāva sallakkhessantītipi imaṃ paṭipadaṃ niyamesi. Āyasmā ca ānando
atk-s0202a:101_6: sekhapaṭisambhidāpattova, so attanā paṭividdhe paccakkhaṭṭhāne kathento akilamanto
atk-s0202a:101_7: viññāpetuṃ sakkhissatītipi imaṃ paṭipadaṃ niyamesi. Sekhapaṭipadāya ca tissopi sikkhā
atk-s0202a:101_8: osaṭā, tattha adhisīlasikkhāya kathitāya sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ kathitameva hoti,
atk-s0202a:101_9: adhicittasikkhāya kathitāya sakalaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ kathitaṃ hoti, adhipaññāsikkhāya
atk-s0202a:101_10: kathitāya sakalaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ kathitaṃ hoti, ānando ca bahussuto tipiṭakadharo,
atk-s0202a:101_11: so pahoti tīhi piṭakehi tisso sikkhā kathetuṃ, evaṃ kathite sakyānaṃ maṅgalameva
atk-s0202a:102_0: Piṭṭhi me āgilāyatīti kasmā āgilāyati? Bhagavato hi chabbassāni padhānaṃ padahantassa
atk-s0202a:102_1: mahantaṃ kāyadukkhaṃ ahosi, athassa aparabhāge mahallakakāle piṭṭhivāto uppajji.
atk-s0202a:102_2: Akāraṇaṃ vā etaṃ. Pahoti hi bhagavā uppannaṃ vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā ekampi dvepi sattāhe
atk-s0202a:102_3: ekapallaṅkena nisīdituṃ. Santhāgārasālaṃ pana catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuñjitukāmo
atk-s0202a:102_4: ahosi, tattha pādadhovanaṭṭhānato yāva dhammāsanā agamāsi, ettake ṭhāne gamanaṃ nipphannaṃ.
atk-s0202a:102_5: Dhammāsanaṃ patto thokaṃ ṭhatvā nisīdi, ettake ṭhānaṃ. Diyaḍḍhayāmaṃ dhammāsane nisīdi,
atk-s0202a:102_6: ettake ṭhāne nisajjā nipphannā. Idāni dakkhiṇena passena thokaṃ nipanne sayanaṃ nipphajjissatīti
atk-s0202a:102_7: evaṃ catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuñjitukāmo ahosi. Upādinnakasarīrañca nāma “no āgilāyatī”ti
atk-s0202a:102_8: na vattabbaṃ, tasmā ciraṃ nisajjāya sañjātaṃ appakampi āgilāyanaṃ gahetvā evamāha.
atk-s0202a:103_0: Saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvāti santhāgārassa kira ekapasse te rājāno paṭṭasāṇiṃ parikkhipāpetvā
atk-s0202a:103_2: vitānaṃ bandhitvā gandhatelappadīpaṃ āropayiṃsu “appeva nāma satthā dhammāsanato
atk-s0202a:103_3: vuṭṭhāya thokaṃ vissamanto idha nipajjeyya, evaṃ no imaṃ santhāgāraṃ bhagavatā catūhi
atk-s0202a:103_4: iriyāpathehi paribhuttaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti. Satthāpi tadeva
atk-s0202a:103_5: sandhāya tattha saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā nipajji. Uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasi karitvāti ettakaṃ
atk-s0202a:103_6: kālaṃ atikkamitvā vuṭṭhahissāmīti vuṭṭhānasaññaṃ citte ṭhapetvā.
atk-s0202a:104_0: 23. Mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ āmantesīti so kira tasmiṃ kāle tassaṃ parisati jeṭṭhako pāmokkho,
atk-s0202a:104_1: tasmiṃ saṅgahite sesaparisā saṅgahitāva hotīti thero tameva āmantesi. Sīlasampannoti
atk-s0202a:104_2: sīlena sampanno, sampannasīlo paripuṇṇasīloti attho. Saddhammehīti sundaradhammehi,
atk-s0202a:105_0: 24. Kathañca mahānāmāti iminā ettakena ṭhānena sekhapaṭipadāya mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0202a:105_1: vitthāretukāmo evamāha. Tattha sīlasampannotiādīni “sampannasīlā, bhikkhave, viharathā”ti
atk-s0202a:106_1: hiriyati jigucchatīti attho. Ottappaniddese hetvatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, kāyaduccaritādīhi
atk-s0202a:106_2: ottappassa hetubhūtehi ottappati bhāyatīti attho. Āraddhavīriyoti paggahitavīriyo
atk-s0202a:106_3: anosakkitamānaso. Pahānāyāti pahānatthāya. Upasampadāyāti paṭilābhatthāya. Thāmavāti
atk-s0202a:106_4: vīriyathāmena samannāgato. Daḷhaparakkamoti thiraparakkamo. Anikkhittadhuro kusalesu
atk-s0202a:106_5: dhammesūti kusalesu dhammesu anoropitadhuro anosakkitavīriyo. Paramenāti uttamena.
atk-s0202a:106_6: Satinepakkenāti satiyā ca nipakabhāvena ca. Kasmā pana satibhājaniye paññā āgatāti?
atk-s0202a:106_7: Satiyā balavabhāvadīpanatthaṃ. Paññāvippayuttā hi sati dubbalā hoti, sampayuttā balavatīti.
atk-s0202a:107_0: Cirakatampīti attanā vā parena vā kāyena cirakataṃ cetiyaṅgaṇavattādi asīti mahāvattapaṭipattipūraṇaṃ.
atk-s0202a:107_1: Cirabhāsitampīti attanā vā parena vā vācāya cirabhāsitaṃ sakkaccaṃ uddisana-uddisāpana-dhammosāraṇa-dhammadesanā-upanisinnakathā-anumodaniyādivasena
atk-s0202a:107_2: pavattitaṃ vacīkammaṃ. Saritā anussaritāti tasmiṃ kāyena cirakate “kāyo nāma kāyaviññatti,
atk-s0202a:107_3: cirabhāsite vācā nāma vacīviññatti. Tadubhayampi rūpaṃ, taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā cittacetasikā
atk-s0202a:107_4: arūpaṃ. Iti ime rūpārūpadhammā evaṃ uppajjitvā evaṃ niruddhā”ti sarati ceva anussarati
atk-s0202a:107_5: ca, satisambojjhaṅgaṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti attho. Bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpikā hi sati idha adhippetā.
atk-s0202a:107_6: Tāya satiyā esa sakimpi saraṇena saritā, punappunaṃ saraṇena anussaritāti veditabbā.
atk-s0202a:108_0: Udayatthagāminiyāti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayavayagāminiyā udayañca vayañca paṭivijjhituṃ
atk-s0202a:108_1: samatthāya. Ariyāyāti vikkhambhanavasena ca samucchedavasena ca kilesehi ārakā ṭhitāya
atk-s0202a:108_2: parisuddhāya. Paññāya samannāgatoti vipassanāpaññāya ceva maggapaññāya ca samaṅgībhūto.
atk-s0202a:108_3: Nibbedhikāyāti sāyeva nibbijjhanato nibbedhikāti vuccati, tāya samannāgatoti attho.
atk-s0202a:108_4: Tattha maggapaññāya samucchedavasena anibbiddhapubbaṃ apadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhaṃ
atk-s0202a:108_5: dosakkhandhaṃ mohakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhati padāletīti nibbedhikā. Vipassanāpaññāya tadaṅgavasena
atk-s0202a:108_6: nibbedhikāya maggapaññāya paṭilābhasaṃvattanato cāti vipassanā “nibbedhikā”ti vattuṃ
atk-s0202a:108_7: vaṭṭati. Sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyāti idhāpi maggapaññā “sammā hetunā nayena vaṭṭadukkhaṃ
atk-s0202a:108_8: khepayamānā gacchatīti sammā dukkhakkhayagāminī nāma. Vipassanā tadaṅgavasena vaṭṭadukkhañca
atk-s0202a:108_9: kilesadukkhañca khepayamānā gacchatīti dukkhakkhayagāminī. Dukkhakkhayagāminiyā vā
atk-s0202a:109_0: 26. Abhicetasikānanti abhicittaṃ seṭṭhacittaṃ sitānaṃ nissitānaṃ. Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānanti
atk-s0202a:109_2: Akicchalābhīti nidukkhalābhī. Akasiralābhīti vipulalābhī. Paguṇabhāvena eko icchiticchitakkhaṇe
atk-s0202a:109_3: samāpajjituṃ sakkoti, samādhipāripanthikadhamme pana akilamanto vikkhambhetuṃ na
atk-s0202a:109_4: sakkoti, so attano anicchāya khippameva vuṭṭhāti, yathāparicchedavasena samāpattiṃ
atk-s0202a:109_5: ṭhapetuṃ na sakkoti ayaṃ kicchalābhī kasiralābhī nāma. Eko icchiticchitakkhaṇe ca
atk-s0202a:109_6: samāpajjituṃ sakkoti, samādhipāripanthikadhamme ca akilamanto vikkhambheti, so yathāparicchedavaseneva
atk-s0202a:109_7: vuṭṭhātuṃ sakkoti, ayaṃ akicchalābhī akasiralābhī nāma.
atk-s0202a:110_0: 27. Ayaṃ vuccati mahānāma ariyasāvako sekho pāṭipadoti mahānāma ariyasāvako sekho
atk-s0202a:110_1: pāṭipado vipassanāgabbhāya vaḍḍhamānakapaṭipadāya samannāgatoti vuccatīti dasseti.
atk-s0202a:110_3: bhabbo. Sambodhāyāti ariyamaggāya. Anuttarassa yogakkhemassāti arahattaṃ anuttaro
atk-s0202a:110_4: yogakkhemo nāma, tadabhigamāya bhabboti dasseti. Yā panāyamettha atthadīpanatthaṃ
atk-s0202a:110_5: upamā āhaṭā, sā cetokhilasutte vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Kevalañhi tattha “tassā kukkuṭiyā
atk-s0202a:110_6: aṇḍesu tividhakiriyakaraṇaṃ viya hi imassa bhikkhuno ussoḷhipannarasehi aṅgehi samannāgatabhāvo”ti
atk-s0202a:110_7: yaṃ evaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ āgataṃ, taṃ idha evaṃ sīlasampanno hotītiādivacanato “tassā
atk-s0202a:110_8: kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyakaraṇaṃ viya imassa bhikkhuno sīlasampannatādīhi pannarasehi
atk-s0202a:110_9: dhammehi samaṅgibhāvo”ti. Evaṃ yojetvā veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha vuttasadisameva.
atk-s0202a:111_0: 28. Imaṃyeva anuttaraṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhinti imaṃ paṭhamādijjhānehi asadisaṃ uttamaṃ
atk-s0202a:111_2: Dutiyādīsupi eseva nayo. Kukkuṭacchāpako pana ekavāraṃ mātukucchito ekavāraṃ aṇḍakosatoti
atk-s0202a:111_3: dve vāre jāyati. Ariyasāvako tīhi vijjāhi tāyo vāre jāyati. Pubbenivāsacchādakaṃ
atk-s0202a:111_4: tamaṃ vinodetvā pubbenivāsañāṇena paṭhamaṃ jāyati, sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhicchādakaṃ
atk-s0202a:111_5: tamaṃ vinodetvā dibbacakkhuñāṇena dutiyaṃ jāyati, catusaccapaṭicchādakaṃ tamaṃ vinodetvā
atk-s0202a:112_0: 29. Idampissa hoti caraṇasminti idampi sīlaṃ assa bhikkhuno caraṇaṃ nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0202a:112_1: Caraṇaṃ nāma bahu anekavidhaṃ, sīlādayo pannarasadhammā, tattha idampi ekaṃ caraṇanti
atk-s0202a:112_2: attho. Padattho pana carati tena agatapubbaṃ disaṃ gacchatīti caraṇaṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0202a:113_0: Idampissa hoti vijjāyāti idaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ tassa vijjā nāma hotīti attho. Vijjā
atk-s0202a:113_1: nāma bahu anekavidhā, vipassanañāṇādīni aṭṭha ñāṇāni, tattha idampi ñāṇaṃ ekā vijjātipi
atk-s0202a:113_2: attho. Padattho pana vinivijjhitvā etāya jānātīti vijjā. Esa nayo sabbattha. Vijjāsampanno
atk-s0202a:113_3: itipīti tīhi vijjāhi vijjāsampanno itipi. Caraṇasampanno itipīti pañcadasahi dhammehi
atk-s0202a:113_4: caraṇasampanno itipi. Tadubhayena pana vijjācaraṇasampanno itipīti.
atk-s0202a:114_0: 30. Sanaṅkumārenāti porāṇakakumārena, cirakālato paṭṭhāya kumāroti paññātena. So
atk-s0202a:114_1: kira manussapathe pañcacūḷakakumārakakāle jhānaṃ nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmaloke
atk-s0202a:114_2: nibbatti, tassa so attabhāvo piyo ahosi manāpo, tasmā tādiseneva attabhāvena carati,
atk-s0202a:114_3: tena naṃ sanaṅkumāroti sañjānanti. Janetasminti janitasmiṃ, pajāyāti attho. Ye gottapaṭisārinoti
atk-s0202a:114_4: ye janetasmiṃ gottaṃ paṭisaranti “ahaṃ gotamo, ahaṃ kassapo”ti, tesu loke gottapaṭisārīsu
atk-s0202a:114_5: khattiyo seṭṭho. Anumatā bhagavatāti mama pañhabyākaraṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā desitāti
atk-s0202a:114_6: ambaṭṭhasutte buddhena bhagavatā “ahampi, ambaṭṭha, evaṃ vadāmi –
atk-s0202a:117_0: Evaṃ bhāsantena anuññātā anumoditā. Sādhu sādhu ānandāti, bhagavā kira ādito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0202a:117_1: niddaṃ anokkamantova imaṃ suttaṃ sutvā ānandena sekhapaṭipadāya kūṭaṃ gahitanti ñatvā
atk-s0202a:117_2: uṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno sādhukāraṃ adāsi. Ettāvatā ca pana idaṃ suttaṃ
atk-s0202a:117_3: jinabhāsitaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0202a:121_0: 31. Evaṃ me sutanti potaliyasuttaṃ. Tattha aṅguttarāpesūti aṅgāyeva so janapado,
atk-s0202a:121_1: mahiyā panassa uttarena yā āpo, tāsaṃ avidūrattā uttarāpotipi vuccati. Kataramahiyā
atk-s0202a:121_2: uttarena yā āpoti, mahāmahiyā. Tatthāyaṃ āvibhāvakathā – ayaṃ kira jambudīpo dasasahassayojanaparimāṇo.
atk-s0202a:121_3: Tattha ca catusahassayojanappamāṇo padeso udakena ajjhotthaṭo samuddoti saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0202a:121_4: Tisahassayojanappamāṇe manussā vasanti. Tisahassayojanappamāṇe himavā patiṭṭhito
atk-s0202a:121_6: yattha āyāmavitthārena ceva gambhīratāya ca paṇṇāsapaṇṇāsayojanā diyaḍḍhayojanasataparimaṇḍalā
atk-s0202a:121_7: anotattadaho kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho mandākinīdaho
atk-s0202a:121_8: sīhapapātadahoti satta mahāsarā patiṭṭhitā. Tesu anotattadaho sudassanakūṭaṃ citrakūṭaṃ
atk-s0202a:121_9: kāḷakūṭaṃ gandhamādanakūṭaṃ kelāsakūṭanti imehi pañcahi pabbatehi parikkhitto.
atk-s0202a:122_0: Tattha sudassanakūṭaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ dviyojanasatubbedhaṃ antovaṅkaṃ kākamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ
atk-s0202a:122_1: tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṃ. Citrakūṭaṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ. Kāḷakūṭaṃ añjanamayaṃ.
atk-s0202a:122_2: Gandhamādanakūṭaṃ sānumayaṃ abbhantare muggavaṇṇaṃ, mūlagandho sāragandho pheggugandho
atk-s0202a:122_3: tacagandho papaṭikagandho rasagandho pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho gandhagandhoti
atk-s0202a:122_4: imehi dasahi gandhehi ussannaṃ nānappakāraosadhasañchannaṃ, kāḷapakkhauposathadivase
atk-s0202a:122_5: ādittamiva aṅgāraṃ jalantaṃ tiṭṭhati. Kelāsakūṭaṃ rajatamayaṃ. Sabbāni sudassanena
atk-s0202a:122_6: samānubbedhasaṇṭhānāni, tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni. Tāni sabbāni devānubhāvena
atk-s0202a:122_7: nāgānubhāvena ca vassanti, nadiyo ca tesu sandanti. Taṃ sabbampi udakaṃ anotattameva
atk-s0202a:122_8: pavisati. Candimasūriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbatantarena tattha
atk-s0202a:122_9: obhāsaṃ karonti, ujuṃ gacchantā na karonti, tenevassa anotattanti saṅkhā udapādi.
atk-s0202a:123_1: supaṭiyattāni honti, yesu buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavā ca iddhimanto ca isayo nhāyanti,
atk-s0202a:124_0: Tassa catūsu passesu sīhamukhaṃ hatthimukhaṃ assamukhaṃ usabhamukhanti cattāri mukhāni
atk-s0202a:124_1: honti, yehi catasso nadiyo sandanti. Sīhamukhena nikkhantanadītīre sīhā bahutarā
atk-s0202a:124_2: honti. Hatthimukhādīhi hatthiassausabhā. Puratthimadisato nikkhantanadī anotattaṃ
atk-s0202a:124_3: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā itarā tisso nadiyo anupagamma pācīnahimavanteneva amanussapathaṃ
atk-s0202a:124_4: gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavisati. Pacchimadisato ca uttaradisato ca nikkhantanadiyopi
atk-s0202a:124_5: tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pacchimahimavanteneva uttarahimavanteneva ca amanussapathaṃ
atk-s0202a:124_6: gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavisanti. Dakkhiṇadisato nikkhantanadī pana taṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0202a:124_7: katvā dakkhiṇena ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭheneva saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā pabbataṃ paharitvā
atk-s0202a:124_8: vuṭṭhāya parikkhepena tigāvutappamāṇā udakadhārā ca hutvā ākāsena saṭṭhiyojanāni
atk-s0202a:124_9: gantvā tiyaggaḷe nāma pāsāṇe patitā, pāsāṇo udakadhārāvegena bhinno. Tattha paññāsayojanappamāṇā
atk-s0202a:124_10: tiyaggaḷā nāma pokkharaṇī jātā, pokkharaṇiyā kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhiyojanāni
atk-s0202a:124_11: gatā. Tato ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā umaṅgena saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā viñjhuṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ
atk-s0202a:124_12: paharitvā hatthatale pañcaṅgulisadisā pañcadhārā hutvā pavattanti. Sā tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0202a:124_13: anotattaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gataṭṭhāne āvaṭṭagaṅgāti vuccati. Ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhena
atk-s0202a:124_14: saṭṭhiyojanāni gataṭṭhāne kaṇhagaṅgāti, ākāsena saṭṭhiyojanāni gataṭṭhāne ākāsagaṅgāti,
atk-s0202a:124_15: tiyaggaḷapāsāṇe paññāsayojanokāse ṭhitā tiyaggaḷapokkharaṇīti, kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ
atk-s0202a:124_16: pavisitvā saṭṭhiyojanāni gataṭṭhāne bahalagaṅgāti, umaṅgena saṭṭhiyojanāni gataṭṭhāne
atk-s0202a:124_17: umaṅgagaṅgāti vuccati. Viñjhuṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā pañcadhārā hutvā
atk-s0202a:124_18: pavattaṭṭhāne pana gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahīti pañcadhā saṅkhaṃ gatā. Evametā
atk-s0202a:124_19: pañca mahānadiyo himavantato pabhavanti. Tāsu yā ayaṃ pañcamī mahī nāma, sā idha
atk-s0202a:124_20: mahāmahīti adhippetā. Tassā uttarena yā āpo, tāsaṃ avidūrattā so janapado aṅguttarāpoti
atk-s0202a:125_0: Āpaṇaṃ nāmāti tasmiṃ kira nigame vīsati āpaṇamukhasahassāni vibhattāni ahesuṃ. Iti
atk-s0202a:125_1: so āpaṇānaṃ ussannattā āpaṇantveva saṅkhaṃ gato. Tassa ca nigamassa avidūre nadītīre
atk-s0202a:125_2: ghanacchāyo ramaṇīyo bhūmibhāgo mahāvanasaṇḍo, tasmiṃ bhagavā viharati. Tenevettha
atk-s0202a:125_3: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ na niyāmitanti veditabbaṃ. Yenaññataro vanasaṇḍo tenupasaṅkamīti bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0202a:125_4: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pesetvā ekakova upasaṅkami potaliyaṃ gahapatiṃ sandhāya. Potaliyopi
atk-s0202a:125_5: kho gahapatīti potaliyoti evaṃnāmako gahapati. Sampannanivāsanapāvuraṇoti paripuṇṇanivāsanapāvuraṇo,
atk-s0202a:125_6: ekaṃ dīghadasaṃ sāṭakaṃ nivattho ekaṃ pārutoti attho. Chattupāhanāhīti chattaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0202a:125_7: upāhanā āruyhāti attho. Āsanānīti pallaṅkapīṭhapalālapīṭhakādīni. Antamaso sākhābhaṅgampi
atk-s0202a:125_8: hi āsananteva vuccati. Gahapativādenāti gahapatīti iminā vacanena. Samudācaratīti voharati.
atk-s0202a:126_0: Bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti tatiyaṃ gahapatīti vacanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto bhagavantametaṃ
atk-s0202a:126_1: “tayidaṃ, bho, gotamā”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Tattha nacchannanti na anucchavikaṃ. Nappatirūpanti
atk-s0202a:126_3: hi sabbāneva gihibyañjanāni tassa gihibhāvaṃ pākaṭaṃ karontīti ākārā, gihisaṇṭhānena
atk-s0202a:126_4: saṇṭhitattā liṅgā, gihibhāvassa sañjānananimittatāya nimittāti vuttā. Yathā taṃ gahapatissāti
atk-s0202a:126_5: yathā gahapatissa ākāraliṅganimittā bhaveyyuṃ, tatheva tuyhaṃ. Tena tāhaṃ evaṃ samudācarāmīti
atk-s0202a:126_6: dasseti. Atha so yena kāraṇena gahapativādaṃ nādhivāseti, taṃ pakāsento “tathā hi pana me”tiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:127_0: Niyyātanti niyyātitaṃ. Anovādī anupavādīti “tātā, kasatha, vapatha, vaṇippathaṃ payojethā”tiādinā
atk-s0202a:127_1: hi nayena ovadanto ovādī nāma hoti. “Tumhe na kasatha, na vapatha, na vaṇippathaṃ
atk-s0202a:127_2: payojetha, kathaṃ jīvissatha, puttadāraṃ vā bharissathā”tiādinā nayena pana upavadanto
atk-s0202a:127_3: upavādī nāma hoti. Ahaṃ pana ubhayampi taṃ na karomi. Tenāhaṃ tattha anovādī anupavādīti
atk-s0202a:127_4: dasseti. Ghāsacchādanaparamo viharāmīti ghāsamattañceva acchādanamattañca paramaṃ
atk-s0202a:127_5: katvā viharāmi, tato paraṃ natthi, na ca patthemīti dīpeti.
atk-s0202a:128_0: 32. Giddhilobho pahātabboti gedhabhūto lobho pahātabbo. Anindārosanti anindābhūtaṃ
atk-s0202a:128_1: aghaṭṭanaṃ. Nindārosoti nindāghaṭṭanā. Vohārasamucchedāyāti ettha vohāroti byavahāravohāropi
atk-s0202a:130: Evaṃ vāseṭṭha jānāhi, vāṇijo so na brāhmaṇo”ti. –
atk-s0202a:131_0: Ayaṃ byavahāravohāro nāma. “Saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro”ti ayaṃ paṇṇattivohāro
atk-s0202a:131_1: nāma. “Tathā tathā voharati aparāmasa”nti ayaṃ vacanavohāro nāma. “Aṭṭha ariyavohārā
atk-s0202a:131_2: aṭṭha anariyavoharā”ti ayaṃ cetanāvohāro nāma, ayamidhādhippeto. Yasmā vā pabbajitakālato
atk-s0202a:131_3: paṭṭhāya gihīti cetanā natthi, samaṇoti cetanā hoti. Gihīti vacanaṃ natthi, samaṇoti
atk-s0202a:131_4: vacanaṃ hoti. Gihīti paṇṇatti natthi, samaṇoti paṇṇatti hoti. Gihīti byavahāro natthi,
atk-s0202a:131_5: samaṇoti vā pabbajitoti vā byavahāro hoti. Tasmā sabbepete labbhanti.
atk-s0202a:132_0: 33. Yesaṃ kho ahaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ hetu pāṇātipātīti ettha pāṇātipātova saṃyojanaṃ.
atk-s0202a:132_1: Pāṇātipātasseva hi hetu pāṇātipātapaccayā pāṇātipātī nāma hoti. Pāṇātipātānaṃ pana
atk-s0202a:132_2: bahutāya “yesaṃ kho aha”nti vuttaṃ. Tesāhaṃ saṃyojanānanti tesaṃ ahaṃ pāṇātipātabandhanānaṃ.
atk-s0202a:132_3: Pahānāya samucchedāya paṭipannoti iminā apāṇātipātasaṅkhātena kāyikasīlasaṃvarena
atk-s0202a:132_4: pahānatthāya samucchedanatthāya paṭipanno. Attāpi maṃ upavadeyyāti kunthakipillikampi
atk-s0202a:132_5: nāma jīvitā avoropanakasāsane pabbajitvā pāṇātipātamattatopi oramituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0202a:132_6: kiṃ mayhaṃ pabbajjāyāti evaṃ attāpi maṃ upavadeyya. Anuviccāpi maṃ viññū garaheyyunti
atk-s0202a:132_7: evarūpe nāma sāsane pabbajitvā pāṇātipātamattatopi oramituṃ na sakkoti, kiṃ etassa
atk-s0202a:132_8: pabbajjāyāti evaṃ anuvicca tulayitvā pariyogāhetvā aññepi viññū paṇḍitā garaheyyuṃ.
atk-s0202a:132_9: Etadeva kho pana saṃyojanametaṃ nīvaraṇanti dasasu saṃyojanesu pañcasu ca nīvaraṇesu
atk-s0202a:132_10: apariyāpannampi “aṭṭha nīvaraṇā”ti desanāvasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Vaṭṭabandhanaṭṭhena hi
atk-s0202a:132_11: hitapaṭicchādanaṭṭhena ca saṃyojanantipi nīvaraṇantipi vuttaṃ. Āsavāti pāṇātipātakāraṇā
atk-s0202a:132_12: eko avijjāsavo uppajjati. Vighātapariḷāhāti vighātā ca pariḷāhā ca. Tattha vighātaggahaṇena
atk-s0202a:132_13: kilesadukkhañca vipākadukkhañca gahitaṃ, pariḷāhaggahaṇenapi kilesapariḷāho ca vipākapariḷāho
atk-s0202a:132_14: ca gahito. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0202a:133_0: 34-40. Ayaṃ pana viseso – tesāhaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāyāti imasmiṃ pade iminā dinnādānasaṅkhātena
atk-s0202a:133_4: mānasikasīlasaṃvarena pahānatthāya samucchedanatthāya paṭipannoti evaṃ sabbavāresu yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0202a:134_0: Attāpi maṃ upavadeyya anuviccāpi maṃ viññū garaheyyunti imesu pana padesu tiṇasalākampi
atk-s0202a:134_1: nāma upādāya adinnaṃ aggahaṇasāsane pabbajitvā adinnādānamattatopi viramituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0202a:134_2: kiṃ mayhaṃ pabbajjāyāti evaṃ attāpi maṃ upavadeyya. Evarūpe nāma sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0202a:134_3: adinnādānamattatopi oramituṃ na sakkoti, kiṃ imassa pabbajjāyāti evaṃ anuviccāpi
atk-s0202a:134_4: maṃ viññū garaheyyuṃ? Hasāpekkhatāyapi nāma davakamyatāya vā musāvādaṃ akaraṇasāsane
atk-s0202a:134_5: pabbajitvā. Sabbākārena pisuṇaṃ akaraṇasāsane nāma pabbajitvā. Appamattakampi giddhilobhaṃ
atk-s0202a:134_6: akaraṇasāsane nāma pabbajitvāpi. Kakacena aṅgesu okkantiyamānesupi nāma paresaṃ nindārosaṃ
atk-s0202a:134_7: akaraṇasāsane pabbajitvā. Chinnakhāṇukaṇṭakādīsupi nāma kodhupāyāsaṃ akaraṇasāsane
atk-s0202a:134_8: pabbajitvā. Adhimānamattampi nāma mānaṃ akaraṇasāsane pabbajitvā atimānamattampi
atk-s0202a:134_9: pajahituṃ na sakkomi, kiṃ mayhaṃ pabbajjāyāti evaṃ attāpi maṃ upavadeyya. Evarūpe
atk-s0202a:134_10: nāma sāsane pabbajitvā atimānamattampi pajahituṃ na sakkoti, kiṃ imassa pabbajjāyāti
atk-s0202a:134_11: evaṃ anuviccāpi maṃ viññū garaheyyunti evaṃ sabbavāresu yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0202a:135_0: Āsavāti imasmiṃ pana pade adinnādānakāraṇā kāmāsavo diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavoti tayo
atk-s0202a:135_1: āsavā uppajjanti, tathā musāvādakāraṇā pisuṇāvācākāraṇā ca, giddhilobhakāraṇā diṭṭhāsavo
atk-s0202a:135_2: avijjāsavo ca, nindārosakāraṇā avijjāsavova, tathā kodhupāyāsakāraṇā, atimānakāraṇā
atk-s0202a:135_3: bhavāsavo avijjāsavo cāti dveva āsavā uppajjantīti evaṃ āsavuppatti veditabbā.
atk-s0202a:136_0: Imesu pana aṭṭhasupi vāresu asammohatthaṃ puna ayaṃ saṅkhepavinicchayo – purimesu
atk-s0202a:136_1: tāva catūsu viramituṃ na sakkomīti vattabbaṃ, pacchimesu pajahituṃ na sakkomīti.
atk-s0202a:136_2: Pāṇātipātanindārosakodhupāyāsesu ca eko avijjāsavova hoti, adinnādānamusāvādapisuṇāvācāsu
atk-s0202a:136_3: kāmāsavo diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo, giddhilobhe diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo, atimāne bhavāsavo
atk-s0202a:136_4: avijjāsavo, apāṇātipātaṃ dinnādānaṃ kāyikaṃ sīlaṃ, amusā apisuṇaṃ vācasikasīlaṃ,
atk-s0202a:136_5: ṭhapetvā anindārosaṃ sesāni tīṇi mānasikasīlāni. Yasmā pana kāyenapi ghaṭṭeti roseti
atk-s0202a:136_6: vācāyapi, tasmā anindāroso dve ṭhānāni yāti, kāyikasīlampi hoti vācasikasīlampi.
atk-s0202a:136_7: Ettāvatā kiṃ kathitaṃ? Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ. Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhitassa ca
atk-s0202a:138_0: 42. Vitthāradesanāyaṃ tamenaṃ dakkhoti padassa upasumbheyyāti iminā saddhiṃ sambandho
atk-s0202a:138_1: veditabbo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti, tamenaṃ kukkuraṃ upasumbheyya, tassa samīpe khipeyyāti
atk-s0202a:138_2: attho. Aṭṭhikaṅkalanti uraṭṭhiṃ vā piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ vā sīsaṭṭhiṃ vā. Tañhi nimmaṃsattā
atk-s0202a:138_3: kaṅkalanti vuccati. Sunikkantaṃ nikkantanti yathā sunikkantaṃ hoti, evaṃ nikkantaṃ
atk-s0202a:138_4: nillikhitaṃ, yadettha allīnamaṃsaṃ atthi, taṃ sabbaṃ nillikhitvā aṭṭhimattameva katanti
atk-s0202a:138_5: attho. Tenevāha “nimmaṃsa”nti. Lohitaṃ pana makkhitvā tiṭṭhati, tena vuttaṃ “lohitamakkhita”nti.
atk-s0202a:139_0: Bahudukkhā bahupāyāsāti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikehi dukkhehi bahudukkhā, upāyāsasaṃkilesehi
atk-s0202a:139_1: bahupāyāsā. Yāyaṃ upekkhā nānattā nānattasitāti yā ayaṃ pañcakāmaguṇārammaṇavasena
atk-s0202a:139_2: nānāsabhāvā, tāneva ca ārammaṇāni nissitattā “nānattasitā”ti vuccati pañcakāmaguṇūpekkhā,
atk-s0202a:139_3: taṃ abhinivajjetvā. Ekattā ekattasitāti catutthajjhānupekkhā, sā hi divasampi ekasmiṃ
atk-s0202a:139_4: ārammaṇe uppajjanato ekasabhāvā, tadeva ekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ nissitattā ekattasitā nāma.
atk-s0202a:139_5: Yattha sabbaso lokāmisūpādānā aparisesā nirujjhantīti yattha catutthajjhānupekkhāyaṃ
atk-s0202a:139_6: yaṃ upekkhaṃ āgamma yaṃ paṭicca sabbena sabbaṃ aparisesā lokāmisasaṅkhātā pañcakāmaguṇāmisā
atk-s0202a:139_7: nirujjhanti. Pañcakāmaguṇāmisāti ca kāmaguṇārammaṇachandarāgā, gahaṇaṭṭhena teyeva
atk-s0202a:139_8: ca upādānātipi vuttā. Tamevūpekkhaṃ bhāvetīti taṃ lokāmisūpādānānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ
atk-s0202a:140: 43. Uḍḍīyeyyāti uppatitvā gaccheyya. Anupatitvāti anubandhitvā. Vitaccheyyunti mukhatuṇḍakena ḍaṃsantā taccheyyuṃ. Vissajjeyyunti maṃsapesiṃ nakhehi kaḍḍhitvā pāteyyuṃ.
atk-s0202a:141: 47. Yānaṃ vā poriseyyanti purisānucchavikaṃ yānaṃ. Pavaramaṇikuṇḍalanti nānappakāraṃ uttamamaṇiñca kuṇḍalañca. Sāni harantīti attano bhaṇḍakāni gaṇhanti.
atk-s0202a:144_0: 50. Ārakā ahaṃ, bhanteti pathavito nabhaṃ viya samuddassa orimatīrato paratīraṃ viya
atk-s0202a:144_1: ca suvidūravidūre ahaṃ. Anājānīyeti gihivohārasamucchedanassa kāraṇaṃ ajānanake.
atk-s0202a:144_2: Ājānīyabhojananti kāraṇaṃ jānantehi bhuñjitabbaṃ bhojanaṃ. Anājānīyabhojananti kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0202a:144_3: ajānantehi bhuñjitabbaṃ bhojanaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0202a:148_0: 51. Evaṃ me sutanti jīvakasuttaṃ. Tattha jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavaneti ettha
atk-s0202a:148_1: jīvatīti jīvako. Kumārena bhatoti komārabhacco. Yathāha “kiṃ etaṃ bhaṇe kākehi samparikiṇṇanti?
atk-s0202a:148_2: Dārako devāti. Jīvati bhaṇeti? Jīvati devāti. Tena hi bhaṇe taṃ dārakaṃ amhākaṃ antepuraṃ
atk-s0202a:148_3: netvā dhātīnaṃ detha posetunti. Tassa jīvatīti jīvakoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu, kumārena posāpitoti
atk-s0202a:148_4: komārabhaccoti nāmaṃ akaṃsū”ti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārena pana jīvakavatthu
atk-s0202a:148_5: khandhake āgatameva. Vinicchayakathāpissa samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya vuttā.
atk-s0202a:149_0: Ayaṃ pana jīvako ekasmiṃ samaye bhagavato dosābhisannaṃ kāyaṃ virecetvā sīveyyakaṃ
atk-s0202a:149_1: dussayugaṃ datvā vatthānumodanapariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya cintesi – “mayā
atk-s0202a:149_2: divasassa dvattikkhattuṃ buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ gantabbaṃ, idañca veḷuvanaṃ atidūre, mayhaṃ
atk-s0202a:149_3: uyyānaṃ ambavanaṃ āsannataraṃ, yaṃnūnāhamettha bhagavato vihāraṃ kāreyya”nti. So
atk-s0202a:149_4: tasmiṃ ambavane rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaleṇakuṭimaṇḍapādīni sampādetvā bhagavato anucchavikaṃ
atk-s0202a:149_5: gandhakuṭiṃ kāretvā ambavanaṃ aṭṭhārasahatthubbedhena tambapaṭṭavaṇṇena pākārena
atk-s0202a:149_6: parikkhipāpetvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ cīvarabhattena santappetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ
atk-s0202a:149_7: pātetvā vihāraṃ niyyātesi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavane”ti.
atk-s0202a:150_0: Ārabhantīti ghātenti. Uddissakatanti uddisitvā kataṃ. Paṭiccakammanti attānaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0202a:150_1: kataṃ. Atha vā paṭiccakammanti nimittakammassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, taṃ paṭicca kammamettha
atk-s0202a:150_2: atthīti maṃsaṃ “paṭiccakamma”nti vuttaṃ hoti yo evarūpaṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjati, sopi
atk-s0202a:150_3: tassa kammassa dāyādo hoti, vadhakassa viya tassāpi pāṇaghātakammaṃ hotīti tesaṃ
atk-s0202a:150_4: laddhi. Dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākarontīti bhagavatā vuttakāraṇassa anukāraṇaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0202a:150_5: Ettha ca kāraṇaṃ nāma tikoṭiparisuddhamacchamaṃsaparibhogo, anukāraṇaṃ nāma mahājanassa
atk-s0202a:150_6: tathā byākaraṇaṃ. Yasmā pana bhagavā uddissakataṃ na paribhuñjati, tasmā neva taṃ
atk-s0202a:150_7: kāraṇaṃ hoti, na titthiyānaṃ tathā byākaraṇaṃ anukāraṇaṃ. Sahadhammiko vādānuvādoti
atk-s0202a:150_8: parehi vuttakāraṇena sakāraṇo hutvā tumhākaṃ vādo vā anuvādo vā viññūhi garahitabbakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0202a:150_9: koci appamattakopi kiṃ na āgacchati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “kiṃ sabbākārenapi tumhākaṃ
atk-s0202a:150_10: vāde gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthī”ti. Abbhācikkhantīti abhibhavitvā ācikkhanti.
atk-s0202a:151_0: 52. Ṭhānehīti kāraṇehi. Diṭṭhādīsu diṭṭhaṃ nāma bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya migamacche vadhitvā
atk-s0202a:151_1: gayhamānaṃ diṭṭhaṃ. Sutaṃ nāma bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya migamacche vadhitvā gahitanti sutaṃ.
atk-s0202a:151_2: Parisaṅkitaṃ nāma diṭṭhaparisaṅkitaṃ sutaparisaṅkitaṃ tadubhayavimuttaparisaṅkitanti tividhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a:152_0: Tatrāyaṃ sabbasaṅgāhakavinicchayo – idha bhikkhū passanti manusse jālavāgurādihatthe
atk-s0202a:152_1: gāmato vā nikkhamante araññe vā vicarante. Dutiyadivase ca nesaṃ taṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0202a:152_2: paviṭṭhānaṃ samacchamaṃsaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhiharanti. Te tena diṭṭhena parisaṅkanti
atk-s0202a:152_3: “bhikkhūnaṃ nu kho atthāya kata”nti, idaṃ diṭṭhaparisaṅkitaṃ nāma, etaṃ gahetuṃ na
atk-s0202a:152_4: vaṭṭati. Yaṃ evaṃ aparisaṅkitaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭati. Sace pana te manussā “kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0202a:152_5: na gaṇhathā”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “nayidaṃ, bhante, bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya kataṃ,
atk-s0202a:152_6: amhehi attano atthāya vā rājayuttādīnaṃ atthāya vā kata”nti vadanti, kappati.
atk-s0202a:153_0: Na heva kho bhikkhū passanti, apica suṇanti “manussā kira jālavāgurādihatthā gāmato
atk-s0202a:153_1: vā nikkhamanti araññe vā vicarantī”ti. Dutiyadivase ca nesaṃ taṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0202a:153_2: samacchamaṃsaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhiharanti. Te tena sutena parisaṅkanti “bhikkhūnaṃ nu
atk-s0202a:153_3: kho atthāya kata”nti, idaṃ sutaparisaṅkitaṃ nāma, etaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ evaṃ
atk-s0202a:153_4: aparisaṅkitaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭati. Sace pana te manussā “kasmā, bhante, na gaṇhathā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0202a:153_5: tamatthaṃ sutvā “nayidaṃ, bhante, bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya kataṃ, amhehi attano atthāya
atk-s0202a:153_6: vā rājayuttādīnaṃ atthāya vā kata”nti vadanti, kappati.
atk-s0202a:154_0: Na heva kho pana passanti na suṇanti, apica tesaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ pattaṃ
atk-s0202a:154_1: gahetvā samacchamaṃsaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā abhiharanti. Te parisaṅkanti “bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0202a:154_2: nu kho atthāya kata”nti, idaṃ tadubhayavimuttaparisaṅkitaṃ nāma. Etampi gahetuṃ na
atk-s0202a:154_3: vaṭṭati. Yaṃ evaṃ aparisaṅkitaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭati. Sace pana te manussā “kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0202a:154_4: na gaṇhathā”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “nayidaṃ, bhante, bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya kataṃ,
atk-s0202a:154_5: amhehi attano atthāya vā rājayuttādīnaṃ atthāya vā kataṃ, pavattamaṃsaṃ vā kataṃ,
atk-s0202a:154_6: kappiyameva labhitvā bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya sampādita”nti vadanti, kappati.
atk-s0202a:155_0: Matānaṃ petakiccatthāya maṅgalādīnaṃ vā atthāya katepi eseva nayo. Yaṃ yañhi bhikkhūnaṃyeva
atk-s0202a:155_1: atthāya akataṃ, yattha ca nibbematikā honti, taṃ sabbaṃ kappati. Sace pana ekasmiṃ
atk-s0202a:155_2: vihāre bhikkhū uddissa kataṃ hoti, te ca attano atthāya katabhāvaṃ na jānanti, aññe
atk-s0202a:155_3: jānanti. Ye jānanti, tesaṃ na vaṭṭati, itaresaṃ vaṭṭati. Aññe na jānanti, teyeva
atk-s0202a:155_4: jānanti, tesaṃyeva na vaṭṭati, aññesaṃ vaṭṭati. Tepi “amhākaṃ atthāya kataṃ”ti jānanti
atk-s0202a:155_5: aññepi “etesaṃ atthāya kata”nti jānanti, sabbesampi taṃ na vaṭṭati. Sabbe na jānanti,
atk-s0202a:155_6: sabbesaṃ vaṭṭati. Pañcasu hi sahadhammikesu yassa kassaci vā atthāya uddissa kataṃ
atk-s0202a:156_0: Sace pana koci ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ vadhitvā tassa pattaṃ pūretvā deti, so
atk-s0202a:156_1: ce attano atthāya katabhāvaṃ jānaṃyeva gahetvā aññassa bhikkhuno deti, so tassa saddhāya
atk-s0202a:156_2: paribhuñjati. Kassāpattīti? Dvinnampi anāpatti. Yañhi uddissa kataṃ, tassa abhuttatāya
atk-s0202a:156_3: anāpatti, itarassa ajānanatāya. Kappiyamaṃsassa hi paṭiggahaṇe āpatti natthi. Uddissakatañca
atk-s0202a:156_4: ajānitvā bhuttassa pacchā ñatvā āpattidesanākiccaṃ nāma natthi. Akappiyamaṃsaṃ pana
atk-s0202a:156_5: ajānitvā bhuttena pacchā ñatvāpi āpatti desetabbā. Uddissakatañhi ñatvā bhuñjatova
atk-s0202a:156_6: āpatti, akappiyamaṃsaṃ ajānitvā bhuttassāpi āpattiyeva. Tasmā āpattibhīrukena rūpaṃ
atk-s0202a:156_7: sallakkhentenāpi pucchitvāva maṃsaṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ, paribhogakāle pucchitvā paribhuñjissāmīti
atk-s0202a:156_8: vā gahetvā pucchitvāva paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Kasmā? Duviññeyyattā. Acchamaṃsañhi sūkaramaṃsasadisaṃ
atk-s0202a:156_9: hoti, dīpimaṃsādīni ca migamaṃsasadisāni, tasmā pucchitvā gahaṇameva vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
atk-s0202a:157_0: Adiṭṭhanti bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya vadhitvā gayhamānaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ. Asutanti bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya
atk-s0202a:157_1: vadhitvā gahitanti asutaṃ. Aparisaṅkitanti diṭṭhaparisaṅkitādivasena aparisaṅkitaṃ.
atk-s0202a:157_2: Paribhoganti vadāmīti imehi tīhi kāraṇehi parisuddhaṃ tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0202a:157_3: tassa paribhogo araññe jātasūpeyyasākaparibhogasadiso hoti, tathārūpaṃ paribhuñjantassa
atk-s0202a:157_4: mettāvihārissa bhikkhuno doso vā vajjaṃ vā natthi, tasmā taṃ paribhuñjitabbanti vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0202a:158_0: 53. Idāni tādisassa paribhoge mettāvihārinopi anavajjataṃ dassetuṃ idha, jīvaka,
atk-s0202a:158_1: bhikkhūtiādimāha. Tattha kiñcāpi aniyametvā bhikkhūti vuttaṃ, atha kho attānameva
atk-s0202a:158_2: sandhāya etaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Bhagavatā hi mahāvacchagottasutte, caṅkīsutte,
atk-s0202a:158_3: imasmiṃ sutteti tīsu ṭhānesu attānaṃyeva sandhāya desanā katā. Paṇītena piṇḍapātenāti
atk-s0202a:158_4: heṭṭhā anaṅgaṇasutte yo koci mahaggho piṇḍapāto paṇītapiṇḍapātoti adhippeto, idha
atk-s0202a:158_5: pana maṃsūpasecanova adhippeto. Agathitoti taṇhāya agathito. Amucchitoti taṇhāmucchanāya
atk-s0202a:158_6: amucchito. Anajjhopannoti na adhiopanno, sabbaṃ ālumpitvā ekappahāreneva gilitukāmo
atk-s0202a:158_7: kāko viya na hotīti attho. Ādīnavadassāvīti ekarattivāsena udarapaṭalaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0202a:158_8: navahi vaṇamukhehi nikkhamissatītiādinā nayena ādīnavaṃ passanto. Nissaraṇapañño
atk-s0202a:158_9: paribhuñjatīti idamatthamāhāraparibhogoti paññāya paricchinditvā paribhuñjati. Attabyābādhāya
atk-s0202a:158_10: vā cetetīti attadukkhāya vā citeti. Sutametanti sutaṃ mayā etaṃ pubbe, etaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0202a:158_11: savanamattamevāti dasseti. Sace kho te, jīvaka, idaṃ sandhāya bhāsitanti, jīvaka,
atk-s0202a:158_12: mahābrahmunā vikkhambhanappahānena byāpādādayo pahīnā, tena so mettāvihārī mayhaṃ
atk-s0202a:158_13: samucchedappahānena, sace te idaṃ sandhāya bhāsitaṃ, evaṃ sante tava idaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0202a:159: 54. Athassa bhagavā sesabrahmavihāravasenāpi uttari desanaṃ vaḍḍhento “idha, jīvaka, bhikkhū”tiādimāha. Taṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0202a:160_0: 55. Yo kho jīvakāti ayaṃ pāṭiekko anusandhi. Imasmiñhi ṭhāne bhagavā dvāraṃ thaketi,
atk-s0202a:160_1: sattānuddayaṃ dasseti. Sace hi kassaci evamassa “ekaṃ rasapiṇḍapātaṃ datvā kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0202a:160_2: saggasampattiṃ paṭilabhanti, yaṃkiñci katvā paraṃ māretvāpi rasapiṇḍapātova dātabbo”ti,
atk-s0202a:160_3: taṃ paṭisedhento “yo kho, jīvaka, tathāgataṃ vā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:161_0: Tattha iminā paṭhamena ṭhānenāti iminā āṇattimatteneva tāva paṭhamena kāraṇena. Galappavedhakenāti
atk-s0202a:161_1: yottena gale bandhitvā kaḍḍhito galena pavedhentena. Ārabhiyamānoti māriyamāno. Akappiyena
atk-s0202a:161_2: āsādetīti acchamaṃsaṃ sūkaramaṃsanti, dīpimaṃsaṃ vā migamaṃsanti khādāpetvā – “tvaṃ
atk-s0202a:161_3: kiṃ samaṇo nāma, akappiyamaṃsaṃ te khādita”nti ghaṭṭeti. Ye pana dubbhikkhādīsu vā
atk-s0202a:161_4: byādhiniggahaṇatthaṃ vā “acchamaṃsaṃ nāma sūkaramaṃsasadisaṃ, dīpimaṃsaṃ migamaṃsasadisa”nti
atk-s0202a:161_5: jānantā “sūkaramaṃsaṃ idaṃ, migamaṃsaṃ ida”nti vatvā hitajjhāsayena khādāpenti, na
atk-s0202a:161_6: te sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tesañhi bahupuññameva hoti. Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ
atk-s0202a:161_7: gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti ayaṃ āgataphalo viññātasāsano diṭṭhasacco ariyasāvako.
atk-s0202a:161_8: Imaṃ pana dhammadesanaṃ ogāhanto pasādaṃ uppādetvā dhammakathāya thutiṃ karonto evamāha.
atk-s0202a:165_0: 56. Evaṃ me sutanti upālisuttaṃ. Tattha nāḷandāyanti nālandāti evaṃnāmake nagare
atk-s0202a:165_1: taṃ nagaraṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā. Pāvārikambavaneti dussapāvārikaseṭṭhino ambavane.
atk-s0202a:165_2: Taṃ kira tassa uyyānaṃ ahosi, so bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bhagavati pasanno
atk-s0202a:165_3: tasmiṃ uyyāne kuṭileṇamaṇḍapādipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ bhagavato vihāraṃ katvā niyyādesi, so
atk-s0202a:165_4: vihāro jīvakambavanaṃ viya pāvārikambavananteva saṅkhaṃ gato. Tasmiṃ pāvārikambavane
atk-s0202a:165_5: viharatīti attho. Dīghatapassīti dīghattā evaṃladdhanāmo. Piṇḍapātapaṭikkantoti piṇḍapātato
atk-s0202a:165_6: paṭikkanto. Sāsane viya kiṃ pana bāhirāyatane piṇḍapātoti vohāro atthīti, natthi.
atk-s0202a:166_0: Paññapetīti dasseti ṭhapeti. Daṇḍāni paññapetīti idaṃ nigaṇṭhasamayena pucchanto
atk-s0202a:166_1: āha. Kāyadaṇḍaṃ vacīdaṇḍaṃ manodaṇḍanti ettha purimadaṇḍadvayaṃ te acittakaṃ payyapenti.
atk-s0202a:166_2: Yathā kira vāte vāyante sākhā calati, udakaṃ calati, na ca tattha cittaṃ atthi, evaṃ
atk-s0202a:166_3: kāyadaṇḍopi acittakova hoti. Yathā ca vāte vāyante tālapaṇṇādīni saddaṃ karonti,
atk-s0202a:166_4: udakāni saddaṃ karonti, na ca tattha cittaṃ atthi, evaṃ vacīdaṇḍopi acittakova hotīti
atk-s0202a:166_5: imaṃ daṇḍadvayaṃ acittakaṃ paññapenti. Cittaṃ pana manodaṇḍanti paññapenti. Athassa
atk-s0202a:167_0: Tattha kathāvatthusminti ettha kathāyeva kathāvatthu. Kathāyaṃ patiṭṭhapesīti attho.
atk-s0202a:167_1: Kasmā pana bhagavā evamakāsi? Passati hi bhagavā “ayaṃ imaṃ kathaṃ ādāya gantvā attano
atk-s0202a:167_2: satthu mahānigaṇṭhassa ārocessati, tāsañca parisati, upāli gahapati nisinno, so imaṃ
atk-s0202a:167_3: kathaṃ sutvā mama vādaṃ āropetuṃ āgamissati, tassāhaṃ dhammaṃ desessāmi, so tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0202a:167_4: saraṇaṃ gamissati, athassa cattāri saccāni pakāsessāmi, so saccapakāsanāvasāne sotāpattiphale
atk-s0202a:167_5: patiṭṭhahissati, paresaṃ saṅgahatthameva hi mayā pāramiyo pūritā”ti. Imamatthaṃ passanto evamakāsi.
atk-s0202a:168_0: 57. Kammāni paññapesīti idaṃ nigaṇṭho buddhasamayena pucchanto āha. Kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ
atk-s0202a:168_2: dvādasākusalacetanāti vīsaticetanā kāyakammaṃ nāma. Kāyadvāre ādānādīni apatvā vacīdvāre
atk-s0202a:168_3: vacanabhedaṃ pāpayamānā uppannā tāyeva vīsaticetanā vacīkammaṃ nāma. Ubhayadvāre
atk-s0202a:168_4: copanaṃ appatvā manodvāre uppannā ekūnatiṃsakusalākusalacetanā manokammaṃ nāma. Apica
atk-s0202a:168_5: saṅkhepato tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma, catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ vacīkammaṃ
atk-s0202a:168_6: nāma, tividhaṃ manoduccaritaṃ manokammaṃ nāma. Imasmiñca sutte kammaṃ dhuraṃ, anantarasutte
atk-s0202a:168_7: “cattārimāni puṇṇa kammāni mayā sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditānī”ti evamāgatepi
atk-s0202a:168_8: cetanā dhuraṃ. Yattha katthaci pavattā cetanā “kaṇhaṃ kaṇhavipāka”ntiādibhedaṃ labhati.
atk-s0202a:168_9: Niddesavāre cassa “sabyābajjhaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharotī”tiādinā nayena sā vuttāva.
atk-s0202a:168_10: Kāyadvāre pavattā pana idha kāyakammanti adhippetaṃ, vacīdvāre pavattā vacīkammaṃ,
atk-s0202a:168_11: manodvāre pavattā manokammaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “imasmiṃ sutte kammaṃ dhuraṃ, anantarasutte
atk-s0202a:168_12: cetanā”ti. Kammampi hi bhagavā kammanti paññapeti yathā imasmiṃyeva sutte. Cetanampi,
atk-s0202a:168_13: yathāha – “cetanāhaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ vadāmi, cetayitvā kammaṃ karotī”ti. Kasmā
atk-s0202a:168_14: pana cetanā kammanti vuttā? Cetanāmūlakattā kammassa.
atk-s0202a:169_0: Ettha ca akusalaṃ patvā kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ mahantanti vadanto na kilamati, kusalaṃ
atk-s0202a:169_1: patvā manokammaṃ. Tathā hi mātughātādīni cattāri kammāni kāyeneva upakkamitvā kāyeneva
atk-s0202a:169_2: karoti, niraye kappaṭṭhikasaṅghabhedakammaṃ vacīdvārena karoti. Evaṃ akusalaṃ patvā
atk-s0202a:169_3: kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ mahantanti vadanto na kilamati nāma. Ekā pana jhānacetanā caturāsītikappasahassāni
atk-s0202a:169_4: saggasampattiṃ āvahati, ekā maggacetanā sabbākusalaṃ samugghātetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāpeti.
atk-s0202a:169_5: Evaṃ kusalaṃ patvā manokammaṃ mahantanti vadanto na kilamati nāma. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne
atk-s0202a:169_6: bhagavā akusalaṃ patvā manokammaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ vadamāno niyatamicchādiṭṭhiṃ sandhāya
atk-s0202a:169_7: vadati. Tenevāha – “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ
atk-s0202a:169_8: mahāsāvajjaṃ, yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi. Micchādiṭṭhiparamāni, bhikkhave, mahāsāvajjānī”ti.
atk-s0202a:170: Idāni nigaṇṭhopi tathāgatena gatamaggaṃ paṭipajjanto kiñci atthanipphattiṃ apassantopi “kiṃ panāvuso, gotamā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:171_0: 58. Bālakiniyāti upālissa kira bālakaloṇakāragāmo nāma atthi, tato āyaṃ gahetvā manussā
atk-s0202a:171_1: āgatā, so “etha bhaṇe, amhākaṃ satthāraṃ mahānigaṇṭhaṃ passissāmā”ti tāya parisāya
atk-s0202a:171_2: parivuto tattha agamāsi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “bālakiniyā parisāyā”ti, bālakagāmavāsiniyāti
atk-s0202a:171_3: attho. Upālipamukhāyāti upālijeṭṭhakāya. Apica bālakiniyāti bālavatiyā bālussannāyātipi
atk-s0202a:171_4: attho. Upālipamukhāyāti upāligahapatiyeva tattha thokaṃ sappañño, so tassā pamukho
atk-s0202a:171_5: jeṭṭhako. Tenāpi vuttaṃ “upālipamukhāyā”ti. Handāti vacasāyatthe nipāto. Chavoti
atk-s0202a:171_6: lāmako. Oḷārikassāti mahantassa. Upanidhāyāti upanikkhipitvā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti, kāyadaṇḍassa
atk-s0202a:171_7: santike nikkhipitvā “ayaṃ nu kho mahanto, ayaṃ mahanto”ti evaṃ olokiyamāno chavo
atk-s0202a:171_8: manodaṇḍo kiṃ sobhati, kuto sobhissati, na sobhati, upanikkhepamattampi nappahotīti
atk-s0202a:171_9: dīpeti. Sādhu sādhu, bhante, tapassīti dīghatapassissa sādhukāraṃ dento, bhanteti nāṭaputtamālapati.
atk-s0202a:172_0: 60. Na kho metaṃ, bhante, ruccatīti, bhante, etaṃ mayhaṃ na ruccati. Māyāvīti māyākāro.
atk-s0202a:172_1: Āvaṭṭanimāyanti āvaṭṭetvā gahaṇamāyaṃ. Āvaṭṭetīti āvaṭṭetvā parikkhipitvā gaṇhāti.
atk-s0202a:172_2: Gaccha tvaṃ gahapatīti kasmā mahānigaṇṭho gahapatiṃ yāvatatiyaṃ pahiṇatiyeva? Dīghatapassī
atk-s0202a:172_3: pana paṭibāhateva? Mahānigaṇṭhena hi bhagavatā saddhiṃ ekaṃ nagaraṃ upanissāya viharantenapi
atk-s0202a:172_4: na bhagavā diṭṭhapubbo. Yo hi satthuvādapaṭiñño hoti, so taṃ paṭiññaṃ appahāya buddhadassane
atk-s0202a:172_5: abhabbo. Tasmā esa buddhadassanassa aladdhapubbattā dasabalassa dassanasampattiñca
atk-s0202a:172_6: niyyānikakathābhāvañca ajānanto yāvatatiyaṃ pahiṇateva. Dīghatapassī pana kālena
atk-s0202a:172_7: kālaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi pañhampi pucchati, so tathāgatassa
atk-s0202a:172_8: dassanasampattimpi niyyānikakathābhāvampi jānāti. Athassa etadahosi – “ayaṃ gahapati
atk-s0202a:172_9: paṇḍito, samaṇassa gotamassa santike gantvā dassanepi pasīdeyya, niyyānikakathaṃ
atk-s0202a:172_10: sutvāpi pasīdeyya. Tato na puna amhākaṃ santikaṃ āgaccheyyā”ti. Tasmā yāvatatiyaṃ paṭibāhateva.
atk-s0202a:173_0: Abhivādetvāti vanditvā. Tathāgatañhi disvā pasannāpi appasannāpi yebhuyyena vandantiyeva,
atk-s0202a:173_1: appakā na vandanti. Kasmā? Atiucce hi kule jāto agāraṃ ajjhāvasantopi vanditabboyevāti.
atk-s0202a:173_2: Ayaṃ pana gahapati pasannattāva vandi, dassaneyeva kira pasanno. Āgamā nu khvidhāti āgamā nu kho idha.
atk-s0202a:174_0: 61. Sādhu sādhu, bhante, tapassīti dīghatapassissa sādhukāraṃ dento, bhanteti, bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0202a:174_1: ālapati. Sacce patiṭṭhāyāti thusarāsimhi ākoṭitakhāṇuko viya acalanto vacīsacce patiṭṭhahitvā.
atk-s0202a:175_0: 62. Idhāti imasmiṃ loke. Assāti bhaveyya. Sītodakapaṭikkhittoti nigaṇṭhā sattasaññāya
atk-s0202a:175_1: sītodakaṃ paṭikkhipanti. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Manosattā nāma devāti manamhi sattā
atk-s0202a:175_2: laggā lagitā. Manopaṭibaddhoti yasmā manamhi paṭibaddho hutvā kālaṅkaroti, tasmā
atk-s0202a:175_3: manosattesu devesu upapajjatīti dasseti. Tassa hi pittajararogo bhavissati. Tenassa
atk-s0202a:175_4: uṇhodakaṃ pivituṃ vā hatthapādādidhovanatthāya vā gattaparisiñcanatthāya vā upanetuṃ
atk-s0202a:175_5: na vaṭṭati, rogo balavataro hoti. Sītodakaṃ vaṭṭati, rogaṃ vūpasameti. Ayaṃ pana
atk-s0202a:175_6: uṇhodakameva paṭisevati, taṃ alabhamāno odanakañjikaṃ paṭisevati. Cittena pana sītodakaṃ
atk-s0202a:175_7: pātukāmo ca paribhuñjitukāmo ca hoti. Tenassa manodaṇḍo tattheva bhijjati. So kāyadaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0202a:175_8: vacīdaṇḍaṃ rakkhāmīti sītodakaṃ pātukāmo vā paribhuñjitukāmo vā sītodakameva dethāti
atk-s0202a:175_9: vattuṃ na visahati. Tassa evaṃ rakkhitāpi kāyadaṇḍavacīdaṇḍā cutiṃ vā paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0202a:175_10: vā ākaḍḍhituṃ na sakkonti. Manodaṇḍo pana bhinnopi cutimpi paṭisandhimpi ākaḍḍhatiyeva.
atk-s0202a:175_11: Iti naṃ bhagavā dubbalakāyadaṇḍavacīdaṇḍā chavā lāmakā, manodaṇḍova balavā mahantoti vadāpesi.
atk-s0202a:176_0: Tassapi upāsakassa etadahosi. “Mucchāvasena asaññibhūtānañhi sattāhampi assāsapassāsā
atk-s0202a:176_1: nappavattanti, cittasantatipavattimatteneva pana te matāti na vuccanti. Yadā nesaṃ
atk-s0202a:176_2: cittaṃ nappavattati, tadā ‘matā ete nīharitvā te jhāpethā’ti vattabbataṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0202a:176_3: Kāyadaṇḍo nirīho abyāpāro, tathā vacīdaṇḍo. Citteneva pana tesaṃ cutipi paṭisandhipi
atk-s0202a:176_4: hoti. Itipi manodaṇḍova mahanto. Bhijjitvāpi cutipaṭisandhiākaḍḍhanato eseva mahanto.
atk-s0202a:176_5: Amhākaṃ pana mahānigaṇṭhassa kathā aniyyānikā”ti sallakkhesi. Bhagavato pana vicittāni
atk-s0202a:177_0: Na kho te sandhiyatīti na kho te ghaṭiyati. Purimena vā pacchimanti “kāyadaṇḍo mahanto”ti
atk-s0202a:177_1: iminā purimena vacanena idāni “manodaṇḍo mahanto”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ. Pacchimena vā purimanti
atk-s0202a:177_2: tena vā pacchimena aduṃ purimavacanaṃ na ghaṭiyati.
atk-s0202a:178_0: 63. Idānissa bhagavā aññānipi kāraṇāni āharanto “taṃ kiṃ maññasī”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0202a:178_1: cātuyāmasaṃvarasaṃvutoti na pāṇamatipāteti, na pāṇamatipātayati, na pāṇamatipātayato
atk-s0202a:178_2: samanuñño hoti. Na adinnaṃ ādiyati, na adinnaṃ ādiyāpeti, na adinnaṃ ādiyato samanuñño
atk-s0202a:178_3: hoti. Na musā bhaṇati, na musā bhaṇāpeti, na musā bhaṇato samanuñño hoti. Na bhāvitamāsīsati,
atk-s0202a:178_4: na bhāvitamāsīsāpeti, na bhāvitamāsīsato samanuñño hotīti iminā catukoṭṭhāsena saṃvarena
atk-s0202a:179_0: Sabbavārivāritoti vāritasabbaudako, paṭikkhittasabbasītodakoti attho. So hi sītodake
atk-s0202a:179_1: sattasaññī hoti, tasmā na taṃ valañjeti. Atha vā sabbavārivāritoti sabbena pāpavāraṇena
atk-s0202a:179_2: vāritapāpo. Sabbavāriyuttoti sabbena pāpavāraṇena yutto. Sabbavāridhutoti sabbena
atk-s0202a:179_3: pāpavāraṇena dhutapāpo. Sabbavāriphuṭoti sabbena pāpavāraṇena phuṭo. Khuddake pāṇe
atk-s0202a:179_4: saṅghātaṃ āpādetīti khuddake pāṇe vadhaṃ āpādeti. So kira ekindriyaṃ pāṇaṃ duvindriyaṃ
atk-s0202a:179_6: Tattha khuddakaṃ udakabindu khuddako pāṇo, mahantaṃ mahantoti saññī hoti. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ
atk-s0202a:179_7: vuttaṃ. Kismiṃ paññapetīti kattha katarasmiṃ koṭṭhāse paññapeti. Manodaṇḍasminti
atk-s0202a:179_8: manodaṇḍakoṭṭhāse, bhanteti. Ayaṃ pana upāsako bhaṇantova sayampi sallakkhesi – “amhākaṃ
atk-s0202a:179_9: mahānigaṇṭho ‘asañcetanikaṃ kammaṃ appasāvajjaṃ, sañcetanikaṃ mahāsāvajja’nti paññapetvā
atk-s0202a:179_10: cetanaṃ manodaṇḍoti paññapeti, aniyyānikā etassa kathā, bhagavatova niyyānikā”ti.
