atk-s0202a:739_9: dhammena sakkareyyuṃ, mayā hi te visesatarā. Añño ceva pana dhammo atthi, yena maṃ
atk-s0202a:739_10: te sakkarontīti dasseti. Iminā nayena sabbavāresu yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0202a:740_1: dhārayamānā. Nantakānīti antavirahitāni vatthakhaṇḍāni, yadi hi nesaṃ anto bhaveyya,
atk-s0202a:740_2: pilotikāti saṅkhaṃ gaccheyyuṃ. Uccinitvāti phāletvā dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya thiraṭṭhānameva
atk-s0202a:740_3: gahetvā. Alābulomasānīti alābulomasadisasuttāni sukhumānīti dīpeti. Ettāvatā ca satthā
atk-s0202a:740_4: cīvarasantosena asantuṭṭhoti na vattabbo. Atimuttakasusānato hissa puṇṇadāsiyā pārupitvā
atk-s0202a:740_5: pātitasāṇapaṃsukūlaṃ gahaṇadivase udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī akampi. Idha
atk-s0202a:740_6: pana etamatthaṃ dasseti – “ahaṃ ekasmiṃyeva kāle paṃsukūlaṃ gaṇhiṃ, mayhaṃ pana sāvakā
atk-s0202a:740_7: dhutaṅgasamādānato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na bhindantī”ti.
atk-s0202a:741_1: loluppacāraṃ paṭikkhipitvā samādinnasapadānacārā. Uñchāsake vate ratāti uñchācariyasaṅkhāte
atk-s0202a:741_2: bhikkhūnaṃ pakativate ratā, uccanīcagharadvāraṭṭhāyino hutvā kabaramissakaṃ bhattaṃ
atk-s0202a:741_3: saṃharitvā paribhuñjantīti attho. Antaragharanti brahmāyusutte ummārato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0202a:741_4: antaragharaṃ, idha indakhīlato paṭṭhāya adhippetaṃ. Ettāvatā ca satthā piṇḍapātasantosena
atk-s0202a:741_5: asantuṭṭhoti na vattabbo, appāhāratāya vuttaniyāmeneva pana sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:741_6: Idha pana etamatthaṃ dasseti – “ahaṃ ekasmiṃyeva kāle nimantanaṃ na sādayiṃ, mayhaṃ
atk-s0202a:741_7: pana sāvakā dhutaṅgasamādānato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na bhindantī”ti.
atk-s0202a:742_0: Rukkhamūlikāti channaṃ paṭikkhipitvā samādinnarukkhamūlikaṅgā. Abbhokāsikāti channañca
atk-s0202a:742_1: rukkhamūlañca paṭikkhipitvā samādinnaabbhokāsikaṅgā. Aṭṭhamāseti hemantagimhike māse.
atk-s0202a:742_2: Antovasse pana cīvarānuggahatthaṃ channaṃ pavisanti. Ettāvatā ca satthā senāsanasantosena
atk-s0202a:742_3: asantuṭṭhoti na vattabbo, senāsanasantoso panassa chabbassikamahāpadhānena ca pālileyyakavanasaṇḍena
atk-s0202a:742_4: ca dīpetabbo. Idha pana etamatthaṃ dasseti – “ahaṃ ekasmiṃyeva kāle channaṃ na pāvisiṃ,
atk-s0202a:742_5: mayhaṃ pana sāvakā dhutaṅgasamādānato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na bhindantī”ti.
atk-s0202a:743_0: Āraññikāti gāmantasenāsanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā samādinnaāraññikaṅgā. Saṅghamajjhe osarantīti
atk-s0202a:743_1: abaddhasīmāya kathitaṃ, baddhasīmāyaṃ pana vasantā attano vasanaṭṭhāneyeva uposathaṃ
atk-s0202a:743_2: karonti. Ettāvatā ca satthā no pavivittoti na vattabbo, “icchāmahaṃ, bhikkhave, aḍḍhamāsaṃ
atk-s0202a:743_3: paṭisalliyitu”nti evañhissa paviveko paññāyati. Idha pana etamatthaṃ dasseti “ahaṃ
atk-s0202a:743_4: ekasmiṃyeva tathārūpe kāle paṭisalliyiṃ, mayhaṃ pana sāvakā dhutaṅgasamādānato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0202a:743_5: yāvajīvaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na bhindantī”ti. Mamaṃ sāvakāti maṃ sāvakā.
atk-s0202a:744_0: 244. Sanidānanti sappaccayaṃ. Kiṃ pana appaccayaṃ nibbānaṃ na desetīti. No na deseti,
atk-s0202a:744_1: sahetukaṃ pana taṃ desanaṃ katvā deseti, no ahetukanti. Sappāṭihāriyanti purimassevetaṃ
atk-s0202a:744_2: vevacanaṃ, sakāraṇanti attho. Taṃ vatāti ettha vatāti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0202a:745_0: 245. Anāgataṃ vādapathanti ajja ṭhapetvā sve vā punadivase vā aḍḍhamāse vā māse vā
atk-s0202a:745_1: saṃvacchare vā tassa tassa pañhassa upari āgamanavādapathaṃ. Na dakkhatīti yathā
atk-s0202a:745_2: saccako nigaṇṭho attano niggahaṇatthaṃ āgatakāraṇaṃ visesetvā vadanto na addasa,
atk-s0202a:745_3: evaṃ na dakkhatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Sahadhammenāti sakāraṇena. Antarantarā kathaṃ
atk-s0202a:745_4: opāteyyunti mama kathāvāraṃ pacchinditvā antarantare attano kathaṃ paveseyyunti attho.
atk-s0202a:745_5: Na kho panāhaṃ, udāyīti, udāyi, ahaṃ ambaṭṭhasoṇadaṇḍakūṭadantasaccakanigaṇṭhādīhi
atk-s0202a:745_6: saddhiṃ mahāvāde vattamānepi – “aho vata me ekasāvakopi upamaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ vā āharitvā
atk-s0202a:745_7: dadeyyā”ti evaṃ sāvakesu anusāsaniṃ na paccāsīsāmi. Mamayevāti evarūpesu ṭhānesu
atk-s0202a:746_0: 246. Tesāhaṃ cittaṃ ārādhemīti tesaṃ ahaṃ tassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇena cittaṃ gaṇhāmi
atk-s0202a:746_1: sampādemi paripūremi, aññaṃ puṭṭho aññaṃ na byākaromi, ambaṃ puṭṭho labujaṃ viya
atk-s0202a:746_2: labujaṃ vā puṭṭho ambaṃ viya. Ettha ca “adhisīle sambhāventī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne buddhasīlaṃ
atk-s0202a:746_3: nāma kathitaṃ, “abhikkante ñāṇadassane sambhāventī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0202a:746_5: saccabyākaraṇapaññā. Tattha sabbaññutaññāṇañca saccabyākaraṇapaññañca ṭhapetvā avasesā
atk-s0202a:747_0: 247. Idāni tesaṃ tesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ paṭipadaṃ ācikkhanto puna caparaṃ udāyītiādimāha.
atk-s0202a:747_1: Tattha abhiññāvosānapāramippattāti abhiññāvosānasaṅkhātañceva abhiññāpāramīsaṅkhātañca arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0202a:748_0: Sammappadhāneti upāyapadhāne. Chandaṃ janetīti kattukamyatākusalacchandaṃ janeti.
atk-s0202a:748_1: Vāyamatīti vāyāmaṃ karoti. Vīriyaṃ ārabhatīti vīriyaṃ pavatteti. Cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti
atk-s0202a:748_2: cittaṃ ukkhipati. Padahatīti upāyapadhānaṃ karoti. Bhāvanāya pāripūriyāti vaḍḍhiyā
atk-s0202a:748_3: paripūraṇatthaṃ. Apicettha – “yā ṭhiti, so asammoso…pe… yaṃ vepullaṃ, sā bhāvanāpāripūrī”ti
atk-s0202a:748_4: evaṃ purimaṃ purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimassa atthotipi veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:749: Imehi pana sammappadhānehi kiṃ kathitaṃ? Kassapasaṃyuttapariyāyena sāvakassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadā kathitā. Vuttañhetaṃ tattha –
atk-s0202a:750_0: “Cattārome, āvuso, sammappadhānā. Katame cattāro? Idhāvuso, bhikkhu, anuppannā me
atk-s0202a:750_1: pāpakā akusalā dhammā uppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti. Uppannā
atk-s0202a:750_2: me pāpakā akusalā dhammā appahīyamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti. Anuppannā
atk-s0202a:750_3: me kusalā dhammā anuppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti. Uppannā me
atk-s0202a:750_4: kusalā dhammā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karotī”ti.
atk-s0202a:751_0: Ettha ca pāpakā akusalāti lobhādayo veditabbā. Anuppannā kusalā dhammāti samathavipassanā
atk-s0202a:751_1: ceva maggo ca, uppannā kusalā nāma samathavipassanāva. Maggo pana sakiṃ uppajjitvā
atk-s0202a:751_2: nirujjhamāno anatthāya saṃvattanako nāma natthi. So hi phalassa paccayaṃ datvāva
atk-s0202a:751_3: nirujjhati. Purimasmimpi vā samathavipassanāva gahetabbāti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana na yuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a:752_0: Tattha “uppannā samathavipassanā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvattantī”ti atthassa āvibhāvatthamidaṃ
atk-s0202a:752_1: vatthu – eko kira khīṇāsavatthero “mahācetiyañca mahābodhiñca vandissāmī”ti samāpattilābhinā
atk-s0202a:752_2: bhaṇḍagāhakasāmaṇerena saddhiṃ janapadato mahāvihāraṃ āgantvā vihārapariveṇaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0202a:752_3: Sāyanhasamaye mahābhikkhusaṅghe cetiyaṃ vandamāne cetiyaṃ vandanatthāya na nikkhami.
atk-s0202a:752_4: Kasmā? Khīṇāsavānañhi tīsu ratanesu mahantaṃ gāravaṃ hoti. Tasmā bhikkhusaṅghe vanditvā
atk-s0202a:752_5: paṭikkamante manussānaṃ sāyamāsabhuttavelāyaṃ sāmaṇerampi ajānāpetvā “cetiyaṃ vandissāmī”ti
atk-s0202a:752_6: ekakova nikkhami. Sāmaṇero – “kiṃ nu kho thero avelāya ekakova gacchati, jānissāmī”ti
atk-s0202a:752_7: upajjhāyassa padānupadiko nikkhami. Thero anāvajjanena tassa āgamanaṃ ajānanto dakkhiṇadvārena
atk-s0202a:753_0: Mahāthero mahācetiyaṃ ulloketvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā
atk-s0202a:753_1: haṭṭhapahaṭṭho cetiyaṃ vandati. Sāmaṇero therassa vandanākāraṃ disvā “upajjhāyo me
atk-s0202a:753_2: ativiya pasannacitto vandati, kiṃ nu kho pupphāni labhitvā pūjaṃ kareyyā”ti cintesi.
atk-s0202a:753_3: Thero vanditvā uṭṭhāya sirasi añjaliṃ ṭhapetvā mahācetiyaṃ ulloketvā ṭhito. Sāmaṇero
atk-s0202a:753_4: ukkāsitvā attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpesi. Thero parivattetvā olokento “kadā āgatosī”ti
atk-s0202a:753_5: pucchi. Tumhākaṃ cetiyaṃ vandanakāle, bhante. Ativiya pasannā cetiyaṃ vandittha kiṃ
atk-s0202a:753_6: nu kho pupphāni labhitvā pūjeyyāthāti? Āma sāmaṇera imasmiṃ cetiye viya aññatra ettakaṃ
atk-s0202a:753_7: dhātūnaṃ nidhānaṃ nāma natthi, evarūpaṃ asadisaṃ mahāthūpaṃ pupphāni labhitvā ko
atk-s0202a:753_8: na pūjeyyāti. Tena hi, bhante, adhivāsetha, āharissāmīti tāvadeva jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0202a:753_9: iddhiyā himavantaṃ gantvā vaṇṇagandhasampannapupphāni parissāvanaṃ pūretvā mahāthere
atk-s0202a:753_10: dakkhiṇamukhato pacchimaṃ mukhaṃ asampatteyeva āgantvā pupphaparissāvanaṃ hatthe
atk-s0202a:753_11: ṭhapetvā “pūjetha, bhante,”ti āha. Thero “atimandāni no sāmaṇera pupphānī”ti āha.
atk-s0202a:753_12: Gacchatha, bhante, bhagavato guṇe āvajjitvā pūjethāti.
atk-s0202a:754_0: Thero pacchimamukhanissitena sopāṇena āruyha kucchivedikābhūmiyaṃ pupphapūjaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0202a:754_1: āraddho. Vedikābhūmiyaṃ paripuṇṇāni pupphāni patitvā dutiyabhūmiyaṃ jaṇṇupamāṇena
atk-s0202a:754_2: odhinā pūrayiṃsu. Tato otaritvā pādapiṭṭhikapantiṃ pūjesi. Sāpi paripūri. Paripuṇṇabhāvaṃ
atk-s0202a:754_3: ñatvā heṭṭhimatale vikiranto agamāsi. Sabbaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ paripūri. Tasmiṃ paripuṇṇe
atk-s0202a:754_4: “sāmaṇera pupphāni na khīyantī”ti āha. Parissāvanaṃ, bhante, adhomukhaṃ karothāti.
atk-s0202a:754_5: Adhomukhaṃ katvā cālesi, tadā pupphāni khīṇāni. Parissāvanaṃ sāmaṇerassa datvā saddhiṃ
atk-s0202a:754_6: hatthipākārena cetiyaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā pariveṇaṃ
atk-s0202a:754_7: gacchanto cintesi – “yāva mahiddhiko vatāyaṃ sāmaṇero, sakkhissati nu kho imaṃ iddhānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0202a:754_8: rakkhitu”nti. Tato “na sakkhissatī”ti disvā sāmaṇeramāha – “sāmaṇera tvaṃ idāni mahiddhiko,
atk-s0202a:754_9: evarūpaṃ pana iddhiṃ nāsetvā pacchimakāle kāṇapesakāriyā hatthena madditakañjiyaṃ
atk-s0202a:754_10: pivissasī”ti. Daharakabhāvassa nāmesa dosoyaṃ, so upajjhāyassa kathāyaṃ saṃvijjitvā
atk-s0202a:754_11: – “kammaṭṭhānaṃ me, bhante, ācikkhathā”ti na yāci, amhākaṃ upajjhāyo kiṃ vadatīti
atk-s0202a:755_0: Thero mahācetiyañca mahābodhiñca vanditvā sāmaṇeraṃ pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā anupubbena
atk-s0202a:755_1: kuṭeḷitissamahāvihāraṃ agamāsi. Sāmaṇero upajjhāyassa padānupadiko hutvā bhikkhācāraṃ
atk-s0202a:755_2: na gacchati, “kataraṃ gāmaṃ pavisatha, bhante,”ti pucchitvā pana “idāni me upajjhāyo
atk-s0202a:755_3: gāmadvāraṃ patto bhavissatī”ti ñatvā attano ca upajjhāyassa ca pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0202a:755_4: ākāsena gantvā therassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā piṇḍāya pavisati. Thero sabbakālaṃ ovadati
atk-s0202a:755_5: – “sāmaṇera mā evamakāsi, puthujjaniddhi nāma calā anibaddhā, asappāyaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0202a:755_6: labhitvā appamattakeneva bhijjati, santāya samāpattiyā parihīnāya brahmacariyavāso
atk-s0202a:755_7: santhambhituṃ na sakkotī”ti. Sāmaṇero “kiṃ katheti mayhaṃ upajjhāyo”ti sotuṃ na icchati,
atk-s0202a:755_8: tatheva karoti. Thero anupubbena cetiyavandanaṃ karonto kammubinduvihāraṃ nāma gato.
atk-s0202a:755_9: Tattha vasantepi there sāmaṇero tatheva karoti.
atk-s0202a:756_0: Athekadivasaṃ ekā pesakāradhītā abhirūpā paṭhamavaye ṭhitā kammabindugāmato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0202a:756_1: padumassaraṃ oruyha gāyamānā pupphāni bhañjati. Tasmiṃ samaye sāmaṇero padumassaramatthakena
atk-s0202a:756_2: gacchati, gacchanto pana silesikāya kāṇamacchikā viya tassā gītasadde bajjhi. Tāvadevassa
atk-s0202a:756_3: iddhi antarahitā, chinnapakkhakāko viya ahosi. Santasamāpattibalena pana tattheva
atk-s0202a:756_4: udakapiṭṭhe apatitvā simbalitūlaṃ viya patamānaṃ anupubbena padumasaratīre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0202a:756_5: So vegena gantvā upajjhāyassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā nivatti. Mahāthero “pagevetaṃ mayā
atk-s0202a:756_6: diṭṭhaṃ, nivāriyamānopi na nivattissatī”ti kiñci avatvā piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0202a:757_0: Sāmaṇero gantvā padumasaratīre aṭṭhāsi tassā paccuttaraṇaṃ āgamayamāno. Sāpi sāmaṇeraṃ
atk-s0202a:757_1: ākāsena gacchantañca puna āgantvā ṭhitañca disvā “addhā esa maṃ nissāya ukkaṇṭhito”ti
atk-s0202a:757_2: ñatvā “paṭikkama sāmaṇerā”ti āha. So paṭikkami. Itarā paccuttaritvā sāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0202a:757_3: taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “kiṃ, bhante,”ti pucchi. So tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Sā bahūhi kāraṇehi
atk-s0202a:757_4: gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ brahmacariyavāse ānisaṃsañca dassetvā ovadamānāpi tassa ukkaṇṭhaṃ
atk-s0202a:757_5: vinodetuṃ asakkontī – “ayaṃ mama kāraṇā evarūpāya iddhiyā parihīno, na dāni yuttaṃ
atk-s0202a:757_6: pariccajitu”nti idheva tiṭṭhāti vatvā gharaṃ gantvā mātāpitūnaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0202a:757_7: Tepi āgantvā nānappakāraṃ ovadamānā vacanaṃ aggaṇhantaṃ āhaṃsu – “tvaṃ amhe uccakulāti
atk-s0202a:757_8: sallakkhesi, mayaṃ pesakārā. Sakkhissasi pesakārakammaṃ kātu”nti sāmaṇero āha – “upāsaka
atk-s0202a:757_9: gihibhūto nāma pesakārakammaṃ vā kareyya naḷakārakammaṃ vā, kiṃ iminā sāṭakamattena
atk-s0202a:757_10: lobhaṃ karothā”ti. Pesakāro udare baddhasāṭakaṃ datvā gharaṃ netvā dhītaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0202a:758_0: So pesakārakammaṃ uggaṇhitvā pesakārehi saddhiṃ sālāya kammaṃ karoti. Aññesaṃ itthiyo
atk-s0202a:758_1: pātova bhattaṃ sampādetvā āhariṃsu, tassa bhariyā na tāva āgacchati. So itaresu kammaṃ
atk-s0202a:758_2: vissajjetvā bhuñjamānesu tasaraṃ vaṭṭento nisīdi. Sā pacchā agamāsi. Atha naṃ so
atk-s0202a:758_3: “aticirena āgatāsī”ti tajjesi. Mātugāmo ca nāma api cakkavattirājānaṃ attani paṭibaddhacittaṃ
atk-s0202a:758_4: ñatvā dāsaṃ viya sallakkheti. Tasmā sā evamāha – “aññesaṃ ghare dārupaṇṇaloṇādīni
atk-s0202a:758_5: sannihitāni, bāhirato āharitvā dāyakā pesanatakārakāpi atthi, ahaṃ pana ekikāva,
atk-s0202a:758_6: tvampi mayhaṃ ghare idaṃ atthi idaṃ natthīti na jānāsi. Sace icchasi, bhuñja, no
atk-s0202a:758_7: ce icchasi, mā bhuñjā”ti. So “na kevalañca ussūre bhattaṃ āharasi, vācāyapi maṃ ghaṭṭesī”ti
atk-s0202a:758_8: kujjhitvā aññaṃ paharaṇaṃ apassanto tameva tasaradaṇḍakaṃ tasarato luñcitvā khipi.
atk-s0202a:758_9: Sā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā īsakaṃ parivatti. Tasaradaṇḍakassa ca koṭi nāma tikhiṇā
atk-s0202a:758_10: hoti, sā tassā parivattamānāya akkhikoṭiyaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi. Sā ubhohi hatthehi
atk-s0202a:758_11: vegena akkhiṃ aggahesi, bhinnaṭṭhānato lohitaṃ paggharati. So tasmiṃ kāle upajjhāyassa
atk-s0202a:758_12: vacanaṃ anussari – “idaṃ sandhāya maṃ upajjhāyo ‘anāgate kāle kāṇapesakāriyā hatthehi
atk-s0202a:758_13: madditakañjiyaṃ pivissasī’ti āha, idaṃ therena diṭṭhaṃ bhavissati, aho dīghadassī
atk-s0202a:758_14: ayyo”ti mahāsaddena rodituṃ ārabhi. Tamenaṃ aññe – “alaṃ, āvuso, mā rodi, akkhi nāma
atk-s0202a:758_15: bhinnaṃ na sakkā rodanena paṭipākatikaṃ kātu”nti āhaṃsu. So “nāhametamatthaṃ rodāmi,
atk-s0202a:758_16: apica kho imaṃ sandhāya rodāmī”ti sabbaṃ paṭipāṭiyā kathesi. Evaṃ uppannā samathavipassanā
atk-s0202a:759_0: Aparampi vatthu – tiṃsamattā bhikkhū kalyāṇimahācetiyaṃ vanditvā aṭavimaggena mahāmaggaṃ
atk-s0202a:759_1: otaramānā antarāmagge jhāmakhette kammaṃ katvā āgacchantaṃ ekaṃ manussaṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0202a:759_2: Tassa sarīraṃ masimakkhitaṃ viya ahosi. Masimakkhitaṃyeva ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ kacchaṃ pīḷetvā
atk-s0202a:759_3: nivatthaṃ, olokiyamāno jhāmakhāṇuko viya khāyati. So divasabhāge kammaṃ katvā upaḍḍhajjhāyamānānaṃ
atk-s0202a:759_4: dārūnaṃ kalāpaṃ ukkhipitvā piṭṭhiyaṃ vippakiṇṇehi kesehi kummaggena āgantvā bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0202a:759_5: sammukhe aṭṭhāsi. Sāmaṇerā disvā aññamaññaṃ olokayamānā, – “āvuso, tuyhaṃ pitā tuyhaṃ
atk-s0202a:759_6: mahāpitā tuyhaṃ mātulo”ti hasamānā gantvā “konāmo tvaṃ upāsakā”ti nāmaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0202a:759_7: So nāmaṃ pucchito vippaṭisārī hutvā dārukalāpaṃ chaḍḍetvā vatthaṃ saṃvidhāya nivāsetvā
atk-s0202a:759_8: mahāthere vanditvā “tiṭṭhatha tāva, bhante,”ti āha. Mahātherā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0202a:760_0: Daharasāmaṇerā āgantvā mahātherānaṃ sammukhāpi parihāsaṃ karonti. Upāsako āha – “bhante,
atk-s0202a:760_1: tumhe maṃ passitvā parihasatha, ettakeneva matthakaṃ pattamhāti mā sallakkhetha.
atk-s0202a:760_2: Ahampi pubbe tumhādisova samaṇo ahosiṃ. Tumhākaṃ pana cittekaggatāmattakampi natthi,
atk-s0202a:760_3: ahaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo ahosiṃ, ākāsaṃ gahetvā pathaviṃ karomi,
atk-s0202a:760_4: pathaviṃ ākāsaṃ. Dūraṃ gaṇhitvā santikaṃ karomi, santikaṃ dūraṃ. Cakkavāḷasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0202a:760_5: khaṇena vinivijjhāmi. Hatthe me passatha, idāni makkaṭahatthasadisā, ahaṃ imeheva
atk-s0202a:760_6: hatthehi idha nisinnova candimasūriye parāmasiṃ. Imesaṃyeva pādānaṃ candimasūriye
atk-s0202a:760_7: pādakathalikaṃ katvā nisīdiṃ. Evarūpā me iddhi pamādena antarahitā, tumhe mā pamajjittha.
atk-s0202a:760_8: Pamādena hi evarūpaṃ byasanaṃ pāpuṇanti. Appamattā viharantā jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ
atk-s0202a:760_9: karonti. Tasmā tumhe maññeva ārammaṇaṃ karitvā appamattā hotha, bhante,”ti tajjetvā
atk-s0202a:760_10: ovādamadāsi. Te tassa kathentasseva saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā vipassamānā tiṃsajanā tattheva
atk-s0202a:760_11: arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti. Evampi uppannā samathavipassanā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvattantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0202a:761_0: Anuppannānaṃ pāpakānanti cettha “anuppanno vā kāmāsavo na uppajjatī”tiādīsu vuttanayena
atk-s0202a:761_1: attho veditabbo. Uppannānaṃ pāpakānanti ettha pana catubbidhaṃ uppannaṃ vattamānuppannaṃ
atk-s0202a:761_2: bhutvāvigatuppannaṃ, okāsakatuppannaṃ, bhūmiladdhuppannanti. Tattha ye kilesā vijjamānā
atk-s0202a:761_3: uppādādisamaṅgino, idaṃ vattamānuppannaṃ nāma. Kamme pana javite ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0202a:761_4: niruddhavipāko bhutvā vigataṃ nāma. Kammaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhaṃ bhavitvā vigataṃ
atk-s0202a:761_5: nāma. Tadubhayampi bhutvāvigatuppannanti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ aññassa
atk-s0202a:761_6: kammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti, evaṃ kate okāse vipāko
atk-s0202a:761_7: uppajjamāno okāsakaraṇato paṭṭhāya uppannoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Idaṃ okāsakatuppannaṃ
atk-s0202a:761_8: nāma. Pañcakkhandhā pana vipassanāya bhūmi nāma. Te atītādibhedā honti. Tesu anusayitakilesā
atk-s0202a:761_9: pana atītā vā anāgatā vā paccuppannā vāti na vattabbā. Atītakhandhesu anusayitāpi
atk-s0202a:761_10: hi appahīnāva honti, anāgatakhandhesu, paccuppannakhandhesu anusayitāpi appahīnāva
atk-s0202a:761_11: honti. Idaṃ bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ nāma. Tenāhu porāṇā – “tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu asamugghātitakilesā
atk-s0202a:762_0: Aparampi catubbidhaṃ uppannaṃ samudācāruppannaṃ, ārammaṇādhigahituppannaṃ, avikkhambhituppannaṃ
atk-s0202a:762_1: asamugghātituppannanti. Tattha sampati vattamānaṃyeva samudācāruppannaṃ nāma. Sakiṃ
atk-s0202a:762_2: cakkhūni ummīletvā ārammaṇe nimitte gahite anussaritānussaritakkhaṇe kilesā nuppajjissantīti
atk-s0202a:762_3: na vattabbā. Kasmā? Ārammaṇassa adhigahitattā. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā khīrarukkhassa kuṭhāriyā
atk-s0202a:762_4: āhatāhataṭṭhāne khīraṃ na nikkhamissatīti na vattabbaṃ, evaṃ. Idaṃ ārammaṇādhigahituppannaṃ
atk-s0202a:762_5: nāma. Samāpattiyā avikkhambhitā kilesā pana imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne nuppajjissantīti na
atk-s0202a:762_6: vattabbā. Kasmā? Avikkhambhitattā. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā sace khīrarukkhe kuṭhāriyā āhaneyyuṃ,
atk-s0202a:762_7: imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne khīraṃ na nikkhameyyāti na vattabbaṃ, evaṃ. Idaṃ avikkhambhituppannaṃ
atk-s0202a:762_8: nāma. Maggena asamugghātitakilesā pana bhavagge nibbattassāpi uppajjantīti purimanayeneva
atk-s0202a:763_0: Imesu uppannesu vattamānuppannaṃ bhutvāvigatuppannaṃ okāsakatuppannaṃ samudācāruppannanti
atk-s0202a:763_1: catubbidhaṃ uppannaṃ na maggavajjhaṃ, bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ ārammaṇādhigahituppannaṃ
atk-s0202a:763_2: avikkhambhituppannaṃ asamugghātituppannanti catubbidhaṃ maggavajjhaṃ. Maggo hi uppajjamāno
atk-s0202a:763_3: ete kilese pajahati. So ye kilese pajahati, te atītā vā anāgatā vā paccuppannā vāti
atk-s0202a:764_0: “Hañci atīte kilese pajahati, tena hi khīṇaṃ khepeti, niruddhaṃ nirodheti, vigataṃ
atk-s0202a:764_1: vigameti atthaṅgataṃ atthaṅgameti. Atītaṃ yaṃ natthi, taṃ pajahati. Hañci anāgate
atk-s0202a:764_2: kilese pajahati, tena hi ajātaṃ pajahati, anibbattaṃ, anuppannaṃ, apātubhūtaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0202a:764_3: Anāgataṃ yaṃ natthi, taṃ pajahati, hañci paccuppanne kilese pajahati, tena hi ratto
atk-s0202a:764_4: rāgaṃ pajahati, duṭṭho dosaṃ, mūḷho mohaṃ, vinibaddho mānaṃ, parāmaṭṭho diṭṭhiṃ,
atk-s0202a:764_5: vikkhepagato uddhaccaṃ, aniṭṭhaṅgato vicikicchaṃ, thāmagato anusayaṃ pajahati. Kaṇhasukkadhammā
atk-s0202a:764_6: yuganaddhā samameva vattanti. Saṃkilesikā maggabhāvanā hoti…pe… tena hi natthi maggabhāvanā,
atk-s0202a:764_7: natthi phalasacchikiriyā, natthi kilesappahānaṃ, natthi dhammābhisamayoti. Atthi
atk-s0202a:764_8: maggabhāvanā…pe… atthi dhammābhisamayoti. Yathā kathaṃ viya, seyyathāpi taruṇo rukkho
atk-s0202a:765_0: Iti pāḷiyaṃ ajātaphalarukkho āgato, jātaphalarukkhena pana dīpetabbaṃ. Yathā hi saphalo
atk-s0202a:765_1: taruṇambarukkho, tassa phalāni manussā paribhuñjeyyuṃ, sesāni pātetvā pacchiyo pūreyyuṃ.
atk-s0202a:765_2: Athañño puriso taṃ pharasunā chindeyya, tenassa neva atītāni phalāni nāsitāni honti,
atk-s0202a:765_3: na anāgatapaccuppannāni nāsitāni. Atītāni hi manussehi paribhuttāni, anāgatāni anibbattāni,
atk-s0202a:765_4: na sakkā nāsetuṃ. Yasmiṃ pana samaye so chinno, tadā phalāniyeva natthīti paccuppannānipi
atk-s0202a:765_5: anāsitāni. Sace pana rukkho acchinno, athassa pathavīrasañca āporasañca āgamma yāni
atk-s0202a:765_6: phalāni nibbatteyyuṃ, tāni nāsitāni honti. Tāni hi ajātāneva na jāyanti, anibbattāneva
atk-s0202a:765_7: na nibbattanti, apātubhūtāneva na pātubhavanti, evameva maggo nāpi atītādibhede kilese
atk-s0202a:765_8: pajahati, nāpi na pajahati. Yesañhi kilesānaṃ maggena khandhesu apariññātesu uppatti
atk-s0202a:765_9: siyā, maggena uppajjitvā khandhānaṃ pariññātattā te kilesā ajātāva na jāyanti, anibbattāva
atk-s0202a:765_10: na nibbattanti, apātubhūtāva na pātubhavanti, taruṇaputtāya itthiyā puna avijāyanatthaṃ,
atk-s0202a:765_11: byādhitānaṃ rogavūpasamanatthaṃ pītabhesajjehi cāpi ayamattho vibhāvetabbo. Evaṃ
atk-s0202a:765_12: maggo ye kilese pajahati, te atītā vā anāgatā vā paccuppannā vāti na vattabbā, na
atk-s0202a:765_13: ca maggo kilese na pajahati. Ye pana maggo kilese pajahati, te sandhāya “uppannānaṃ
atk-s0202a:766_0: Na kevalañca maggo kileseyeva pajahati, kilesānaṃ pana appahīnattā ye ca uppajjeyyuṃ
atk-s0202a:766_1: upādinnakakkhandhā, tepi pajahatiyeva. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa
atk-s0202a:766_2: nirodhena satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge saṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca,
atk-s0202a:766_3: etthete nirujjhantī”ti vitthāro. Iti maggo upādinnaanupādinnato vuṭṭhāti. Bhavavasena
atk-s0202a:766_4: pana sotāpattimaggo apāyabhavato vuṭṭhāti, sakadāgāmimaggo sugatibhavekadesato, anāgāmimaggo
atk-s0202a:766_5: sugatikāmabhavato, arahattamaggo rūpārūpabhavato vuṭṭhāti. Sabbabhavehi vuṭṭhātiyevātipi vadanti.
atk-s0202a:767_0: Atha maggakkhaṇe kathaṃ anuppannānaṃ uppādāya bhāvanā hoti, kathaṃ vā uppannānaṃ
atk-s0202a:767_1: ṭhitiyāti. Maggappavattiyāyeva. Maggo hi pavattamāno pubbe anuppannapubbattā anuppanno
atk-s0202a:767_2: nāma vuccati. Anāgatapubbañhi ṭhānaṃ āgantvā ananubhūtapubbaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0202a:767_3: vattāro bhavanti “anāgataṭṭhānaṃ āgatamhā, ananubhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ anubhavāmā”ti. Yā
atk-s0202a:767_4: cassa pavatti, ayameva ṭhiti nāmāti ṭhitiyā bhāvetītipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0202a:768_0: Iddhipādesu saṅkhepakathā cetokhilasutte vuttā. Upasamamānaṃ gacchati, kilesūpasamatthaṃ
atk-s0202a:768_1: vā gacchatīti upasamagāmī. Sambujjhamānā gacchati, maggasambodhatthāya vā gacchatīti sambodhagāmī.
atk-s0202a:769: Vivekanissitādīni sabbāsavasaṃvare vuttāni. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato panāyaṃ bodhipakkhiyakathā visuddhimagge vuttā.
atk-s0202a:770_0: 248. Vimokkhakathāyaṃ vimokkheti kenaṭṭhena vimokkhā, adhimuccanaṭṭhena. Ko panāyaṃ
atk-s0202a:770_1: adhimuccanaṭṭho nāma? Paccanīkadhammehi ca suṭṭhu muccanaṭṭho, ārammaṇe ca abhirativasena
atk-s0202a:770_2: suṭṭhu muccanaṭṭho, pituaṅke vissaṭṭhaṅgapaccaṅgassa dārakassa sayanaṃ viya aniggahitabhāvena
atk-s0202a:770_3: nirāsaṅkatāya ārammaṇe pavattīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ panattho pacchimavimokkhe natthi,
atk-s0202a:770_4: purimesu sabbesu atthi. Rūpī rūpāni passatīti ettha ajjhattakesādīsu nīlakasiṇādivasena
atk-s0202a:770_5: uppāditaṃ rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ, tadassa atthīti rūpī. Bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti bahiddhāpi
atk-s0202a:770_6: nīlakasiṇādīni rūpāni jhānacakkhunā passati. Iminā ajjhatta bahiddhāvatthukesu kasiṇesu
atk-s0202a:771_0: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti ajjhattaṃ na rūpasaññī, attano kesādīsu anuppāditarūpāvacarajjhānoti
atk-s0202a:771_1: attho. Iminā bahiddhā parikammaṃ katvā bahiddhāva uppāditajjhānassa rūpāvacarajjhānāni
atk-s0202a:771_2: dassitāni. Subhanteva adhimutto hotīti iminā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu
atk-s0202a:771_3: jhānāni dassitāni. Tattha kiñcāpi antoappanāyaṃ subhanti ābhogo natthi, yo pana suvisuddhaṃ
atk-s0202a:771_4: subhakasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā viharati, so yasmā subhanti adhimutto hotīti vattabbataṃ
atk-s0202a:771_5: āpajjati, tasmā evaṃ desanā katā. Paṭisambhidāmagge pana “kathaṃ subhanteva adhimutto
atk-s0202a:771_6: hotīti vimokkho. Idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati…pe…
atk-s0202a:771_7: mettāya bhāvitattā sattā appaṭikūlā honti. Karuṇāsahagatena, muditāsahagatena, upekkhāsahagatena
atk-s0202a:771_8: cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati…pe… upekkhāya bhāvitattā sattā appaṭikūlā honti.
atk-s0202a:771_9: Evaṃ subhanteva adhimutto hotīti vimokkho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a:772_0: Sabbaso rūpasaññānantiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vuttameva. Ayaṃ
atk-s0202a:772_1: aṭṭhamo vimokkhoti ayaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ sabbaso vissaṭṭhattā vimuttattā aṭṭhamo
atk-s0202a:773_1: Paccanīkadhammepi ārammaṇānipi. Tāni hi paṭipakkhabhāvena paccanīkadhamme abhibhavanti,
atk-s0202a:773_2: puggalassa ñāṇuttaritāya ārammaṇāni. Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññītiādīsu pana ajjhattarūpe
atk-s0202a:773_3: parikammavasena ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī nāma hoti. Ajjhattañca nīlaparikammaṃ karonto
atk-s0202a:773_4: kese vā pitte vā akkhitārakāya vā karoti, pītaparikammaṃ karonto mede vā chaviyā
atk-s0202a:773_5: vā hatthatalapādatalesu vā akkhīnaṃ pītaṭṭhāne vā karoti, lohitaparikammaṃ karonto
atk-s0202a:773_6: maṃse vā lohite vā jivhāya vā akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhāne vā karoti, odātaparikammaṃ karonto
atk-s0202a:773_7: aṭṭhimhi vā dante vā nakhe vā akkhīnaṃ setaṭṭhāne vā karoti. Taṃ pana sunīlaṃ supītakaṃ
atk-s0202a:773_8: sulohitakaṃ suodātaṃ na hoti, asuvisuddhameva hoti.
atk-s0202a:774_0: Eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti yassetaṃ parikammaṃ ajjhattaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, nimittaṃ
atk-s0202a:774_1: pana bahiddhā, so evaṃ ajjhattaṃ parikammassa bahiddhā ca appanāya vasena – “ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0202a:774_2: rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti vuccati. Parittānīti avaḍḍhitāni. Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānīti
atk-s0202a:774_3: suvaṇṇāni vā hontu dubbaṇṇāni vā, parittavaseneva idamabhibhāyatanaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:774_4: Tāni abhibhuyyāti yathā nāma sampannagahaṇiko kaṭacchumattaṃ bhattaṃ labhitvā “kimettha
atk-s0202a:774_5: bhuñjitabbaṃ atthī”ti saṅkaḍḍhitvā ekakabaḷameva karoti, evamevaṃ ñāṇuttariko puggalo
atk-s0202a:774_6: visadañāṇo – “kimettha parittake ārammaṇe samāpajjitabbaṃ atthi, nāyaṃ mama bhāro”ti
atk-s0202a:774_7: tāni rūpāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati, saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetīti
atk-s0202a:774_8: attho. Jānāmi passāmīti iminā panassa ābhogo kathito, so ca kho samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa,
atk-s0202a:774_9: na antosamāpattiyaṃ. Evaṃsaññī hotīti ābhogasaññāyapi jhānasaññāyapi evaṃsaññī hoti.
atk-s0202a:774_10: Abhibhavasaññā hissa antosamāpattiyaṃ atthi, ābhogasaññā pana samāpattito vuṭṭhitasseva.
atk-s0202a:775_0: Appamāṇānīti vaḍḍhitappamāṇāni, mahantānīti attho. Abhibhuyyāti ettha pana yathā
atk-s0202a:775_1: mahagghaso puriso ekaṃ bhattavaḍḍhitakaṃ labhitvā “aññāpi hotu, aññāpi hotu, kimesā
atk-s0202a:775_2: mayhaṃ karissatī”ti taṃ na mahantato passati, evameva ñāṇuttaro puggalo visadañāṇo
atk-s0202a:775_3: “kimettha samāpajjitabbaṃ, nayidaṃ appamāṇaṃ, na mayhaṃ cittekaggatākaraṇe bhāro
atk-s0202a:775_4: atthī”ti tāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati, saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetīti attho.
atk-s0202a:776_0: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti alābhitāya vā anatthikatāya vā ajjhattarūpe parikammasaññāvirahito.
atk-s0202a:776_1: Eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti yassa parikammampi nimittampi bahiddhāva uppannaṃ,
atk-s0202a:776_2: so evaṃ bahiddhā parikammassa ceva appanāya ca vasena – “ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko
atk-s0202a:776_3: bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti vuccati. Sesamettha catutthābhibhāyatane vuttanayameva.
atk-s0202a:776_4: Imesu pana catūsu parittaṃ vitakkacaritavasena āgataṃ, appamāṇaṃ mohacaritavasena,
atk-s0202a:776_5: suvaṇṇaṃ dosacaritavasena, dubbaṇṇaṃ rāgacaritavasena. Etesañhi etāni sappāyāni.
atk-s0202a:776_6: Sā ca nesaṃ sappāyatā vitthārato visuddhimaggecariyaniddese vuttā.
atk-s0202a:777_0: Pañcamaabhibhāyatanādīsu nīlānīti sabbasaṅgāhikavasena vuttaṃ. Nīlavaṇṇānīti vaṇṇavasena.
atk-s0202a:777_2: hutvā dissantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Nīlanibhāsānīti idaṃ pana obhāsavasena vuttaṃ, nīlobhāsāni
atk-s0202a:777_3: nīlapabhāyuttānīti attho. Etena nesaṃ suvisuddhataṃ dasseti. Visuddhavaṇṇavaseneva
atk-s0202a:777_4: hi imāni cattāri abhibhāyatanāni vuttāni. Umāpupphanti etañhi pupphaṃ siniddhaṃ muduṃ
atk-s0202a:777_5: dissamānampi nīlameva hoti. Girikaṇṇikapupphādīni pana dissamānāni setadhātukāni
atk-s0202a:777_6: honti. Tasmā idameva gahitaṃ, na tāni. Bārāṇaseyyakanti bārāṇasiyaṃ bhavaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0202a:777_7: kira kappāsopi mudu, suttakantikāyopi tantavāyāpi chekā, udakampi suci siniddhaṃ,
atk-s0202a:777_8: tasmā vatthaṃ ubhatobhāgavimaṭṭhaṃ hoti, dvīsu passesu maṭṭhaṃ mudu siniddhaṃ khāyati.
atk-s0202a:777_9: Pītānītiādīsu imināva nayena attho veditabbo. “Nīlakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto nīlasmiṃ nimittaṃ
atk-s0202a:777_10: gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vā”tiādikaṃ panettha kasiṇakaraṇañceva
atk-s0202a:777_11: parikammañca appanāvidhānañca sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vitthārato vuttameva.
atk-s0202a:778_0: Abhiññāvosānapāramippattāti ito pubbesu satipaṭṭhānādīsu te dhamme bhāvetvā arahattappattāva
atk-s0202a:778_1: abhiññāvosānapāramippattā nāma honti, imesu pana aṭṭhasu abhibhāyatanesu ciṇṇavasībhāvāyeva
atk-s0202a:779_0: 250. Kasiṇakathāyaṃ sakalaṭṭhena kasiṇāni, tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ khettaṭṭhena
atk-s0202a:779_1: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vā āyatanāni. Uddhanti upari gaganatalābhimukhaṃ. Adhoti heṭṭhā
atk-s0202a:779_2: bhūmitalābhimukhaṃ. Tiriyanti khettamaṇḍalamiva samantā paricchinditvā. Ekacco hi
atk-s0202a:779_3: uddhameva kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍheti, ekacco adho, ekacco samantato. Tena tena kāraṇena evaṃ
atk-s0202a:779_4: pasāreti ālokamiva rūpadassanakāmo. Tena vuttaṃ – “pathavīkasiṇameko sañjānāti uddhaṃadhotiriya”nti.
atk-s0202a:779_5: Advayanti disāanudisāsu advayaṃ. Idaṃ pana ekassa aññabhāvānupagamanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a:779_6: Yathā hi udakaṃ paviṭṭhassa sabbadisāsu udakameva hoti anaññaṃ, evamevaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ
atk-s0202a:779_7: pathavīkasiṇameva hoti, natthi tassa añño kasiṇasambhedoti. Esa nayo sabbattha. Appamāṇanti
atk-s0202a:779_8: idaṃ tassa tassa pharaṇaappamāṇavasena vuttaṃ. Tañhi cetasā pharanto sakalameva pharati,
atk-s0202a:779_9: ayamassa ādi, idaṃ majjhanti pamāṇaṃ gaṇhātīti. Viññāṇakasiṇanti cettha kasiṇugghāṭimākāse
atk-s0202a:779_10: pavattaṃ viññāṇaṃ. Tattha kasiṇavasena kasiṇugghāṭimākāse, kasiṇugghāṭimākāsavasena
atk-s0202a:779_11: tattha pavattaviññāṇe uddhaṃadhotiriyatā veditabbā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayena
atk-s0202a:779_12: panetāni pathavīkasiṇādīni vitthārato visuddhimagge vuttāneva. Idhāpi ciṇṇavasibhāveneva
atk-s0202a:779_13: abhiññāvosānapāramippattā hontīti veditabbā. Tathā ito anantaresu catūsu jhānesu.
atk-s0202a:779_14: Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ mahāassapurasutte vuttameva.
atk-s0202a:780_0: 252. Vipassanāñāṇe pana rūpītiādīnamattho vuttoyeva. Ettha sitamettha paṭibaddhanti
atk-s0202a:780_1: ettha cātumahābhūtike kāye nissitañca paṭibaddhañca. Subhoti sundaro. Jātimāti suparisuddhaākarasamuṭṭhito.
atk-s0202a:780_2: Suparikammakatoti suṭṭhu kataparikammo apanītapāsāṇasakkharo. Acchoti tanucchavi.
atk-s0202a:780_3: Vippasannoti suṭṭhu vippasanno. Sabbākārasampannoti dhovana vedhanādīhi sabbehi ākārehi
atk-s0202a:780_4: sampanno. Nīlantiādīhi vaṇṇasampattiṃ dasseti. Tādisañhi āvutaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0202a:781_0: Evameva khoti ettha evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ – maṇi viya hi karajakāyo. Āvutasuttaṃ
atk-s0202a:781_1: viya vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Cakkhumā puriso viya vipassanālābhī bhikkhu. Hatthe karitvā
atk-s0202a:781_2: paccavekkhato “ayaṃ kho maṇī”ti maṇino āvibhūtakālo viya vipassanāñāṇaṃ abhinīharitvā
atk-s0202a:781_3: nisinnassa bhikkhuno cātumahābhūtikakāyassa āvibhūtakālo. “Tatridaṃ suttaṃ āvuta”nti
atk-s0202a:781_4: suttassa āvibhūtakālo viya vipassanāñāṇaṃ abhinīharitvā nisinnassa bhikkhuno tadārammaṇānaṃ
atk-s0202a:781_5: phassapañcamakānaṃ vā sabbacittacetasikānaṃ vā vipassanāñāṇasseva vā āvibhūtakāloti.
atk-s0202a:782_0: Kiṃ panetaṃ ñāṇassa āvibhūtaṃ, puggalassāti. Ñāṇassa, tassa pana āvibhāvattā puggalassa
atk-s0202a:782_1: āvibhūtāva honti. Idañca vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggassa anantaraṃ, evaṃ santepi yasmā abhiññāvāre
atk-s0202a:782_2: āraddhe etassa antarāvāro natthi, tasmā idheva dassitaṃ. Yasmā ca aniccādivasena
atk-s0202a:782_3: akatasammasanassa dibbāya sotadhātuyā bheravasaddaṃ suṇanto pubbenivāsānussatiyā
atk-s0202a:782_4: bherave khandhe anussarato dibbena cakkhunā bheravarūpaṃ passato bhayasantāso uppajjati,
atk-s0202a:782_5: na aniccādivasena katasammasanassa, tasmā abhiññāpattassa bhayavinodakahetusampādanatthampi
atk-s0202a:782_6: idaṃ idheva dassitaṃ. Idhāpi arahattavaseneva abhiññāvosānapāramippattatā veditabbā.
atk-s0202a:783_0: 253. Manomayiddhiyaṃ ciṇṇavasitāya. Tattha manomayanti manena nibbattaṃ. Sabbaṅgapaccaṅginti
atk-s0202a:783_1: sabbehi aṅgehi ca paccaṅgehi ca samannāgataṃ. Ahīnindriyanti saṇṭhānavasena avikalindriyaṃ.
atk-s0202a:783_2: Iddhimatā nimmitarūpañhi sace iddhimā odāto, tampi odātaṃ. Sace aviddhakaṇṇo, tampi
atk-s0202a:783_3: aviddhakaṇṇanti evaṃ sabbākārehi tena sadisameva hoti. Muñjamhā īsikantiādi upamattayampi
atk-s0202a:783_4: taṃ sadisabhāvadassanatthameva vuttaṃ. Muñjasadisā eva hi tassa anto īsikā hoti.
atk-s0202a:783_5: Kosasadisoyeva asi, vaṭṭāya kosiyā vaṭṭaṃ asimeva pakkhipanti, patthaṭāya patthaṭaṃ.
atk-s0202a:784_0: Karaṇḍāti idampi ahikañcukassa nāmaṃ, na vilīvakaraṇḍakassa. Ahikañcuko hi ahinā
atk-s0202a:784_1: sadisova hoti. Tattha kiñcāpi “puriso ahiṃ karaṇḍā uddhareyyā”ti hatthena uddharamāno
atk-s0202a:784_2: viya dassito, atha kho cittenevassa uddharaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ayañhi ahi nāma sajātiyaṃ
atk-s0202a:784_3: ṭhito, kaṭṭhantaraṃ vā rukkhantaraṃ vā nissāya, tacato sarīranikkaḍḍhanapayogasaṅkhātena
atk-s0202a:784_4: thāmena, sarīraṃ khādamānaṃ viya purāṇatacaṃ jigucchantoti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi
atk-s0202a:784_5: sayameva kañcukaṃ jahāti, na sakkā tato aññena uddharituṃ. Tasmā cittena uddharaṇaṃ
atk-s0202a:784_6: sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Iti muñjādisadisaṃ imassa bhikkhuno sarīraṃ, īsikādisadisaṃ
atk-s0202a:784_7: nimmitarūpanti idamettha opammasaṃsandanaṃ. Nimmānavidhānaṃ panettha parato ca iddhividhādipañcaabhiññākathā
atk-s0202a:784_8: sabbākārena visuddhimagge vitthāritāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Upamāmattameva hi idha adhikaṃ.
atk-s0202a:785_0: Tattha chekakumbhakārādayo viya iddhividhañāṇalābhī bhikkhu daṭṭhabbo. Suparikammakatamattikādayo
atk-s0202a:785_1: viya iddhividhañāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Icchiticchitabhājanavikatiādikaraṇaṃ viya tassa
atk-s0202a:785_2: bhikkhuno vikubbanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idhāpi ciṇṇavasitāvaseneva abhiññāvosānapāramippattatā
atk-s0202a:785_3: veditabbā. Tathā ito parāsu catūsu abhiññāsu.
atk-s0202a:786_1: niddukkheneva. Viññāpeyyāti jānāpeyya. Tattha evaṃ cātuddisā viññāpente saṅkhadhamake
atk-s0202a:786_2: “saṅkhasaddo aya”nti vavatthāpentānaṃ sattānaṃ tassa saṅkhasaddassa āvibhūtakālo
atk-s0202a:786_3: viya yogino dūrasantikabhedānaṃ dibbānañceva mānusakānañca saddānaṃ āvibhūtakālo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0202a:787_0: 256. Cetopariyañāṇa-upamāyaṃ daharoti taruṇo. Yuvāti yobbanena samannāgato. Maṇḍanakajātikoti
atk-s0202a:787_1: yuvāpi samāno na alasiyo kiliṭṭhavatthasarīro, atha kho maṇḍanakapakatiko, divasassa
atk-s0202a:787_2: dve tayo vāre nhāyitvā suddhavattha-paridahana-alaṅkārakaraṇasīloti attho. Sakaṇikanti
atk-s0202a:787_3: kāḷatilakavaṅka-mukhadūsipīḷakādīnaṃ aññatarena sadosaṃ. Tattha yathā tassa mukhanimittaṃ
atk-s0202a:787_4: paccavekkhato mukhadoso pākaṭo hoti, evaṃ cetopariyañāṇāya cittaṃ abhinīharitvā nisinnassa
atk-s0202a:787_5: bhikkhuno paresaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ cittaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ. Pubbenivāsaupamādīsu
atk-s0202a:787_6: yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ mahāassapure vuttameva.
atk-s0202a:788_0: 259. Ayaṃ kho udāyi pañcamo dhammoti ekūnavīsati pabbāni paṭipadāvasena ekaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0202a:788_1: katvā pañcamo dhammoti vutto. Yathā hi aṭṭhakanāgarasutte ekādasa pabbāni pucchāvasena
atk-s0202a:788_2: ekadhammo kato, evamidha ekūnavīsati pabbāni paṭipadāvasena eko dhammo katoti veditabbāni.
atk-s0202a:788_3: Imesu ca pana ekūnavīsatiyā pabbesu paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhasu koṭṭhāsesu vipassanāñāṇe ca
atk-s0202a:788_4: āsavakkhayañāṇe ca arahattavasena abhiññāvosānapāramippattatā veditabbā, sesesu ciṇṇavasibhāvavasena.
atk-s0202a:792_0: 260. Evaṃ me sutanti samaṇamuṇḍikasuttaṃ. Tattha uggāhamānoti tassa paribbājakassa
atk-s0202a:792_1: nāmaṃ. Sumanoti pakatināmaṃ. Kiñci kiñci pana uggahituṃ uggāhetuṃ samatthatāya uggāhamānoti
atk-s0202a:792_2: naṃ sañjānanti. Samayaṃ pavadanti etthāti samayappavādakaṃ. Tasmiṃ kira ṭhāne caṅkītārukkhapokkharasātippabhutayo
atk-s0202a:792_3: brāhmaṇā nigaṇṭhācelakaparibbājakādayo ca pabbajitā sannipatitvā attano attano samayaṃ
atk-s0202a:792_4: pavadanti kathenti dīpenti, tasmā so ārāmo samayappavādakoti vuccati. Sveva tindukācīrasaṅkhātāya
atk-s0202a:792_5: timbarūsakarukkhapantiyā parikkhittattā tindukācīraṃ. Yasmā panettha paṭhamaṃ ekā
atk-s0202a:792_6: sālā ahosi, pacchā mahāpuññaṃ poṭṭhapādaparibbājakaṃ nissāya bahū sālā katā, tasmā
atk-s0202a:792_7: tameva ekaṃ sālaṃ upādāya laddhanāmavasena ekasālakoti vuccati. Mallikāya pana pasenadirañño
atk-s0202a:792_8: deviyā uyyānabhūto so pupphaphalasañchanno ārāmoti katvā mallikāya ārāmoti saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0202a:792_9: gato. Tasmiṃ samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya ārāme. Paṭivasatīti
atk-s0202a:792_10: vāsaphāsutāya vasati. Divā divassāti divasassa divā nāma majjhanhātikkamo, tasmiṃ
atk-s0202a:792_11: divasassapi divābhūte atikkantamatte majjhanhike nikkhamīti attho. Paṭisallīnoti
atk-s0202a:792_12: tato tato rūpādigocarato cittaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā līno, jhānaratisevanavasena ekībhāvaṃ
atk-s0202a:792_13: gato. Manobhāvanīyānanti manavaḍḍhanakānaṃ, ye āvajjato manasikaroto cittaṃ vinīvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0202a:792_14: hoti unnamati vaḍḍhati. Yāvatāti yattakā. Ayaṃ tesaṃ aññataroti ayaṃ tesaṃ abbhantaro
atk-s0202a:792_15: eko sāvako. Appeva nāmāti tassa upasaṅkamanaṃ patthayamāno āha. Patthanākāraṇaṃ pana
atk-s0202a:793_0: 261. Etadavocāti dandapañño ayaṃ gahapati, dhammakathāya naṃ saṅgaṇhitvā attano sāvakaṃ
atk-s0202a:793_1: karissāmīti maññamāno etaṃ “catūhi kho”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Tattha paññpemīti dassemi
atk-s0202a:793_2: ṭhapemi. Sampannakusalanti paripuṇṇakusalaṃ. Paramakusalanti uttamakusalaṃ. Ayojjhanti
atk-s0202a:793_3: vādayuddhena yujjhitvā cāletuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ acalaṃ nikkampaṃ thiraṃ. Na karotīti
atk-s0202a:793_4: akaraṇamattameva vadati, ettha pana saṃvarappahānaṃ vā paṭisevanappahānaṃ vā na vadati.
atk-s0202a:794_0: Neva abhinandīti titthiyā nāma jānitvāpi ajānitvāpi yaṃ vā taṃ vā vadantīti maññamāno
atk-s0202a:794_1: nābhinandi. Na paṭikkosīti sāsanassa anulomaṃ viya pasannākāraṃ viya vadatīti maññamāno na paṭisedheti.
atk-s0202a:795_0: 262. Yathā uggāhamānassāti yathā tassa vacanaṃ, evaṃ sante uttānaseyyako kumāro ayojjhasamaṇo
atk-s0202a:795_1: thirasamaṇo bhavissati, mayaṃ pana evaṃ na vadāmāti dīpeti. Kāyotipi na hotīti sakakāyo
atk-s0202a:795_2: parakāyotipi visesañāṇaṃ na hoti. Aññatra phanditamattāti paccattharaṇe valisamphassena
atk-s0202a:795_3: vā maṅguladaṭṭhena vā kāyaphandanamattaṃ nāma hoti. Taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ kāyena karaṇakammaṃ
atk-s0202a:795_4: nāma natthi. Tampi ca kilesasahagatacitteneva hoti. Vācātipi na hotīti micchāvācā
atk-s0202a:795_5: sammāvācātipi nānattaṃ na hoti. Roditamattāti jighacchāpipāsāparetassa pana roditamattaṃ
atk-s0202a:795_6: hoti. Tampi kilesasahagatacitteneva. Saṅkappoti micchāsaṅkappo sammāsaṅkappotipi
atk-s0202a:795_7: nānattaṃ na hoti. Vikūjitamattāti vikūjitamattaṃ rodanahasitamattaṃ hoti. Daharakumārakānañhi
atk-s0202a:795_8: cittaṃ atītārammaṇaṃ pavattati, nirayato āgatā nirayadukkhaṃ saritvā rodanti, devalokato
atk-s0202a:795_9: āgatā hasanti, tampi kilesasahagatacitteneva hoti. Ājīvoti micchājīvo sammājīvotipi
atk-s0202a:795_10: nānattaṃ na hoti. Aññatra mātuthaññāti thaññacoradārakā nāma honti, mātari khīraṃ
atk-s0202a:795_11: pāyantiyā apivitvā aññavihitakāle piṭṭhipassena āgantvā thaññaṃ pivanti. Ettakaṃ
atk-s0202a:795_12: muñcitvā añño micchājīvo natthi. Ayampi kilesasahagatacitteneva hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0202a:796_0: 263. Evaṃ paribbājakavādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā idāni sayaṃ sekkhabhūmiyaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapento
atk-s0202a:796_1: catūhi kho ahantiādimāha. Tattha samadhigayha tiṭṭhatīti visesetvā tiṭṭhati. Na kāyena
atk-s0202a:796_2: pāpa kammantiādīsu na kevalaṃ akaraṇamattameva, bhagavā pana ettha saṃvarappahānapaṭisaṅkhā
atk-s0202a:796_3: paññapeti. Taṃ sandhāyevamāha. Na ceva sampannakusalantiādi pana khīṇāsavaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a:797_0: Idāni asekkhabhūmiyaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapento dasahi kho ahantiādimāha. Tattha tīṇi padāni
atk-s0202a:797_1: nissāya dve paṭhamacatukkā ṭhapitā, ekaṃ padaṃ nissāya dve pacchimacatukkā. Ayaṃ
atk-s0202a:798_0: 264. Idāni taṃ vibhajanto katame ca thapati akusalasīlātiādimāha. Tattha sarāganti
atk-s0202a:798_3: uppajjatīti hi vuttaṃ. Itosamuṭṭhānāti ito sarāgādicittato samuṭṭhānaṃ uppatti etesanti itosamuṭṭhānā.
atk-s0202a:799_0: Kuhinti kataraṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇitvā aparisesā nirujjhanti. Ettheteti sotāpattiphale
atk-s0202a:799_1: bhummaṃ. Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlañhi sotāpattiphale paripuṇṇaṃ hoti, taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā
atk-s0202a:799_2: akusalasīlaṃ asesaṃ nirujjhati. Akusalasīlanti ca dussīlassetaṃ adhivacananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:800: Akusalānaṃ sīlānaṃ nirodhāya paṭipannoti ettha yāva sotāpattimaggā nirodhāya paṭipanno nāma hoti, phalapatte pana te nirodhitā nāma honti.
atk-s0202a:801: 265. Vītarāgantiādīhi aṭṭhavidhaṃ kāmāvacarakusalacittameva vuttaṃ. Etena hi kusalasīlaṃ samuṭṭhāti.
atk-s0202a:802_0: Sīlavā hotīti sīlasampanno hoti guṇasampanno ca. No ca sīlamayoti alamettāvatā, natthi
atk-s0202a:802_1: ito kiñci uttari karaṇīyanti evaṃ sīlamayo na hoti. Yatthassa teti arahattaphale
atk-s0202a:802_2: bhummaṃ. Arahattaphalañhi patvā akusalasīlaṃ asesaṃ nirujjhati.
atk-s0202a:803: Nirodhāya paṭipannoti ettha yāva arahattamaggā nirodhāya paṭipanno nāma hoti, phalapatte pana te nirodhitā nāma honti.
atk-s0202a:804: 266. Kāmasaññādīsu kāmasaññā aṭṭhalobhasahagatacittasahajātā, itarā dve domanassasahagatacittadvayena sahajātā.
atk-s0202a:805: Paṭhamaṃ jhānanti anāgāmiphalapaṭhamajjhānaṃ. Ettheteti anāgāmiphale bhummaṃ. Anāgāmiphalañhi patvā akusalasaṅkappā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
atk-s0202a:806_0: Nirodhāya paṭipannoti ettha yāva anāgāmimaggā nirodhāya paṭipanno nāma hoti, phalapatte
atk-s0202a:806_1: pana te nirodhitā nāma honti. Nekkhammasaññādayo hi tissopi aṭṭhakāmāvacarakusalasahajātasaññāva.
atk-s0202a:807_0: 267. Ettheteti arahattaphale bhummaṃ. Dutiyajjhānikaṃ arahattaphalañhi pāpuṇitvā
atk-s0202a:807_1: kusalasaṅkappā aparisesā nirujjhanti. Nirodhāya paṭipannoti ettha yāva arahattamaggā
atk-s0202a:807_2: nirodhāya paṭipanno nāma hoti, phalapatte pana te nirodhitā nāma honti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0202a:811: 270. Evaṃ me sutanti cūḷasakuludāyisuttaṃ. Tattha yadā pana, bhante, bhagavāti idaṃ paribbājako dhammakathaṃ sotukāmo bhagavato dhammadesanāya sālayabhāvaṃ dassento āha.
atk-s0202a:812_0: 271. Taṃyevettha paṭibhātūti sace dhammaṃ sotukāmo, tuyhevettha eko pañho ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0202a:812_1: upaṭṭhātu. Yathā maṃ paṭibhāseyyāti yena kāraṇena mama dhammadesanā upaṭṭhaheyya,
atk-s0202a:812_2: etena hi kāraṇena kathāya samuṭṭhitāya sukhaṃ dhammaṃ desetunti dīpeti. Tassa mayhaṃ,
atk-s0202a:812_3: bhanteti so kira taṃ disvā – “sace bhagavā idha abhavissā, ayametassa bhāsitassa
atk-s0202a:812_4: atthoti dīpasahassaṃ viya ujjalāpetvā ajja me pākaṭaṃ akarissā”ti dasabalaṃyeva anussari.
atk-s0202a:812_5: Tasmā tassa mayhaṃ, bhantetiādimāha. Tattha aho nūnāti anussaraṇatthe nipātadvayaṃ.
atk-s0202a:812_6: Tena tassa bhagavantaṃ anussarantassa etadahosi “aho nūna bhagavā aho nūna sugato”ti.
atk-s0202a:812_7: Yo imesanti yo imesaṃ dhammānaṃ. Sukusaloti suṭṭhu kusalo nipuṇo cheko. So bhagavā
atk-s0202a:812_8: aho nūna katheyya, so sugato aho nūna katheyya, tassa hi bhagavato pubbenivāsañāṇassa
atk-s0202a:812_9: anekāni kappakoṭisahassāni ekaṅgaṇāni pākaṭānīti, ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0202a:813_0: Tassa vāhaṃ pubbantaṃ ārabbhāti yo hi lābhī hoti, so “pubbe tvaṃ khattiyo ahosi,
atk-s0202a:813_1: brāhmaṇo ahosī”ti vutte jānanto sakkaccaṃ sussūsati. Alābhī pana – “evaṃ bhavissati
atk-s0202a:813_2: evaṃ bhavissatī”ti sīsakampamettameva dasseti. Tasmā evamāha – “tassa vāhaṃ pubbantaṃ
atk-s0202a:814: So vā maṃ aparantanti dibbacakkhulābhino hi anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ ijjhati, tasmā evamāha. Itaraṃ pubbe vuttanayameva.
atk-s0202a:815_0: Dhammaṃ te desessāmīti ayaṃ kira atīte desiyamānepi na bujjhissati, anāgate desiyamānepi
atk-s0202a:815_1: na bujjhissati. Athassa bhagavā saṇhasukhumaṃ paccayākāraṃ desetukāmo evamāha. Kiṃ
atk-s0202a:815_2: pana taṃ bujjhissatīti? Etaṃ pageva na bujjhissati, anāgate panassa vāsanāya paccayo
atk-s0202a:816_0: Paṃsupisācakanti asuciṭṭhāne nibbattapisācaṃ. So hi ekaṃ mūlaṃ gahetvā adissamānakāyo
atk-s0202a:816_1: hoti. Tatridaṃ vatthu – ekā kira yakkhinī dve dārake thūpārāmadvāre nisīdāpetvā āhārapariyesanatthaṃ
atk-s0202a:816_2: nagaraṃ gatā. Dārakā ekaṃ piṇḍapātikattheraṃ disvā āhaṃsu, – “bhante, amhākaṃ mātā
atk-s0202a:816_3: anto nagaraṃ paviṭṭhā, tassā vadeyyātha ‘yaṃ vā taṃ vā laddhakaṃ, gahetvā sīghaṃ
atk-s0202a:816_4: gaccha, dārakā te jighacchitaṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkontī”’ti. Tamahaṃ kathaṃ passissāmīti?
atk-s0202a:816_5: Idaṃ, bhante, gaṇhathāti ekaṃ mūlakhaṇḍaṃ adaṃsu. Therassa anekāni yakkhasahassāni
atk-s0202a:816_6: paññāyiṃsu, so dārakehi dinnasaññāṇena taṃ yakkhiniṃ addasa virūpaṃ bībhacchaṃ kevalaṃ
atk-s0202a:816_7: vīthiyaṃ gabbhamalaṃ paccāsīsamānaṃ. Disvā tamatthaṃ kathesi. Kathaṃ maṃ tvaṃ passasīti
atk-s0202a:816_8: vutte mūlakhaṇḍaṃ dassesi, sā acchinditvā gaṇhi. Evaṃ paṃsupisācakā ekaṃ mūlaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0202a:816_9: adissamānakāyā honti. Taṃ sandhāyesa “paṃsupisācakampi na passāmī”ti āha. Na pakkhāyatīti
atk-s0202a:817_0: 272. Dīghāpi kho te esāti udāyi esā tava vācā dīghāpi bhaveyya, evaṃ vadantassa vassasatampi
atk-s0202a:817_1: vassasahassampi pavatteyya, na ca atthaṃ dīpeyyāti adhippāyo. Appāṭihīrakatanti aniyyānikaṃ
atk-s0202a:818_0: Idāni taṃ vaṇṇaṃ dassento seyyathāpi, bhantetiādimāha. Tattha paṇḍukambale nikkhittoti
atk-s0202a:818_1: visabhāgavaṇṇe rattakambale ṭhapito. Evaṃvaṇṇo attā hotīti idaṃ so subhakiṇhadevaloke
atk-s0202a:818_2: nibbattakkhandhe sandhāya – “amhākaṃ matakāle attā subhakiṇhadevaloke khandhā viya jotetī”ti vadati.
atk-s0202a:819_0: 273. Ayaṃ imesaṃ ubhinnanti so kira yasmā maṇissa bahi ābhā na niccharati, khajjopanakassa
atk-s0202a:820_0: Viddheti ubbiddhe, meghavigamena dūrībhūteti attho. Vigatavalāhaketi apagatameghe.
atk-s0202a:820_1: Deveti ākāse. Osadhitārakāti sukkatārakā. Sā hi yasmā tassā udayato paṭṭhāya tena
atk-s0202a:820_2: saññāṇena osadhāni gaṇhantipi pivantipi, tasmā “osadhitārakā”ti vuccati. Abhido aḍḍharattasamayanti
atk-s0202a:820_3: abhinne aḍḍharattasamaye. Iminā gaganamajjhe ṭhitacandaṃ dasseti. Abhido majjhanhikepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0202a:821: Ato khoti ye anubhonti, tehi bahutarā, bahū ceva bahutarā cāti attho. Ābhā nānubhontīti obhāsaṃ na vaḷañjanti, attano sarīrobhāseneva ālokaṃ pharitvā viharanti.
atk-s0202a:822_0: 274. Idāni yasmā so “ekantasukhaṃ lokaṃ pucchissāmī”ti nisinno, pucchāmūḷho pana
atk-s0202a:822_1: jāto, tasmā naṃ bhagavā taṃ pucchaṃ sarāpento kiṃ pana, udāyi, atthi ekantasukho
atk-s0202a:822_2: lokotiādimāha. Tattha ākāravatīti kāraṇavatī. Aññataraṃ vā pana tapoguṇanti acelakapāḷiṃ
atk-s0202a:823_0: 275. Katamā pana sā, bhante, ākāravatī paṭipadā ekantasukhassāti kasmā pucchati?
atk-s0202a:823_1: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “mayaṃ sattānaṃ ekantasukhaṃ vadāma, paṭipadaṃ pana kālena sukhaṃ
atk-s0202a:823_2: kālena dukkhaṃ vadāma. Ekantasukhassa kho pana attano paṭipadāyapi ekantasukhāya
atk-s0202a:823_3: bhavitabbaṃ. Amhākaṃ kathā aniyyānikā, satthu kathāva niyyānikā”ti. Idāni satthāraṃyeva
atk-s0202a:824_0: Ettha mayaṃ anassāmāti etasmiṃ kāraṇe mayaṃ anassāma. Kasmā pana evamāhaṃsu? Te kira
atk-s0202a:824_1: pubbe pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā tatiyajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0202a:824_2: aparihīnajjhānā kālaṃ katvā subhakiṇhesu nibbattantīti jānanti, gacchante gacchante
atk-s0202a:824_3: pana kāle kasiṇaparikammampi na jāniṃsu, tatiyajjhānampi nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0202a:824_4: Pañca pubbabhāgadhamme pana “ākāravatī paṭipadā”ti uggahetvā tatiyajjhānaṃ “ekantasukho
atk-s0202a:824_5: loko”ti uggaṇhiṃsu. Tasmā evamāhaṃsu. Uttaritaranti ito pañcahi dhammehi uttaritaraṃ
atk-s0202a:824_6: paṭipadaṃ vā tatiyajjhānato uttaritaraṃ ekantasukhaṃ lokaṃ vā na jānāmāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0202a:824_7: hoti. Appasadde katvāti ekappahāreneva mahāsaddaṃ kātuṃ āraddhe nissadde katvā.
atk-s0202a:825_0: 276. Sacchikiriyāhetūti ettha dve sacchikiriyā paṭilābhasacchikiriyā ca paccakkhasacchikiriyā
atk-s0202a:825_1: ca. Tattha tatiyajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā subhakiṇhaloke tesaṃ
atk-s0202a:825_2: devānaṃ samānāyuvaṇṇo hutvā nibbattati, ayaṃ paṭilābhasacchikiriyā nāma. Catutthajjhānaṃ
atk-s0202a:825_3: nibbattetvā iddhivikubbanena subhakiṇhalokaṃ gantvā tehi devehi saddhiṃ santiṭṭhati
atk-s0202a:825_4: sallapati sākacchaṃ āpajjati, ayaṃ paccakkhasacchikiriyā nāma. Tāsaṃ dvinnampi tatiyajjhānaṃ
atk-s0202a:825_5: ākāravatī paṭipadā nāma. Tañhi anuppādetvā neva sakkā subhakiṇhaloke nibbattituṃ,
atk-s0202a:825_6: na catutthajjhānaṃ uppādetuṃ. Iti duvidhampetaṃ sacchikiriyaṃ sandhāya – “etassa
atk-s0202a:825_7: nūna, bhante, ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyāhetū”ti āha.
atk-s0202a:826_0: 277. Udañcanikoti udakavārako. Antarāyamakāsīti yathā pabbajjaṃ na labhati, evaṃ
atk-s0202a:826_1: upaddutamakāsi yathā taṃ upanissayavipannaṃ. Ayaṃ kira kassapabuddhakāle pabbajitvā
atk-s0202a:826_2: samaṇadhammamakāsi. Athassa eko sahāyako bhikkhu sāsane anabhirato, “āvuso, vibbhamissāmī”ti
atk-s0202a:826_3: ārocesi. So tassa pattacīvare lobhaṃ uppādetvā gihibhāvāya vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi. Itaro tassa
atk-s0202a:826_4: pattacīvaraṃ datvā vibbhami. Tenassa kammunā idāni bhagavato sammukhā pabbajjāya
atk-s0202a:826_5: antarāyo jāto. Bhagavatā panassa purimasuttaṃ atirekabhāṇavāramattaṃ, idaṃ bhāṇavāramattanti
atk-s0202a:826_6: ettakāya tantiyā dhammo kathito, ekadesanāyapi maggaphalapaṭivedho na jāto, anāgate
atk-s0202a:826_7: panassa paccayo bhavissatīti bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti. Anāgate paccayabhāvañcassa disvā
atk-s0202a:826_8: bhagavā dharamāno ekaṃ bhikkhumpi mettāvihārimhi etadagge na ṭhapesi. Passati hi
atk-s0202a:826_9: bhagavā – “anāgate ayaṃ mama sāsane pabbajitvā mettāvihārīnaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0202a:827_0: So bhagavati parinibbute dhammāsokarājakāle pāṭaliputte nibbattitvā pabbajitvā arahattappatto
atk-s0202a:827_1: assaguttatthero nāma hutvā mettāvihārīnaṃ aggo ahosi. Therassa mettānubhāvena tiracchānagatāpi
atk-s0202a:827_2: mettacittaṃ paṭilabhiṃsu, thero sakalajambudīpe bhikkhusaṅghassa ovādācariyo hutvā
atk-s0202a:827_3: vattanisenāsane āvasi, tiṃsayojanamattā aṭavī ekaṃ padhānagharaṃ ahosi. Thero ākāse
atk-s0202a:827_4: cammakhaṇḍaṃ pattharitvā tattha nisinno kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. Gacchante gacchante
atk-s0202a:827_5: kāle bhikkhācārampi agantvā vihāre nisinno kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi, manussā vihārameva
atk-s0202a:827_6: gantvā dānamadaṃsu. Dhammāsokarājā therassa guṇaṃ sutvā daṭṭhukāmo tikkhattuṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0202a:827_7: Thero bhikkhusaṅghassa ovādaṃ dammīti ekavārampi na gatoti.
atk-s0202a:831_0: 278. Evaṃ me sutanti vekhanasasuttaṃ. Tattha vekhanasoti ayaṃ kira sakuludāyissa
atk-s0202a:831_1: ācariyo, so “sakuludāyī paribbājako paramavaṇṇapañhe parājito”ti sutvā “mayā so sādhukaṃ
atk-s0202a:831_2: uggahāpito, tenāpi sādhukaṃ uggahitaṃ, kathaṃ nu kho parājito, handāhaṃ sayaṃ gantvā
atk-s0202a:831_3: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ paramavaṇṇapañhaṃ pucchitvā jānissāmī”ti rājagahato pañcacattālīsayojanaṃ
atk-s0202a:831_4: sāvatthiṃ gantvā yena bhagavā, tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā pana ṭhitakova bhagavato
atk-s0202a:831_5: santike udānaṃ udānesi. Tattha purimasadisaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:832_0: 280. Pañca kho imeti kasmā ārabhi? Agāriyopi ekacco kāmagaruko kāmādhimutto hoti,
atk-s0202a:832_1: ekacco nekkhammagaruko nekkhammādhimutto hoti. Pabbajitopi ca ekacco kāmagaruko kāmādhimutto
atk-s0202a:832_2: hoti, ekacco nekkhammagaruko nekkhammādhimutto hoti. Ayaṃ pana kāmagaruko kāmādhimutto
atk-s0202a:832_3: hoti. So imāya kathāya kathiyamānāya attano kāmādhimuttattaṃ sallakkhessati, evamassāyaṃ
atk-s0202a:832_4: desanā sappāyā bhavissatīti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Kāmaggasukhanti nibbānaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0202a:833_0: 281. Pāpito bhavissatīti ajānanabhāvaṃ pāpito bhavissati. Nāmakaṃyeva sampajjatīti
atk-s0202a:833_1: niratthakavacanamattameva sampajjati. Tiṭṭhatu pubbanto tiṭṭhatu aparantoti yasmā
atk-s0202a:833_2: tuyhaṃ atītakathāya anucchavikaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ natthi, anāgatakathāya anucchavikaṃ
atk-s0202a:833_3: dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ natthi, tasmā ubhayampetaṃ tiṭṭhatūti āha. Suttabandhanehīti suttamayabandhanehi.
atk-s0202a:833_4: Tassa hi ārakkhatthāya hatthapādesu ceva gīvāya ca suttakāni bandhanti. Tāni sandhāyetaṃ
atk-s0202a:833_5: vuttaṃ. Mahallakakāle panassa tāni sayaṃ vā pūtīni hutvā muñcanti, chinditvā vā haranti.
atk-s0202a:834_0: Evameva khoti iminā idaṃ dasseti – daharassa kumārassa suttabandhanānaṃ ajānanakālo
atk-s0202a:834_1: viya avijjāya purimāya koṭiyā ajānanaṃ, na hi sakkā avijjāya purimakoṭi ñātuṃ, mocanakāle
atk-s0202a:834_2: jānanasadisaṃ pana arahattamaggena avijjābandhanassa pamokkho jātoti jānanaṃ. Sesaṃ
atk-s0202a:840_0: 282. Evaṃ me sutanti ghaṭikārasuttaṃ. Tattha sitaṃ pātvākāsīti mahāmaggena gacchanto
atk-s0202a:840_1: aññataraṃ bhūmippadesaṃ oloketvā – “atthi nu kho mayā cariyaṃ caramānena imasmiṃ
atk-s0202a:840_2: ṭhāne nivutthapubba”nti āvajjanto addasa – “kassapabuddhakāle imasmiṃ ṭhāne vegaḷiṅgaṃ
atk-s0202a:840_3: nāma gāmanigamo ahosi, ahaṃ tadā jotipālo nāma māṇavo ahosiṃ, mayhaṃ sahāyo ghaṭikāro
atk-s0202a:840_4: nāma kumbhakāro ahosi, tena saddhiṃ mayā idha ekaṃ sukāraṇaṃ kataṃ, taṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0202a:840_5: apākaṭaṃ paṭicchannaṃ, handa naṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa pākaṭaṃ karomī”ti maggā okkamma
atk-s0202a:840_6: aññatarasmiṃ padese ṭhitakova sitapātukammamakāsi, aggaggadante dassetvā mandahasitaṃ
atk-s0202a:840_7: hasi. Yathā hi lokiyamanussā uraṃ paharantā – “kuhaṃ kuha”nti hasanti, na evaṃ buddhā,
atk-s0202a:841_0: Hasitañca nāmetaṃ terasahi somanassasahagatacittehi hoti. Tattha lokiyamahājano akusalato
atk-s0202a:841_1: catūhi, kāmāvacarakusalato catūhīti aṭṭhahi cittehi hasati, sekkhā akusalato diṭṭhisampayuttāni
atk-s0202a:841_2: dve apanetvā chahi cittehi hasanti, khīṇāsavā catūhi sahetukakiriyacittehi ekena
atk-s0202a:841_3: ahetukakiriyacittenāti pañcahi cittehi hasanti. Tesupi balavārammaṇe āpāthagate dvīhi
atk-s0202a:841_4: ñāṇasampayuttacittehi hasanti, dubbalārammaṇe duhetukacittadvayena ca ahetukacittena
atk-s0202a:841_5: cāti tīhi cittehi hasanti. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātusomanassasahagatacittaṃ
atk-s0202a:842_0: Taṃ panetaṃ hasitaṃ evaṃ appamattakampi therassa pākaṭaṃ ahosi. Kathaṃ? Tathārūpe
atk-s0202a:842_1: hi kāle tathāgatassa catūhi dāṭhāhi catuddīpikamahāmeghamukhato sateratāvijjulatā
atk-s0202a:842_2: viya virocamānā mahātālakkhandhapamāṇā rasmivaṭṭiyo uṭṭhahitvā tikkhattuṃ sīsavaraṃ
atk-s0202a:842_3: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dāṭhaggesuyeva antaradhāyanti. Tena saññāṇena āyasmā ānando bhagavato
atk-s0202a:843_0: Bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti – “ettha kira kassapo bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ovadi, catusaccappakāsanaṃ
atk-s0202a:843_1: akāsi, bhagavatopi ettha nisīdituṃ ruciṃ uppādessāmi, evamayaṃ bhūmibhāgo dvīhi buddhehi
atk-s0202a:843_2: paribhutto bhavissati, mahājano gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ katvā paricaranto
atk-s0202a:843_3: saggamaggaparāyaṇo bhavissatī”ti cintetvā etaṃ “tena hi, bhante,”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0202a:844_0: 283. Muṇḍakena samaṇakenāti muṇḍaṃ muṇḍoti, samaṇaṃ vā samaṇoti vattuṃ vaṭṭati, ayaṃ
atk-s0202a:844_1: pana aparipakkañāṇattā brāhmaṇakule uggahitavohāravaseneva hīḷento evamāha. Sottisināninti
atk-s0202a:844_2: sinānatthāya katasottiṃ. Sotti nāma kuruvindapāsāṇacuṇṇāni lākhāya bandhitvā kataguḷikakalāpakā
atk-s0202a:844_3: vuccati, yaṃ sandhāya – “tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kuruvindakasuttiyā
atk-s0202a:844_4: nahāyantī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ ubhosu antesu gahetvā sarīraṃ ghaṃsanti. Evaṃ sammāti yathā
atk-s0202a:844_5: etarahipi manussā “cetiyavandanāya gacchāma, dhammassavanatthāya gacchāmā”ti vuttā
atk-s0202a:844_6: ussāhaṃ na karonti, “naṭasamajjādidassanatthāya gacchāmā”ti vuttā pana ekavacaneneva
atk-s0202a:844_7: sampaṭicchanti, tatheva sinhāyitunti vutte ekavacanena sampaṭicchanto evamāha.
atk-s0202a:845_0: 284. Jotipālaṃ māṇavaṃ āmantesīti ekapasse ariyaparihārena paṭhamataraṃ nhāyitvā
atk-s0202a:845_1: paccuttaritvā ṭhito tassa mahantena issariyaparihārena nhāyantassa nhānapariyosānaṃ
atk-s0202a:845_2: āgametvā taṃ nivatthanivāsanaṃ kese vodake kurumānaṃ āmantesi. Ayanti āsannattā dassento
atk-s0202a:845_3: āha. Ovaṭṭikaṃ vinivaṭṭhetvāti nāgabalo bodhisatto “apehi sammā”ti īsakaṃ parivattamānova
atk-s0202a:845_4: tena gahitagahaṇaṃ vissajjāpetvāti attho. Kesesu parāmasitvā etadavocāti so kira
atk-s0202a:845_5: cintesi – “ayaṃ jotipālo paññavā, sakiṃ dassanaṃ labhamāno tathāgatassa dassanepi
atk-s0202a:845_6: pasīdissati, dhammakathāyapi pasīdissati, pasanno ca pasannākāraṃ kātuṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0202a:845_7: mittā nāma etadatthaṃ honti, yaṃkiñci katvā mama sahāyaṃ gahetvā dasabalassa santikaṃ
atk-s0202a:845_8: gamissāmī”ti. Tasmā naṃ kesesu parāmasitvā etadavoca.
atk-s0202a:846_0: Ittarajaccoti aññajātiko, mayā saddhiṃ asamānajātiko, lāmakajātikoti attho. Na vatidanti
atk-s0202a:846_1: idaṃ amhākaṃ gamanaṃ na vata orakaṃ bhavissati na khuddakaṃ, mahantaṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0202a:846_2: Ayañhi na attano thāmena gaṇhi, satthu thāmena gaṇhīti gahaṇasmiṃyeva niṭṭhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0202a:846_3: Yāvatādohipīti ettha dokārahikārapikārā nipātā, yāvatuparimanti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0202a:846_4: hoti – “vācāya ālapanaṃ ovaṭṭikāya gahaṇañca atikkamitvā yāva kesaggahaṇampi tattha
atk-s0202a:847_0: 285. Dhammiyā kathāyāti idha satipaṭilābhatthāya pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttā dhammī kathā
atk-s0202a:847_1: veditabbā. Tassa hi bhagavā, – “jotipāla, tvaṃ na lāmakaṭṭhānaṃ otiṇṇasatto, mahābodhipallaṅke
atk-s0202a:847_2: pana sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ patthetvā otiṇṇosi, tādisassa nāma pamādavihāro na yutto”tiādinā
atk-s0202a:847_3: nayena satipaṭilābhāya dhammaṃ kathesi. Parasamuddavāsītherā pana vadanti – “jotipāla,
atk-s0202a:847_4: yathā ahaṃ dasapāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā vīsatisahassabhikkhuparivāro
atk-s0202a:847_5: loke vicarāmi, evamevaṃ tvampi dasapāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0202a:847_6: samaṇagaṇaparivāro loke vicarissasi. Evarūpena nāma tayā pamādaṃ āpajjituṃ na yutta”nti
atk-s0202a:847_7: yathāssa pabbajjāya cittaṃ namati, evaṃ kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ kathesīti.
atk-s0202a:848_0: 286. Alattha kho, ānanda,…pe… pabbajjaṃ alattha upasampadanti pabbajitvā kimakāsi?
atk-s0202a:848_1: Yaṃ bodhisattehi kattabbaṃ. Bodhisattā hi buddhānaṃ sammukhe pabbajanti. Pabbajitvā
atk-s0202a:848_2: ca pana ittarasattā viya patitasiṅgā na honti, catupārisuddhisīle pana supatiṭṭhāya
atk-s0202a:848_3: tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā terasa dhutaṅgāni samādāya araññaṃ pavisitvā gatapaccāgatavattaṃ
atk-s0202a:848_4: pūrayamānā samaṇadhammaṃ karontā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā yāva anulomañāṇaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0202a:848_5: maggaphalatthaṃ vāyāmaṃ na karonti. Jotipālopi tatheva akāsi.
atk-s0202a:849_0: 287. Aḍḍhamāsupasampanneti kuladārakañhi pabbājetvā aḍḍhamāsampi avasitvā gate mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0202a:849_1: soko na vūpasammati, sopi pattacīvaraggahaṇaṃ na jānāti, daharabhikkhusāmaṇerehi
atk-s0202a:849_2: saddhiṃ vissāso na uppajjati, therehi saddhiṃ sineho na patiṭṭhāti, gatagataṭṭhāne
atk-s0202a:849_3: anabhirati uppajjati. Ettakaṃ pana kālaṃ nivāse sati mātāpitaro passituṃ labhanti.
atk-s0202a:849_4: Tena tesaṃ soko tanubhāvaṃ gacchati, pattacīvaraggahaṇaṃ jānāti, sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhūhi
atk-s0202a:849_5: saddhiṃ vissāso jāyati, therehi saddhiṃ sineho patiṭṭhāti, gatagataṭṭhāne abhiramati,
atk-s0202a:849_6: na ukkaṇṭhati. Tasmā ettakaṃ vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti aḍḍhamāsaṃ vasitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0202a:850_0: Paṇḍupuṭakassa sālinoti puṭake katvā sukkhāpitassa rattasālino. Tassa kira sālino
atk-s0202a:850_1: vappakālato paṭṭhāya ayaṃ parihāro – kedārā suparikammakatā honti, tattha bījāni
atk-s0202a:850_2: patiṭṭhāpetvā gandhodakena siñciṃsu, vappakāle vitānaṃ viya upari vatthakilañjaṃ
atk-s0202a:850_3: bandhitvā paripakkakāle vīhisīsāni chinditvā muṭṭhimatte puṭake katvā yottabaddhe
atk-s0202a:850_4: vehāsaṃyeva sukkhāpetvā gandhacuṇṇāni attharitvā koṭṭhakesu pūretvā tatiye vasse
atk-s0202a:850_5: vivariṃsu. Evaṃ tivassaṃ parivutthassa sugandharattasālino apagatakāḷake suparisuddhe
atk-s0202a:850_6: taṇḍule gahetvā khajjakavikatimpi bhattampi paṭiyādiyiṃsu. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ paṇītaṃ
atk-s0202a:851_0: 288. Adhivuṭṭho meti kiṃ sandhāya vadati? Vegaḷiṅgato nikkhamanakāle ghaṭikāro attano
atk-s0202a:851_1: santike vassāvāsaṃ vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ aggahesi, taṃ sandhāya vadati. Ahudeva aññathattaṃ
atk-s0202a:851_2: ahu domanassanti temāsaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ, dhammañca sotuṃ, iminā ca niyāmena vīsati bhikkhusahassāni
atk-s0202a:851_3: paṭijaggituṃ nālatthanti alābhaṃ ārabbha cittaññathattaṃ cittadomanassaṃ ahosi, na
atk-s0202a:851_4: tathāgataṃ ārabbha. Kasmā? Sotāpannattā. So kira pubbe brāhmaṇabhatto ahosi. Athekasmiṃ
atk-s0202a:851_5: samaye paccante kupite vūpasamanatthaṃ gacchanto uracchadaṃ nāma dhītaramāha – “amma
atk-s0202a:851_6: amhākaṃ deve mā pamajjī”ti. Brāhmaṇā taṃ rājadhītaraṃ disvā visaññino ahesuṃ. Ke
atk-s0202a:851_7: ime cāti vutte tumhākaṃ bhūmidevāti. Bhūmidevā nāma evarūpā hontīti niṭṭhubhitvā
atk-s0202a:851_8: pāsādaṃ abhiruhi. Sā ekadivasaṃ vīthiṃ olokentī ṭhitā kassapassa bhagavato aggasāvakaṃ
atk-s0202a:851_9: disvā pakkosāpetvā piṇḍapātaṃ datvā anumodanaṃ suṇamānāyeva sotāpannā hutvā “aññepi
atk-s0202a:851_10: bhikkhū atthī”ti pucchitvā “satthā vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassehi saddhiṃ isipatane vasatī”ti
atk-s0202a:852_0: Rājā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā āgato. Atha naṃ paṭhamatarameva brāhmaṇā āgantvā dhītu
atk-s0202a:852_1: avaṇṇaṃ vatvā paribhindiṃsu. Rājā pana dhītu jātakāleyeva varaṃ adāsi. Tassā “satta
atk-s0202a:852_2: divasāni rajjaṃ dātabba”nti varaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Athassā rājā satta divasāni rajjaṃ niyyātesi.
atk-s0202a:852_3: Sā satthāraṃ bhojayamānā rājānaṃ pakkosāpetvā bahisāṇiyaṃ nisīdāpesi. Rājā satthu
atk-s0202a:852_4: anumodanaṃ sutvāva sotāpanno jāto. Sotāpannassa ca nāma tathāgataṃ ārabbha āghāto
atk-s0202a:853_0: Yaṃ icchati taṃ haratūti so kira bhājanāni pacitvā kayavikkayaṃ na karoti, evaṃ pana
atk-s0202a:853_1: vatvā dārutthāya vā mattikatthāya vā palālatthāya vā araññaṃ gacchati. Mahājanā “ghaṭikārena
atk-s0202a:853_2: bhājanāni pakkānī”ti sutvā parisuddhataṇḍulaloṇadadhitelaphāṇitādīni gahetvā āgacchanti.
atk-s0202a:853_3: Sace bhājanaṃ mahagghaṃ hoti, mūlaṃ appaṃ, yaṃ vā taṃ vā datvā gaṇhāmāti taṃ na gaṇhanti.
atk-s0202a:853_4: Dhammiko vāṇijo mātāpitaro paṭijaggati, sammāsambuddhaṃ upaṭṭhahati, bahu no akusalaṃ
atk-s0202a:853_5: bhavissatīti puna gantvā mūlaṃ āharanti. Sace pana bhājanaṃ appagghaṃ hoti, ābhataṃ
atk-s0202a:853_6: mūlaṃ bahu, dhammiko vāṇijo, amhākaṃ puññaṃ bhavissatīti yathābhataṃ gharasāmikā
atk-s0202a:853_7: viya sādhukaṃ paṭisāmetvā gacchanti. Evaṃguṇo pana kasmā na pabbajatīti. Rañño vacanapathaṃ
atk-s0202a:853_8: pacchindanto andhe jiṇṇe mātāpitaro posetīti āha.
atk-s0202a:854_0: 289. Ko nu khoti kuhiṃ nu kho. Kumbhiyāti ukkhalito. Pariyogāti sūpabhājanato. Paribhuñjāti
atk-s0202a:854_1: bhuñja. Kasmā panete evaṃ vadanti? Ghaṭikāro kira bhattaṃ pacitvā sūpaṃ sampādetvā
atk-s0202a:854_2: mātāpitaro bhojetvā sayampi bhuñjitvā bhagavato vaḍḍhamānakaṃ bhattasūpaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0202a:854_3: āsanaṃ paññapetvā ādhārakaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā udakaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā mātāpitūnaṃ saññaṃ
atk-s0202a:854_4: datvā araññaṃ gacchati. Tasmā evaṃ vadanti. Abhivissatthoti ativissattho. Pītisukhaṃ
atk-s0202a:854_5: na vijahatīti na nirantaraṃ vijahati, atha kho rattibhāge vā divasabhāge vā gāme
atk-s0202a:854_6: vā araññe vā yasmiṃ yasmiṃ khaṇe – “sadevake nāma loke aggapuggalo mayhaṃ gehaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0202a:854_7: sahatthena āmisaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjati, lābhā vata me”ti anussarati, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
atk-s0202a:854_8: khaṇe pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjati. Taṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0202a:855_0: 290. Kaḷopiyāti pacchito. Kiṃ pana bhagavā evamakāsīti. Paccayo dhammiko, bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0202a:855_1: patte bhattasadiso, tasmā evamakāsi. Sikkhāpadapaññattipi ca sāvakānaṃyeva hoti,
atk-s0202a:855_2: buddhānaṃ sikkhāpadavelā nāma natthi. Yathā hi rañño uyyāne pupphaphalāni honti,
atk-s0202a:855_3: aññesaṃ tāni gaṇhantānaṃ niggahaṃ karonti, rājā yathāruciyā paribhuñjati, evaṃsampadametaṃ.
atk-s0202a:855_4: Parasamuddavāsītherā pana “devatā kira paṭiggahetvā adaṃsū”ti vadanti.
atk-s0202a:856_0: 291. Haratha, bhante, haratha bhadramukhāti amhākaṃ putto “kuhiṃ gatosī”ti vutte
atk-s0202a:856_1: – “dasabalassa santika”nti vadati, kuhiṃ nu kho gacchati, satthu vasanaṭṭhānassa
atk-s0202a:856_2: ovassakabhāvampi na jānātīti putte aparādhasaññino gahaṇe tuṭṭhacittā evamāhaṃsu.
atk-s0202a:857_0: Temāsaṃ ākāsacchadanaṃ aṭṭhāsīti bhagavā kira catunnaṃ vassikānaṃ māsānaṃ ekaṃ māsaṃ
atk-s0202a:857_1: atikkamitvā tiṇaṃ āharāpesi, tasmā evamāha. Ayaṃ panettha padattho – ākāsaṃ chadanamassāti
atk-s0202a:857_2: ākāsacchadanaṃ. Na devotivassīti kevalaṃ nātivassi, yathā panettha pakatiyā ca nibbakosassa
atk-s0202a:857_3: udakapātaṭṭhānabbhantare ekampi udakabindu nātivassi, evaṃ ghanachadanagehabbhantare
atk-s0202a:857_4: viya na vātātapāpi ābādhaṃ akaṃsu, pakatiyā utupharaṇameva ahosi. Aparabhāge tasmiṃ
atk-s0202a:857_5: nigame chaḍḍitepi taṃ ṭhānaṃ anovassakameva ahosi. Manussā kammaṃ karontā deve vassante
atk-s0202a:857_6: tattha sāṭake ṭhapetvā kammaṃ karonti. Yāva kappuṭṭhānā taṃ ṭhānaṃ tādisameva bhavissati.
atk-s0202a:857_7: Tañca kho pana na tathāgatassa iddhānubhāvena, tesaṃyeva pana guṇasampattiyā. Tesañhi
atk-s0202a:857_8: – “sammāsambuddho kattha na labheyya, amhākaṃ nāma dvinnaṃ andhakānaṃ nivesanaṃ uttiṇaṃ
atk-s0202a:857_9: kāresī”ti na tappaccayā domanassaṃ udapādi – “sadevake loke aggapuggalo amhākaṃ nivesanā
atk-s0202a:857_10: tiṇaṃ āharāpetvā gandhakuṭiṃ chādāpesī”ti pana tesaṃ anappakaṃ balavasomanassaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0202a:857_11: Iti tesaṃyeva guṇasampattiyā idaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ jātanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:858_0: 292. Taṇḍulavāhasatānīti ettha dve sakaṭāni eko vāhoti veditabbo. Tadupiyañca sūpeyyanti
atk-s0202a:858_1: sūpatthāya tadanurūpaṃ telaphāṇitādiṃ. Vīsatibhikkhusahassassa temāsatthāya bhattaṃ
atk-s0202a:858_2: bhavissatīti kira saññāya rājā ettakaṃ pesesi. Alaṃ me raññova hotūti kasmā paṭikkhipi?
atk-s0202a:858_3: Adhigataappicchatāya. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “nāhaṃ raññā diṭṭhapubbo, kathaṃ nu kho
atk-s0202a:858_4: pesesī”ti. Tato cintesi – “satthā bārāṇasiṃ gato, addhā so rañño vassāvāsaṃ yāciyamāno
atk-s0202a:858_5: mayhaṃ paṭiññātabhāvaṃ ārocetvā mama guṇakathaṃ kathesi, guṇakathāya laddhalābho
atk-s0202a:858_6: pana naṭena naccitvā laddhaṃ viya gāyakena gāyitvā laddhaṃ viya ca hoti. Kiṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0202a:858_7: iminā, kammaṃ katvā uppannena mātāpitūnampi sammāsambuddhassapi upaṭṭhānaṃ sakkā
atk-s0202a:862_0: 293. Evaṃ me sutanti raṭṭhapālasuttaṃ. Tattha thullakoṭṭhikanti thullakoṭṭhaṃ paripuṇṇakoṭṭhāgāraṃ.
atk-s0202a:862_1: So kira janapado niccasasso sadā bījabhaṇḍaṃ nikkhamati, khalabhaṇḍaṃ pavisati. Tena
atk-s0202a:862_2: tasmiṃ nigame koṭṭhā niccapūrāva honti. Tasmā so thullakoṭṭhikanteva saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0202a:863_0: 294. Raṭṭhapāloti kasmā raṭṭhapālo? Bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ pāletuṃ samatthoti
atk-s0202a:863_1: raṭṭhapālo. Kadā panassetaṃ nāmaṃ uppannanti. Padumuttarasammāsambuddhakāle. Ito
atk-s0202a:863_2: hi pubbe satasahassakappamatthake vassasatasahassāyukesu manussesu padumuttaro nāma
atk-s0202a:863_3: satthā uppajjitvā bhikkhusatasahassaparivāro lokahitāya cārikaṃ cari, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0202a:866_0: Padumuttare pana anuppanne eva haṃsavatiyā dve kuṭumbikā saddhā pasannā kapaṇaddhikayācakādīnaṃ
atk-s0202a:866_1: dānaṃ paṭṭhapayiṃsu. Tadā pabbatavāsino pañcasatā tāpasā haṃsavatiṃ anuppattā. Te
atk-s0202a:866_2: dvepi janā tāpasagaṇaṃ majjhe bhinditvā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Tāpasā kiñcikālaṃ vasitvā pabbatapādameva
atk-s0202a:866_3: gatā. Dve saṅghattherā ohīyiṃsu. Tadā tesaṃ te yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ akaṃsu. Tāpasesu
atk-s0202a:866_4: bhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ karontesu eko sakkabhavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathesi, eko bhūmindharanāgarājabhavanassa.
atk-s0202a:867_0: Kuṭumbikesu eko sakkabhavanaṃ patthanaṃ katvā sakko hutvā nibbatto, eko nāgabhavane
atk-s0202a:867_1: pālitanāgarājā nāma. Taṃ sakko attano upaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ disvā nāgayoniyaṃ abhiramasīti
atk-s0202a:867_2: pucchi. So nābhiramāmīti āha. Tena hi padumuttarassa bhagavato dānaṃ datvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0202a:867_3: ṭhāne patthanaṃ karohi, ubho sukhaṃ vasissāmāti. Nāgarājā satthāraṃ nimantetvā bhikkhusatasahassaparivārassa
atk-s0202a:867_4: bhagavato sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ dadamāno padumuttarassa dasabalassa puttaṃ uparevataṃ
atk-s0202a:867_5: nāma sāmaṇeraṃ disvā sattame divase buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dibbavatthāni datvā
atk-s0202a:867_6: sāmaṇerassa ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. Bhagavā anāgataṃ oloketvā – “anāgate gotamassa
atk-s0202a:867_7: nāma buddhassa putto rāhulakumāro bhavissatī”ti disvā “samijjhissati te patthanā”ti
atk-s0202a:867_8: kathesi. Nāgarājā tamatthaṃ sakkassa kathesi. Sakko tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tatheva sattāhaṃ
atk-s0202a:867_9: dānaṃ datvā bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ pāletuṃ samatthakule nibbattitvā saddhāpabbajitaṃ
atk-s0202a:867_10: raṭṭhapālaṃ nāma kulaputtaṃ disvā – “ahampi anāgate lokasmiṃ tumhādise buddhe uppanne
atk-s0202a:867_11: bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ pāletuṃ samatthakule nibbattitvā ayaṃ kulaputto viya
atk-s0202a:867_12: saddhāpabbajito raṭṭhapālo nāma bhaveyya”nti patthanamakāsi. Satthā samijjhanakabhāvaṃ
atk-s0202a:870: Evaṃ padumuttarasammāsambuddhakāle tassetaṃ nāmaṃ uppannanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0202a:871_0: Etadahosīti kiṃ ahosi? Yathā yathā khotiādi. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepakathā – ahaṃ kho yena
atk-s0202a:871_1: yena kāraṇena bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, tena tena me upaparikkhato evaṃ
atk-s0202a:871_2: hoti – “yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekadivasampi akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ
atk-s0202a:871_3: pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ caritabbaṃ, ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalīnaṃ
atk-s0202a:871_4: katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ, saṅkhalikhitaṃ vilikhitasaṅkhasadisaṃ
atk-s0202a:871_5: dhotasaṅkhasappaṭibhāgaṃ katvā caritabbaṃ, nayidaṃ sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe
atk-s0202a:871_6: vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ, yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesañca massuñca ohāretvā kāsāyarasapītatāya
atk-s0202a:871_7: kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0202a:872_0: Acirapakkantesu thullakoṭṭhikesu brāhmaṇagahapatikesu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti
atk-s0202a:872_1: raṭṭhapālo anuṭṭhitesu tesu na bhagavantaṃ pabbajjaṃ yāci. Kasmā? Tatthassa bahū
atk-s0202a:872_2: ñātisālohitā mittāmaccā santi, te – “tvaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ ekaputtako, na labbhā tayā
atk-s0202a:872_3: pabbajitu”nti bāhāyampi gahetvā ākaḍḍheyyuṃ, tato pabbajjāya antarāyo bhavissatīti
atk-s0202a:872_4: saheva parisāya uṭṭhahitvā thokaṃ gantvā puna kenaci sarīrakiccalesena nivattitvā
atk-s0202a:872_5: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamma pabbajjaṃ yāci. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho raṭṭhapālo kulaputto
atk-s0202a:872_6: acirapakkantesu thullakoṭṭhikesu…pe… pabbājetu maṃ bhagavā”ti. Bhagavā pana yasmā
atk-s0202a:872_7: rāhulakumārassa pabbajitato pabhuti mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ na pabbājeti, tasmā
atk-s0202a:872_8: naṃ pucchi anuññātosi pana tvaṃ, raṭṭhapāla, mātāpitūhi…pe… pabbajjāyāti.
atk-s0202a:873_0: 295. Ammatātāti ettha ammāti mātaraṃ ālapati, tātāti pitaraṃ. Ekaputtakoti ekova
atk-s0202a:873_1: puttako, añño koci jeṭṭho vā kaniṭṭho vā natthi. Ettha ca ekaputtoti vattabbe anukampāvasena
atk-s0202a:873_2: ekaputtakoti vuttaṃ. Piyoti pītijanako. Manāpoti manavaḍḍhanako. Sukhedhitoti sukhena
atk-s0202a:873_3: edhito, sukhasaṃvaḍḍhitoti attho. Sukhaparibhatoti sukhena paribhato, jātakālato
atk-s0202a:873_4: pabhuti dhātīhi aṅkato aṅkaṃ āharitvā dhāriyamāno assakarathakādīhi bālakīḷanakehi
atk-s0202a:873_5: kīḷayamāno sādurasabhojanaṃ bhojayamāno sukhena parihaṭo. Na tvaṃ, tāta raṭṭhapāla,
atk-s0202a:873_6: kassaci dukkhassa jānāsīti tvaṃ, tāta raṭṭhapāla appamattakampi kalabhāgaṃ dukkhassa
atk-s0202a:873_7: na jānāsi na sarasīti attho. Maraṇenapi te mayaṃ akāmakā vinā bhavissāmāti sacepi
atk-s0202a:873_8: tava amhesu jīvamānesu maraṇaṃ bhaveyya, tena te maraṇenapi mayaṃ akāmakā anicchakā
atk-s0202a:873_9: na attano ruciyā vinā bhavissāma, tayā viyogaṃ pāpuṇissāmāti attho. Kiṃ pana mayaṃ
atk-s0202a:873_10: tanti evaṃ sante kiṃ pana kiṃ nāma taṃ kāraṇaṃ, yena mayaṃ taṃ jīvantaṃ anujānissāma.
atk-s0202a:873_11: Atha vā kiṃ pana mayaṃ tanti kena pana kāraṇena mayaṃ taṃ jīvantaṃ anujānissāmāti
atk-s0202a:874_0: 296. Tatthevāti yattha naṃ ṭhitaṃ mātāpitaro nānujāniṃsu, tattheva ṭhāne. Anantarahitāyāti
atk-s0202a:874_1: kenaci attharaṇena anatthatāya. Paricārehīti gandhabbanaṭanāṭakādīni paccupaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0202a:874_2: tattha sahāyakehi saddhiṃ yathāsukhaṃ indriyāni cārehi sañcārehi, ito cito ca upanehīti
atk-s0202a:874_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā paricārehīti gandhabbanaṭanāṭakādīni paccupaṭṭhapetvā sahāyakehi
atk-s0202a:874_4: saddhiṃ laḷa upalaḷa rama, kīḷassūtipi vuttaṃ hoti. Kāme paribhuñjantoti attano puttadārehi
atk-s0202a:874_5: saddhiṃ bhoge bhuñjanto. Puññāni karontoti buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca ārabbha
atk-s0202a:874_6: dānappadānādīni sugatimaggasaṃsodhakāni kusalakammāni karonto. Tuṇhī ahosīti kathānuppabandhavicchedanatthaṃ
atk-s0202a:875_0: Athassa mātāpitaro tikkhattuṃ vatvā paṭivacanampi alabhamānā sahāyake pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0202a:875_1: “esa vo sahāyako pabbajitukāmo, nivāretha na”nti āhaṃsu. Tepi taṃ upasaṅkamitvā tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0202a:875_2: avocuṃ, tesampi tuṇhī ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ – atha kho raṭṭhapālassa kulaputtassa sahāyakā…pe…
atk-s0202a:875_3: tuṇhī ahosīti. Athassa sahāyakānaṃ tikkhattuṃ vatvā etadahosi – “sace ayaṃ pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0202a:875_4: alabhamāno marissati, na koci guṇo labbhati. Pabbajitaṃ pana naṃ mātāpitaropi kālena
atk-s0202a:875_5: kālaṃ passissanti, mayampi passissāma, pabbajjāpi ca nāmesā bhāriyā, divase divase
atk-s0202a:875_6: mattikāpattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ, ekaseyyaṃ ekabhattaṃ brahmacariyaṃ atidukkaraṃ,
atk-s0202a:875_7: ayañca sukhumālo nāgarikajātiyo, so taṃ carituṃ asakkonto puna idheva āgamissati,
atk-s0202a:875_8: handassa mātāpitaro anujānāpessāmā”ti. Te tathā akaṃsu. Mātāpitaropi naṃ “pabbajitena
atk-s0202a:875_9: ca pana te mātāpitaro uddassetabbā”ti imaṃ katikaṃ katvā anujāniṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0202a:875_10: – “atha kho raṭṭhapālassa kulaputtassa sahāyakā yena raṭṭhapālassa kulaputtassa mātāpitaro…pe…
atk-s0202a:875_11: anuññātosi mātāpitūhi…pe… uddassetabbā”ti. Tattha uddassetabbāti uddhaṃ dassetabbā,
atk-s0202a:875_12: yathā taṃ kālena kālaṃ passanti, evaṃ āgantvā attānaṃ dassetabbā.
atk-s0202a:876_0: 299. Balaṃ gahetvāti sappāyabhojanāni bhuñjanto ucchādanādīhi ca kāyaṃ pariharanto
atk-s0202a:876_1: kāyabalaṃ janetvā mātāpitaro vanditvā assumukhaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya yena bhagavā
atk-s0202a:876_2: tenupasaṅkami…pe… pabbājetu maṃ, bhante, bhagavāti. Bhagavā samīpe ṭhitaṃ aññataraṃ
atk-s0202a:876_3: bhikkhuṃ āmantesi – “tena hi bhikkhu raṭṭhapālaṃ pabbājehi ceva upasampādehi cā”ti.
atk-s0202a:876_4: Sādhu, bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā raṭṭhapālaṃ kulaputtaṃ jinadattiyaṃ
atk-s0202a:876_5: saddhivihārikaṃ laddhā pabbājesi ceva upasampādesi ca. Tena vuttaṃ – “alattha kho
atk-s0202a:876_6: raṭṭhapālo kulaputto bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampada”nti.
atk-s0202a:877_0: Pahitatto viharantoti dvādasa saṃvaccharāni evaṃ viharanto. Neyyapuggalo hi ayamāyasmā,
atk-s0202a:877_1: tasmā puññavā abhinīhārasampannopi samāno “ajja ajjeva arahatta”nti samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0202a:878_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti mayhaṃ mātāpitaro pabbajjaṃ anujānamānā – “tayā kālena
atk-s0202a:878_1: kālaṃ āgantvā amhākaṃ dassanaṃ dātabba”nti vatvā anujāniṃsu, dukkarakārikā kho pana
atk-s0202a:878_2: mātāpitaro, ahañca yenajjhāsayena pabbajito, so me matthakaṃ patto, idāni bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0202a:878_3: āpucchitvā attānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ dassessāmīti cintetvā āpucchitukāmo upasaṅkami. Manasākāsīti
atk-s0202a:878_4: “kiṃ nu kho raṭṭhapāle gate koci upaddavo bhavissatī”ti manasi akāsi. Tato “bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0202a:878_5: ñatvā “sakkhissati nu kho raṭṭhapālo taṃ madditu”nti olokento tassa arahattasampattiṃ
atk-s0202a:878_6: disvā “sakkhissatī”ti aññāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – yathā bhagavā aññāsi…pe… kālaṃ maññasīti.
atk-s0202a:879_0: Migacīreti evaṃnāmake uyyāne. Tañhi raññā – “akāle sampattapabbajitānaṃ dinnameva
atk-s0202a:879_1: idaṃ, yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjantū”ti evamanuññātameva ahosi, tasmā thero – “mama āgatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0202a:879_2: mātāpitūnaṃ ārocessāmi, te me pādadhovanauṇhodakapādamakkhanatelādīni pesissantī”ti
atk-s0202a:879_3: cittampi anuppādetvā uyyānameva pāvisi. Piṇḍāya pāvisīti dutiyadivase pāvisi.
atk-s0202a:880_0: Majjhimāyāti sattadvārakoṭṭhakassa gharassa majjhime dvārakoṭṭhake. Ullikhāpetīti
atk-s0202a:880_1: kappakena kese paharāpeti. Etadavocāti – “ime samaṇakā amhākaṃ piyaputtakaṃ pabbājetvā
atk-s0202a:880_2: corānaṃ hatthe nikkhipitvā viya ekadivasampi na dassāpenti, evaṃ pharusakārakā ete
atk-s0202a:880_3: puna imaṃ ṭhānaṃ upasaṅkamitabbaṃ maññanti, ettova nikaḍḍhitabbā ete”ti cintetvā
atk-s0202a:880_4: etaṃ “imehi muṇḍakehī”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Ñātidāsīti ñātakānaṃ dāsī. Ābhidosikanti
atk-s0202a:880_5: pārivāsikaṃ ekarattātikkantaṃ pūtibhūtaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ padattho – pūtibhāvadosena abhibhūtoti
atk-s0202a:880_6: abhidoso, abhidosova ābhidosiko. Ekarattātikkantasseva nāmasaññā esā yadidaṃ ābhidosikoti,
atk-s0202a:880_7: taṃ ābhidosikaṃ. Kummāsanti yavakummāsaṃ. Chaḍḍetukāmā hotīti yasmā antamaso dāsakammakārānaṃ
atk-s0202a:880_8: gorūpānampi aparibhogāraho, tasmā naṃ kacavaraṃ viya bahi chaḍḍetukāmā hoti. Sacetanti
atk-s0202a:880_9: sace etaṃ. Bhaginīti ariyavohārena attano dhātiṃ ñātidāsiṃ ālapati. Chaḍḍanīyadhammanti
atk-s0202a:880_10: chaḍḍetabbasabhāvaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “bhagini etaṃ sace bahi chaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ
atk-s0202a:880_11: nissaṭṭhapariggahaṃ, idha me patte ākirāhī”ti. Kiṃ pana evaṃ vattuṃ labbhati, viññatti
atk-s0202a:880_12: vā payuttavācā vā na hotīti. Na hoti. Kasmā? Nissaṭṭhapariggahattā. Yañhi chaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ
atk-s0202a:880_13: nissaṭṭhapariggahaṃ, yattha sāmikā anālayā honti, taṃ sabbaṃ “detha āharatha ākirathā”ti
atk-s0202a:880_14: vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Teneva hi ayamāyasmā aggaariyavaṃsiko samānopi evamāha.
atk-s0202a:881_0: Hatthānanti bhikkhāgahaṇatthaṃ pattaṃ upanāmayato maṇibandhato pabhuti dvinnampi
atk-s0202a:881_1: hatthānaṃ. Pādānanti nivāsanantato paṭṭhāya dvinnampi pādānaṃ. Sarassāti sace taṃ
atk-s0202a:881_2: bhaginīti vācaṃ nicchārayato sarassa ca. Nimittaṃ aggahesīti hatthapiṭṭhiādīni olokayamānā
atk-s0202a:881_3: – “puttassa me raṭṭhapālassa viya suvaṇṇakacchapapiṭṭhisadisā imā hatthapādapiṭṭhiyo,
atk-s0202a:881_4: haritālavaṭṭiyo viya suvaṭṭitā aṅguliyo, madhuro saro”ti gihikāle sallakkhitapubbaṃ
atk-s0202a:881_5: ākāraṃ aggahesi sañjāni sallakkhesi. Tassa hāyasmato dvādasavassāni araññāvāsañceva
atk-s0202a:881_6: piṇḍiyālopabhojanañca paribhuñjantassa aññādiso sarīravaṇṇo ahosi, tena naṃ sā ñātidāsī
atk-s0202a:881_7: disvāva na sañjāni, nimittaṃ pana aggahesīti.
atk-s0202a:882_0: 300. Raṭṭhapālassa mātaraṃ etadavocāti therassa aṅgapaccaṅgāni saṇṭhāpetvā thaññaṃ
atk-s0202a:882_1: pāyetvā saṃvaḍḍhitadhātīpi samānā pabbajitvā mahākhīṇāsavabhāvappattena sāmiputtena
atk-s0202a:882_2: saddhiṃ – “tvaṃ nu kho, me bhante, putto raṭṭhapālo”tiādivacanaṃ vattuṃ avisahantī
atk-s0202a:882_3: vegena gharaṃ pavisitvā raṭṭhapālassa mātaraṃ etadavoca. Yaggheti ārocanatthe nipāto.
